title: Lovely stay here at the Intercontinental!
desc: Fabulous hotel, very friendly and efficient staff. Very clean, comfortable beds, beautiful rooms. Breakfast really good. Good roof top pool. Great location, not far from train station and shops. Stayed here a few times, wouldn‚Äôt stay anywhere else.

title: Excellent service
desc: Held an event at Intercontinental Singapore ballroom and received excellent service by Shi Qi and Najib. Special thanks to them for being patient and friendly to our guests. We will look forward to having future such events there.

title: POOR SERVICE DELIVERY BY FRONT DESK STUFF
desc: Treated like poor men upon check in . What the stuff did not know is that my family stays in hotels twice yearly as a short getaway and other than this one ,we always stay in suites and have so far no complains. They give us a late check out as we are dinning in the hotel but lock us out way before the time. Whats worst was there was no apology but the attitute that it is our right. Had we known we would not have our lunch there before we leave. It is not as though we have no options. They sent letter to say that their motto is to exceed customers expectation. I am left wondering why even the basics are not met. Jolly well i can afford and not likely to return to this hotel that treats me like a ppoor man.

title: Great location for a business trip to Singapore
desc: Light, large, clean and airy rooms with everything at your fingertips. The Intercontinental in a perfect location to access all of Singapore. Right on top of a mall, the MRT and surrounded by street level eateries and bars for a range of dining experiences. Easy to come and go without long lift rides and transits through cavernous lobbies. Convenience at its best.

title: Best hotel so far. I will definitely come back with my wife!
desc: The wonderful atmosphere and the staff was just outstanding. I will definitely go back there! I would like to thank especially Lucinda, Kenny, David, Justin and Joyce. I was there with my wife Sashtri and the way they looked after us was just amazing.

title: Must Be One of Singapore's Best Hotels
desc: This is a very special hotel. We had a club suite which gave us a larger room with a separate lounge area and access to the club extras - daily afternoon tea, evening cocktails and snacks and a la carte breakfast. Afternoon tea and snacks were great. Our suite was spotlessly clean, roomy and beautifully furnished. The overall standard of service from check-in to departure was excellent. The pool is relaxing and private - an oasis in a busy city. We had lunch at Man Fu Yuan which was special - Beijing (Peking) duck and Sang Choy Bow. I have stayed at this hotel before, and I will go back on my next visit to Singapore. I will be recommending the hotel to my friends.

title: Memorable Wedding with Intercon
desc: We had our wedding dinner banquet at InterContinental Singapore (Bugis) on 1 October 2022 and it was a decision we absolutely did not regret! Although the wedding coordinator we initially signed with left halfway, it was a blessing we were subsequently assigned to Sherlyn. She was wonderful and though it must have been difficult because she was not privy to the initial discussions we had with the previous wedding coordinator, she always tried her best to honour what was promised by the previous coordinator and she always took the effort to check first and find out instead of outright telling us no from the start. Our wedding planning went smoothly due to her and she even took the effort to see us off on the day we checked out as she had some time. If you have Sherlyn as your

title: 2 days
desc: Well - do not really know where to begin. I was invited to provide my feedback on the IHG website but it did not recognise my credentials. So now I am putting it out here for everyone to see. Let's face it, this is an expense hotel. When paying 500+ per night you expect everything to work but check in was a farce. I am a Diamond Ambassador who has stayed here more than 20 times but: 1. No on recognised me as an Ambassador 2. No room upgrade; 3. Room keys did not work in elevator; 4. No fruit or wine waiting for me. When I called I was told that this is not provided; 5. When I had left the hotel I received a call saying they had made a mistake and that they had now upgraded my room to a suite (as usually happended) but I had to turn around the taxi and re-pack, then unpack,

title: Loud music at night
desc: There is a night club at the hotel that plays music so loudly it literally can be heard on every floor and shakes the windows. Impossible to sleep. Rooms are super small. Only the pool and breakfast are nice. Location is also far from a lot of things. Not necessarily walking distance.

title: Check in and lounge team
desc: As a diamond elite member, we are rarely impressed with staff services, but the people from the executive lounge of Intercon Singapore specially Reymar, Zin and Rochelle and the Malay girl in the lounge, front desk officer Fiona made our stay very comfortable and we felt important, Very impressive that the f&b team are asking how‚Äôs our stay just sends the message how great this hotel‚Äôs teamwork is. Very fancy hotel with very caring thoughtful staff. Thank you guys! Highly recommended, üòä

title: Not as good as I thought
desc: I went to Singapore in Oct 2022 and picked Intercontinental Singapore. The location is very good as it is above the MRT station, making travel easy. However, I don't feel recognised as an IHG Platinum member. The room was clean and spacious although has a bit "old" feeling. However, I am quite disappointed with the breakfast. The selection was limited and was just so-so.

title: Magical & excellent Service
desc: My husband & I stayed at the Intercontinental Singapore for 8 nights together with another couple friend. We experienced excellence in the service, from the staff to the senior Management. Joyce Chua the Hotel Manager runs an excellent crew from the Executive Chef Kevin Chung to Lucinda Neo the Rooms Division Manager and every level of the operational team... they truly contribute to make our holiday magical.

title: Qualit√© service de chambre
desc: Thanks to JIAN Li for his professionalism. The quality of his work is very good. Thank you also to the Intercontinental Club for their welcome and for offering us high quality services. I recommend this hotel for its location and the quality of the services it offers.

title: Great place with family
desc: Great location, great staff and service. The hotel is really close to all kinds of restaurants. The desserts, the fish soup restaurant, the thai restaurant, all can just with 4 mins walking( around 200-300meters). The restaurant Man Fu Yuan was great, we went with our kids, all the food we order was delicious.

title: ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏™‡∏á‡∏ö ‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πà‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏û‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô
desc: We booked a twin classic room. The room was next to the main road but I couldn't hear any noise outside which is excellent! I found the bed was too soft for me though. The lighting in the room was a bit hard to use but bright enough. Not many mirrors in the room, 2 large mirrors in the bathroom and a small long one hidden in the closet. The closet and drawers were a bit small for our clothes. Texts on shampoo, conditioner, and body lotion are very tiny and hard to read. Other than that, I enjoyed staying at Intercotineltal Singapore and hope to come back again soon. Oh! Good location with many shops and places to dine.

title: Short Bizz Trip Stay
desc: Was here for short business trip back in Sept 2022. The room was excellent, v well decorated colonial style, with luxurious bathroom, the porter story-tell like a tour leader while delivering my luggage. Only drawback is they put me back at the extension area veryyy far from lift and manual door lock was broken, luckily the staff noticed and immediately replaced that with new one for my safety.

title: Good but past its best
desc: I am sure at one point in time this hotel was an absolute beauty. It is past is best and does need work. Saying that it is clean, service was good and room was spacious. Good location. No bar in the hotel, no room service after 10.30 and the room service menu is identical to the lobby lounge (not sure if that is a common practice in Singapore), the pool had no attendants in the morning and you could not order things. I would go back for a business stay but not for a holiday.

title: Great Location, Big Rooms, Bigger Heart!
desc: - Hotel is attached to the Bugis Mall, making it an ideal location - Rooms are spacious and modern ( health faucet missing in all washrooms) - Staff is helpful - A big thanks to Jeff at the lobby and Lucinda Neu (sorry if I misspelt) at the Concierge for helping us throughout the stay

title: High Quality experience
desc: To celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary in this hotel was an excellent choice, with its stylish and classic look. Everything was perfect and of high quality; the room, the high tea, the Chinese restaurant, the view, the location, we loved it. The friendly staff, the present in the room, the all day cleaning available, and the umbrella‚Äôs for the F1 and the rain, gave the extra mile. Man Fu Yuan served the best Chinese menu we ever experienced. It is a recommendation for other guests. As a F1 fan it was nice to notice the lobby had a nice F1 appearance, a shop with F1 merchandise, and served a complete F1 team (complete discreet of course). Dear staff, thank you so much for a great experience, and for everything, a big compliment to you all!

title: Sensational
desc: My wife and I travel quite extensively, and after covid, this was our first trip in nearly 3 years. Our experience with this establishment was exceptional. The people, the service, the rooms, the assistance, we could not fault anything. it was an absolute joy to stay here. And a very special shout out the concierge staff, who went way and beyond, especially Wayne Wong. Thank You and Thank You, you made our holiday delightful

title: A week in Singapore for the formula 1 event.
desc: Close to many of the shopping centres & markets. Walking distance to the Formula 1 events. Classic hotel design connected to upmarket shopping centre. Generous & comfortable room. Attentive service at every level. We are looking forward to returning.

title: Great destination
desc: Wonderful destination and perfect location for F1. Service was fantastic with a step back in time traditional decor. Very luxurious and comfortable. Shopping just a walk out the door. Plenty of classic venues in easy walking distance. Take an umbrella and don‚Äôt get caught in rain.

title: Corporate Booking - HIGHLY Recommend
desc: Corporate bookings can be challenging, complex, require deviations in planning and can have many moving components. Such events take hours of planning and the goal is simple - deliver an excellent event to our guests while making them feel comfortable while traveling. In this case 40 rooms, peole from across the globe and to add complexity, the week of Singapore F1. My conference guests loved the beauty of the property, they raved about the breakfast, slept well (super important), praised the service and appreciated the surrounding Bugis area. The event feedback has been great and a large part of the credit goes to the Intercontinental Singapore (Mr. Kraemer and his team). The communication (speed and thoroughness), transparency, care and overall sincerity to deliver a BEST

title: Exceed expectations
desc: Hotel exceeded my expectations and really very good value for money. Staff extremely attentive, impeccable and super clean room and impeccable maintenance of the room. I traveled for business and stayed for 7 days and it was really nice to come back every night and find a lovely clean and super well maintained room. Toiletries were excellent! Hotel is very conveniently located, walking distance from the MRT, to a mall and to several restaurants. Only 2 aspects that could be improved: 1. The hotel doesn‚Äôt have an Spa but work in collaboration with nearby spas and concierge is very helpful in booking an appointment in any of them. However, this has the inconvenient that you have to go out of the hotel and go to a local spa, for a massage. I did it, Spa was super good and with very

title: Just an incredible luxury!
desc: Intercontinental Singapore never fails to delight! Staff are amazing - Housekeeping, Club Lounge, Reception. A special thank you to Yusuf and the smiling Greetings team getting us everywhere we needed to be! We will be back again and again!!

title: SERVICE WITH MILES OF SMILES
desc: I HAVE LOST COUNT OF THE NUMBER OF STAYS AT THIS HOTEL, BUT HARDLY OF THE PEOPLE WHOM I HAVE MET DURING ALL THOSE YEARS. THIS IS BECAUSE THEY ARE THE ONES WHO MAKE A DIFFERENCE. WHETHER THEY EXUDE WARMTH OR GREET ME AS IF I WAS PART OF THEIR FAMILY OR ATTEND TO THE USUAL REQUESTS THAT ONE INVARIABLY HAS WHEN STAYING AWAY FROM HOME, THEY ARE SIMPLY ADMIRABLE. THE DOORMAN, ROBERT, IS ONLY BEATEN AS THE BEST VISITING CARD OF THE HOTEL BY WAIKIT IN THE EXECUTIVE LOUNGE AND HER COLLEAGUES, THE SOFTLY SPOKEN TEAM LEADER, AZHAR, BUT DELIVERING EFFICIENCY IN ABUNDANCE, THE GRACIOUS IDAH WITH HER CONTAGIOUS LAUGH, THE BUSY BEE ANNA, EVER SO WATCHFUL OF THE DIETS OF HER GUESTS, CHEFS HWA SHEN, SAVARI, JASON AND LAI, WHO APPEAR TO BE ABLE, AND CERTAINLY WILLING, TO ATTEND TO THE SPECIAL

title: Visit to view wedding venue
desc: Visited Intercontinental Bugis on 28 November 2022 to check the wedding venue site and was served by Ms Stephanie Heng. Would like to commend her for her knowledge, pro-activeness and outgoing personality throughout this journey to make us feel welcomed, answer so many of our queries and providing us with all the relevant knowledge for planning our wedding. The Library room which was recommended for a small group wedding was also pretty and I especially like how the solemnization area and banquet area are all in one long room but two separate sections from each other. Most of all, Stephanie was super prompt in replying our messages and we never had to chase her for an update unlike other experiences we had elsewhere. Appreciate both the hotel and Stephanie for having us on this

title: Great IC Singapore Stay!
desc: Stayed at the IC Singapore towards the end of November after a very long time away due to travel restrictions. I can honestly say that the hotel hasn't lost its touch. The room upgrade was just what I had expected and the service in the Club lounge was excellent, especially breakfast. Afternoon tea was okay but I wanted clotted cream with my scones and not whipped cream (please change that). I really enjoy the location of the hotel (Bugis) and its proximity to the MRT (you literally walk out of the hotel, into the mall and down to the MRT). I haven't stayed anywhere else when visiting Singapore and I don't think I would want to stay anywhere else next time I am there.

title: Beautiful hotel with excellent service
desc: After three years, we returned to IC Singapore for a business trip, and everything was as it should have been. Best location with local markets and foods, friendly & helpful staff. Jeffery greeted me and escorted me to my room, and his friendliness, cheerfulness, and helpfulness impressed me. The hotel service in general was excellent; staff anticipated our needs and greeted us with a smile (I wish I could see their smiles without masks too). I saw Hairul every day when I needed to ask for directions, a taxi, or just a bottle of water. He was very kind to assist quickly and clearly. Thank you, Lucinda, too, for the date of checking out; the way she was talking to us and settling the bill was very professional and helpful. Thank you so much for providing such individualized and

title: Strategic Hotel with good food and spacious room
desc: Strategic location near with shoping center and mrt station (Bugis). Spacious room and comfy. Really good food, experienced a very delicious food each morning at breakfast. Excellence and surely will comeback again. üëç

title: Excellent experience
desc: An amazing location, very helpfull staff, the room service team.are very helpfull. The welcoming every morning during the breakfast is wonderfull. I do recommend intercontinental for any person. I will come back again.

title: For those who are looking at wedding venues please choose Intercon!
desc: Held my wedding at Intercontinental and Sherlyn was my WC! üíñ Even though she only took over after i sign, she was really helpful and ensured everything went well. She handled my panicky questions and reassured me along the way (first time brideüòÖ). She even went out of the way to help me hang my decorations & etc hence my actual day was simply a breeze. Everyone sang praises for the whole set up! Thank u so much once again Sherlyn!

title: Disappointing
desc: My experience at this hotel was disappointing. The lobby area is nice, but once I got closer to my room, I was struck by how dated and worn everything was. The carpet was frayed and faded, and the smell in the hallways was musty. When I checked in, I was told I had two free dinners. But I wasn‚Äôt informed which restaurant offered the free dinners. When I found out which specific restaurant I needed to eat at to get the free meal, I got a reservation and ate dinner. I later found out only certain meals were free and I had to tell the waitress in advance to receive the free meal. Despite having two conversations with two different staff in advance of my meal, I was not informed of this stipulation. Obviously, this would have been good to know ahead of time. My room was never

title: Wedding lunch 27 Nov 2022
desc: Our wedding coordinator Hui San was exceptional. She was patient and detailed and guided us from the start to the end for our wedding preparation. The food was amazing, the chef and team took our feedbacks seriously during the food tasting. We also want to thank the banquet team, they were very helpful and made our day smooth and memorable. Special thanks to the following below: - Bqt In charge: Mugi & Hairul - Chef on duty: Chef Orlando Thank you!!

title: Another Wonderful Christmas Staycation
desc: Thank you to the Intercontinental Singapore for the wonderful 2-night staycay. This is the 3rd consecutive Christmas that we spent here. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Rollaway bed was available FOC upon request. Checking in by Fiona Gan was smooth and she captured my family‚Äôs stay preference to perfection. Special mention goes to the club team of Azhar, Anna Lau, Foo Wai Kit, Jia Yi, Yong Quan Quan, Swathi, Liyah, Hock Kim and Zin for their excellent service. Anna, Wai Kit and Jia Yi were extra attentive to our needs including that of our two children, making our stay feel extra special. For example, they remembered our favourite seats, children‚Äôs needs and breakfast orders. Their friendship and bespoke service are the main reasons that kept us coming back to

title: No respect of Diamond and ambassador and NO Services
desc: Was expected better services in Singapour , this Intercontinental , I book airport pickup ! No one to help me when I arrived h√¥tel with my bag !!! I am Ambassador and Diamond ! And no welcome I book a room in heritage building and they put me in big tower !!! And they said upgrade ! No way basic room with 2 more Square letter So no need to be Diamond and Ambassador here ! They don‚Äôt respect that or they lie !!!

title: Happy Staycation
desc: I have always loved to stay at Intercontinental Hotel cos of its classy look, cool ambiance, friendly staffs and good food. I would like to thank Fiona Gan Asst Guest Relations Manager for the kind arrangement on the room stay üëç. Highly recommended for the hotel and will come again soon.

title: All the movies are 2+ years old and cost $15
desc: Pay TV is limited and feels like it is much less than what Singapore offers. One of the channels is showing Bewitched from the 60s. No streaming. But there is Airplay and Chromecast on the TV... Toilet paper is only 2 ply No written guide to the hotel or anything. You have to turn on the TV to discover basic hotel info. And a QR code to see the room service menu. The fridge is empty. The TV remote is so old many buttons are no longer labeled, the labels have worn off. The desk had some remnants of melted chocolate on it. There is no pen or paper - branding opportunities wasted! Some positives: The aircon was on and set to 22. I never adjusted it. Ther room had a spaciousness with a feeling of grandeur, albeit it from the 70s This started as a few notes intended for

title: Lovely Stay at the Intercon!
desc: I had a wonderful stay at the Intercontinental! The staff is so kind and helpful. We were there for work and we felt very taken care of! The hotel is beautiful, my room was very comfortable and I appreciated the amenities. Shoutout to Prkash who helped me almost every day with setup. I would definitely go back!

title: Fantastic hotel in Singapour was incredible stuff and service
desc: One of my favorite hotels in Singapore! Although it was built relatively recently, it has been beautifully designed in the classical Peranakan style, making it a fantastic place to enjoy the heritage of the city. Staying in this hotel gives the impression of going 100 years in the past, while still enjoying all the amenities of the modern life. The hotel is located in Bugis, directly connected to the nearby shopping mall. Rooms are extremely comfortable, and the lounge is simply one of the best I have ever seen in any hotel worldwide. With amazing food and drinks offered to the guests. The hotel is relatively small, but rarely busy and quite nice pool overlooking the main library of the city. Very much appreciated the availability of Lynn, the Chief Concierge, which made this

title: Wedding day of Kai siang and Natasha
desc: The hotel room dining service was immaculate and the staff even called our room to confirm our order before preparing it! The room was really spacious and our bed was beautifully decorated with toweled made cranes and flower splattered all over the bed as a mark of our wedding day! Really grateful for the great hospitality by the hotel and it was a really awesome stay!

title: Wedding Experience
desc: Had my wedding at InterContinental, great to have Andereen and Mugilan‚Äôs assistance in making my life moments a success. Also would really like to give my thanks to the banquet staffs that assisted during the dinner service as well. Best services and assistance I have ever received.

title: A memorable family staycation
desc: We booked the suite with bunk beds and slides, and it didn't disappoint us. My children were screaming (with excitement) after they stepped into the room, and when kids are entertained.... well 50% of battle won on a holiday trip or staycation. Check ins and outs were smooth. service was great whether it was at the lobby or on our level, and also when we called and needed something. There were 2 TVs and so the kids don't need to fight with us adults also. We were also on the same level as the pool and that made going to the pool so easy as well. The galaxy night light and the fluffy toys plus the tent and all, really made their 3 days the best on 2022. Till now they are still talking about rewinding time to visit the hotel again. Thanks InterconSIN for a relaxing and memorable

title: Good hotel
desc: Positives - Clean. Friendly staff. Super convenient as surrounded by shops/restaurants on the streets and in a 'connection' of shopping malls. Centrally located with the metro station, Bugis, a couple of minutes walk away within air conditioned premises. Negatives. Sound proofing in rooms. Inexperience of staff

title: New Years Trip
desc: We stayed in Intercontinental Singapore for the New Year's celebrations. We had a good rest staying in a corner King room, as it‚Äôs very spacious. We also want to thank the housekeeping team that took good care of us by providing extra amenities in the room daily, especially the bottles of water and Nespresso coffee pods. We own a Nespresso machine at home, making us feel at home. We also enjoyed the buffet breakfast, which had many healthy choices, and they changed some dishes daily. The restaurant staff was also friendly and attentive, and we appreciate this. Direct access to Bugis mall and MRT is also a big plus; finding food for lunch and dinner was easy and convenient. We recommend this hotel to anyone and can‚Äôt wait to come back and stay again the next time we are in

title: TRULY 5 STARS HOTEL - COMPETING HEAD TO HEAD WITH RAFFLES HOTEL
desc: Colonial heritage style building, beautifully and meticulously maintained. Great location as its nestled in CBD Bugis Junction shopping area, ease of public transport (ie. above Bugis MRT station, numerous bus stops). Excellent gesture and professional staff from the moment you step in. From the door man, conciege, front desk, room service, dining staff and thumbs up from our family. Personal written welcoming cards and bowl of fruits greet us in our room. Great choice of breakfast selection, nicely taste food. But coffee can be improved, slight bitter notes - over roasted. Our room (#816) have a pool view and it looks interesting however we didn't have a chance to try the swimming pool or the gym. Excellent amenities, excellent in room fixtures and greatly maintained.

title: An excellent hotel in Singapore
desc: It has been a wonderful stay in this very nice hotel! our room is quite big and very comfortable, many selections for breakfast, shopping centers are just next door and all staff are very helpful and nice!

title: Another great stay
desc: Great traditional Singapore atmosphere, centrally located, and close to shops and restaurants. A G&T in the grand lounge is a must. The Club Lounge is also intimate and historically themed. Something special for families, couples or business.

title: Super helpful staff
desc: GIRLStaycation Hotel is truly 5star standard. :comfortable room Great bathroom Wonderful staff offering help all time Thanks! (Reception, bellboy, boy at lobby, lounge, restaurant) High T is only so so... Manager Mr Hayden Lam is super attentive.

title: Depreciated standard and quality
desc: Not sure if my expectation is too high, but I just can't imagine I was not able to watch any World Cup matches in this hotel despite there are five so-called sports TV channels. The check-in experience is also not so nice, for the wait is more than 20 minutes. Finally, I was served with a napkin with two holes at the breakfast restaurant. This really surprised me for a renowned hotel of this grade.

title: Great hotel in a great destination.
desc: Everything from check in to check out was an excellent experience. The staff are very helpful, competent and eager to please. The room was spacious and housekeeping kept everything spotless. Breakfast at the Club Lounge was very good with many options made to order and a nice selection of breads, pastries and fruits available for self service. In the evening the Club Lounge offered a selection of cocktails, wine and hot and cold canap√©s which changed every evening. Service in the Lounge was attentive and Assistant Manager Anna Lau keeps everything running smoothly while interacting with guests. Anna provides valuable hotel as well as local information. InterContinental Singapore is a five star hotel in a great location with excellent amenities. It will be my choice on any

title: My wonderful stay in Singapore
desc: ALL hotel staff are very polite, and I stayed in a comfortable and quite room. The food in-room dining was excellent. I like the old furniture there very much. I enjoyed the hotel life there every minutes.

title: Winner
desc: First class elegance. This hotel is classic‚Ä¶think Plaza hotel New York, Beverly Hills hotel‚Ä¶great area.. next to all shopping‚Ä¶ Elegant atmosphere and staff is FANTASTIC. They are there to please their guests. I will make this my new go to home in Singapore on future visits. Dorothy Wong‚Ä¶.my heart thanks you for your care and check in fun.

title: Above and Beyond
desc: The suite I stayed in was excellent. The service was of the highest quality. Everything was downright perfect, and the hotel staff helped me with getting a seat at its popular restaurant in a short notice. Five stars, if I may grade.

title: It‚Äôs a warm welcome @Intercontinental Singapore
desc: It was meant to be a yearly staycation at Intercontinental Singapore but this stay was the 4th for 2022! Why? Good location, rooms and suites are of right sizes and comfortable and the most important reason is the service from the staff! We were delighted that Ms Fiona Gan recognised us after checking in by her colleague. She made an effort to have a small conversation with us though she was occupied. For guests to recognise staff is much easier than staff to recognise guests but she did so and we already felt very welcome for the stay. We felt great to see familiar faces during this stay as well. The Heritage Suite allocated to us is clean, spacious and most of all very comfortable for both humans and my fur dog. The Club Lounge at level 2 is always our favourite place

title: Good food and service.
desc: I really like the service. But my girlfriend had allergies from staying in the room which I am allergic to air from the dust in the room as well. Clean and great room But carpet cleaning is not good. Until the allergic reaction to dust. Breakfast was delicious and varied, I miss you so much The service in every part until the cleaning staff is very good, greet each other every day. I only rate 4 stars. If will improve adding an air purifier or killing germs before the guest stays would be great.

title: Fantastic
desc: The hotel is situated in a great location for exploring and close to many restaurants and shops. The staff are extremely helpful and friendly and our room was lovely with lots of space and very comfortable beds. Our highlight was the breakfast which had a wide variety of international food.

title: Still just like coming home
desc: We've been coming back for decades, and have seen many changes, but it's always so good to be welcomed by familiar faces, and to receive the same fine service and facilities. The club lounge never disappoints.

title: Putting the stars in the 5 star
desc: I was greater by Lucinda who made my check in smooth and amazing. Through out my stay the staff were friendly, helpful and always went a mile. I had accidentally book a day earlier but staff were able to refund me for the extra night and put my worries to a rest. Couldn‚Äôt be any happier and proud to be a part of intercontinental membership and the pillow are the fluffiest I‚Äôve ever had!

title: Very pleasant staycaytion
desc: First time having a staycay at this hotel and it was definitely a very good experience. Checking in was smooth and the room was very nice and big. Would like to thank Ms Anna Lau and Mr Wayne Wong for assisting us! The pool area have a jaccuzi which we just stayed in and chilled. The high tea at the Club Lounge has a cozy environment and the food there was very nice too. This hotel is directly linked to Bugis Junction mall and Bugis MRT station, which make it very convenient.

title: Incredible hospitality
desc: Recently my partner and I made a booking for 2 nights, one using points and the other later on using cash which resulted in different rooms being assigned. Unfortunately my partner was hospitalised shortly and discharged and we decided to carry on with the stay. Upon checking in, Ms Fiona showed great empathy and consideration that moving rooms would be troublesome and inconvenient for us and she volunteered to assign the same room for both dates. Aside from the quantum difference from the upgrade, what we truly wish to commend is her meticulous care to the customers experience. Additionally the club experience was amazing, Mr Idah and his team took extremely good care of us and ensured we were as comfortable as possible. Intercontinental Singapore has always never failed to

title: A Good Place to Stay in Singapore
desc: I have been staying here in the past but since things have opened up I found them a bit pricey until recently. It is a lovely hotel and the rooms I stay seem to be in the heritage part. I got in early but the staff in the reception was kind enough to give me a room already which allowed me to rest. The bed and pillows are something you would expect from a first rate hotel; the staff are extremely helpful and the breakfast has a good spread. I was just a little disappointed that there was no hot water pot or complimentary coffee or tea. But that is minor and happy to give them an excellent rating.

title: Amazing experience
desc: Would like to give more stars if possible. Enjoyed my stay to the fullest. Rooms are nice and cozy. Everything was done very well. Special thanks to the club team who made my stay extra special for my partner and I. Thank you Qian Hui, Qian Qian, Waikit, and Azhar for hosting me and your wonderful service.

title: Pleasant Stay
desc: Hotel location is very nice (near to Bugis street), room and bathroom are spacious with all modern amenities. On my request, I got the room at 15th floor. Breakfast includes a variety of Indian food & local food.

title: Presidential suite experience
desc: The space was amazing, sauna and jacuzzi tub was great and service was impeccable. Stay one night in the presidential suite with my family for a birthday celebration and booked the adjoined room too. Great for big families and really appreciate the assistance given by the concierge and lounge as I had long meetings from 9 - 5pm but my family had an enjoyable time.

title: Excellence experience
desc: Very nice location. hotel is linked to shopping mall and bugis mtr station. also short walking distance to raffles city and chaimes. hotel is elegance style and offered such excellent & valued service!! hope I would stay at intercontinental singapore again.

title: Family vacation
desc: Our family spent vacation time here for Lunar new year. All services are good as reach as perfect level. All staffs provide us exceptional memory. We promiss to come back again surely in soon future. Thank you.

title: Wonderful events team and experience!
desc: Our organisation held a Lunar New Year lunch event on Day 4 of the festive period and we were very grateful for the impeccable service and assistance extended to us and our guests. The team took care of every detail along the way, from the planning stage till the end of the event. Most importantly, we appreciate the flexibility provided as we wanted some customisation to our chosen package. Though there were a handful of last minute changes, the team handled it very effectively and professionally. Overall, our guests enjoyed the lunch and also provided positive feedback about the venue. Thank you once again to the great team - Joyce, Shi Qi, Belvin, Mugi and all other staff involved in making the event a great success! We will certainly return again for our future events and

title: A staycation where the Hotel ensures the entire family enjoys. Furkids inclusive !
desc: brought my 2 little doggies along for this staycation. They were thrilled. What I like about the stay was that the hotel may not approve of my fur kids at the F and B area, as such they have allowed the breakfast to be delivered to our room instead. this way we don‚Äôt have to take turns to go for our breakfast! The room is excellent. In fact after checking in, I had almost 3 hotel staff knocking on my door to ask if we were settling down well. If we needed anything else ! Such fantastic service ! Good job Intercontinental!

title: Good experience
desc: The hotel is well maintained but the room lacks ventilation. The CNY decorations and music add to the festive mood. The breakfast crew starts sharply at 630am, good variety and is well served by Sanjay and team.

title: Club lounge exceeded expectations
desc: Great service from arrival to departure. We were in a Club room and the club lounge exceeded our expectations. Very welcoming especial to our five year old grandson. Dealt efficiently will an issue we had with the provider of our transfer back to the airport

title: Unsatisfied service for a Diamond and Ambassador Member
desc: We stayed during the Chinese New Year period and hotel is not running at full occupancy. However, room upgrade was only first accorded to a Standard Classic Room located on high floor and city view (which was a two-tier room upgrade). This should not be an appropriate upgrade for a Diamond and IHG Ambassador member when the hotel is not running at its full occupancy. This shows that the management is rather inflexible in treating its long-term members and rather focus on hotel revenue (as the IHG Ambassador desk offered an upgrade to a Heritage Suite at a nominal fee but when asked upon at the Front Desk, the Front Desk told me upgrade to a suite was not available.). If the hotel is running at full occupancy, it should not be selling on the hotel‚Äôs website like what other hotels

title: Finally back
desc: I have stayed at the Intercontinental Singapore several times per year for the last 10-15 years. However, due to the pandemic, I had not stayed since there since 2019 due to the pandemic so it was so nice to be back. I love it, good location, excellent facilities, super staff, from the porters to the Club Lounge.... This hotel is the definition of "home away from home". So yes I am already looking forward to my next visit.

title: 5* service
desc: I had a wonderful experience in the executive lounge during my stay . As I entered I was greeted warmly by Syahidah and was shown to my seat . Aisyah constantly came to the table to check on us and was very engaging . She even recommended drinks for us based on our preferences. Zin , who was the bartender I believe , did amazing drinks . Overall I had a wonderful time at the club and felt very pampered . Definitely would come again !

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: My wife and I have returned to this hotel on several occasions as we‚Äôve always enjoyed the experience. The rooms we‚Äôve been allocated have always been of a good standard, and have very comfortable beds. The standard of service is very high and most staff are accommodating in meeting our needs.

title: My most favorite hotel in Singapore
desc: My most favorite hotel in Singapore for more than 10 years. Staff have been friendly and helpful all the time in every way to make my stay satisfactory. Conveniently located at Middle Road to go to famous Clarke Quay, Marina Bay, etc. Chinese Restaurant at 2nd floor was fantastic, a Michelin-recommended. Beijing Duck, Abalone, Lobster and Bird's Nest in style. Will come back this hotel again soon.

title: An unforgettable stay
desc: This wonderful hotel has everything going for it. We had an unforgettable six night stay. The location is excellent. Whilst it is not near Marina Bay it is connected to the Bugis Junction shopping centre and metro station which gives you fast and efficient access to any of the major sites in the city. It is also an easy transfer from here to the airport by either road or rail. We had room 1519 which was sumptuous. It had a large king bed and a useful lounge, desk and side tables. All of the cabinetry was either beautiful timber or lacquered paint work and the soft furnishings evoked the Singapore cultural theme. It was probably one of the best hotels we had stayed in for the cultural attention to detail. We were pleasantly surprised at the air con which was already switched on

title: Stay at Intercontinental Hotel, Middle Road, Singapore
desc: Our stay at the Intercontinental Hotel, Middle Road, Singapore was excellent. The wonderful assistance at the Concierge Desk (Lynne was especially helpful) considerably enhanced our time in Singapore, as did the the helpful staff on arrival and whenever we required a taxi. Our room was kept very clean. Altogether a first class stay and we would be happy to return.

title: satisfying service, but VERY UNSTABLE WIFI
desc: my plane arrived very early (7 am) yet i was able to get a complimentary early check in with my ihg diamond ambassador membership. breakfast was delicious, they lend you umbrellas, and overall their service was highly satisfying. However the wifi was VERY UNSTABLE in my room and it kept on disconnecting itself. i had to take my laptop to the lobby for business. if you're coming to this hotel as a business trip i think you should keep this in mind. everything else was great so i'll still give a 4 out of 5

title: Pleasant stay! Excellent location.
desc: Excellent location. On duty manager was so helpful and considerate. We were given check in to our room 4 hours early as we are diamond member of IHG hotels. There is a direct way from hotel lobby to go to Bugis junction. Mcdonalds is literally at the corner of the hotel. Marina by the bay is 30mins walk from hotel. We went every where by walk. Every place is so accessible on foot. We also borrowed umbrellas from hotel instead of buying them. Breakfast buffet had large variety. Specially the selection of fruits. The staff was very nice. We had a pleasant stay.

title: Amazing hotel - a special gem inside and out!
desc: I reached out to the hotel prior to the arrival of my 86 year old father and his 85 year old partner - just asking if they could make sure that they are comfortable, as this is their last trip to Asia. I am so, so grateful for the hospitality extended by the hotel - swan towel decoration when they arrived, making sure they had a fabulous room, and helping to provide a fabulous doctor to address a cold. This is a classic hotel that knows so well how to take care of its guests - make each one feel special and welcome. The rooms are gorgeous, the staff is attentive, and the location is excellent. What a great hotel!

We enjoyed our recent stay at this property. Great ambience with excellent services all round, and in particular at the Club Lounge and also at the Chinese Restaurant. Great breakfast selection and nice relaxing pool area

title: Singapore stopover
desc: Excellent location , easy access to metro system or could just walk around Singapore . next to a shopping mall for anything may need plus loads of restraunts around to add to there own.. Hotel is awesome inside everything you need from a Intercontinental . Had the Club lounge which is brilliant , staff very attentive , cocktail hours in a great setting great place to unwind , breakfast also first class not rushed . Hotel allowed a late check out prior to late flight to uk which was much appreciated .

title: A wonderful experience
desc: The hotel and house keeping staff was completely awesome. Nora, Anna, Safina and Dora made sure my staff took care of me and made my stay wonderful. They always greated me with a smile and ask how I was doing to see if I was having a good or bad day because they were there to listen if they had time and they made me feel as if I was home.

title: A great 2-night staycat(yay)ion!
desc: This was meant to be a 2-night staycation to celebrate my boyfriend's birthday. It was a great relaxing stay, that went smoothly from check-in to check-out. We got a room immediately on arrival (at ~3 pm), and the front desk staff automatically accredited to me every benefit that was tied to my Ambassador account (including welcome drinks and the late check-out until 4 pm). He also explained everything I didn't know (the US$20 dining-in credit for the stay). This should be how check-in should be for hotel loyalty members, instead of having guests having to ask which I have experienced under other hotel chains. The room was well (bigger)-sized and comfortable (even though it was more dated for this older property compared to InterContinental Robertson Quay). Everything was

title: Where else would you want to say
desc: Due to Covid we had waited over three years to return to this lovely hotel, a heritage landmark in the Bugis region, close to all the shops and the MRT. Staff are wonderful, polite, friendly very attentive. Nothing is too much trouble for them. The room is spacious, great aircon, bathroom was lovely, towels were white and fluffy. The shower was a little on the small side and had a smell of stagnant water, also all the paint on the ceiling was peeling off. TV had poor channels on it but having said that we didn‚Äôt go to the hotel to stay in and watch TV! There‚Äôs a fridge and a coffee machine with coffee pods. The hotel also provides free bottle of water. The bed and pillows are very comfortable, great lighting, there are ports next to your bed so you can charge your phone

title: Highly recommended.
desc: Very gracious and accommodating hotel with courteous and efficient front desk staff. They made allowances for an early check-in and late check-out (to assist with air travel times). Rooms were spotless and luxurious.

title: a quality stay
desc: excellent stay, outstanding service, well worth the stay, conveniently located to Bugis Junction eating establishments which are unmatched for value for money, matches the efficiency of Singapore

title: ÁÑ°ËàáÂÄ´ÊØîÁöÑ‰∫´ÂÆ¥ÔºåÂÄºÂæóÂÜçÊ¨°Âõû‰Ωè
desc: From the check-in to the guest room, Safina do a wonderful job of explain and introduce the hotel's facilities and location, until the elevator closes the door. Although this is also a hotel with years, the equipment in the room is the same There is no "sense of the times" at all, but it keeps pace with the times. Needless to say, it is clean and hygienic. At the time of stay in The Club InterContinental Lounge, I was deeply moved.(An elegant ambience that really reflects the A legacy of early Singapore; warm service from staff services. ÔºàSpecial thanks to Murni and Chef Savari) A short review cannot fully bring out all my feelings, only said that this experience made me very happy, and I will come to Singapore next time ,InterContinental Singapore must be my first choice for

title: Great experience
desc: The vegan high tea was fantastic. Being a vegetarian I have always wanted a wonderful environment with vegan choice. So glad found this. Mr Hayden, the lounge lobby manager was simply awesome,pleasant and provided excellent service. Checked on us frequently and offered options. Great job. Geberally all staff were very plesant.

title: All round superb
desc: First time visiting since covid and what a pleasure it was to return to this wonderful hotel. From the efficient staff in keeping your room very clean and tidy, the reception staff providing help when required to the first rate staff in the club room. It was a joy returning to this hotel on our way to Australia. On our way back home, my wife and I have already agreed to rebook for a few days before flying home to to Scotland.

title: WONDERFUL HOTEL FROM A REPUTED CHAIN
desc: Excellent hotel, wonderful room and good housekeeping service. Only disturbance was the tour groups, who do not behave very cultured, are very lod and very often interrupting. Will definitely stay at this hotel on my next visit to Singapore

title: Event at Intercontinental SG
desc: We held an event today at Bras Basah Function Room. The team lead by Mr Hairul has greatly assisted in our request and ensure smooth execution of our seminar. A big shout-out to Mr Belvin for coordinating our extra this extra that arrangements. THANK YOU!

title: Heritage Suite with Outdoor Poach for Pet - Not worth and do not recommend!
desc: Heritage Suite with Outdoor Poach cost $758 taxes not included yet per night. It was extremely noisy as the Suite was located on the 3rd floor could hear childten running screaming, adults talking till late in the night! The King sized bed & the rollaway bed were hard and noisy! Pillows were completely flat without any support! The shower area where the drainage portion was choked and water was slow in flowing which was unhygiene! During Housekeeping the staff didn't replenish the toileteries and bottled water which the guests needed to constantly request for these?! On the IHG Bugis website it was indicated toileteries for Suites come in 100ml while the regular rooms come in 50ml, however this was not true as all the Bath Gel, Shampoo, Conditioner, etc were in 30ml sizes! Which

title: Perfect stay in every way
desc: Our first contact with the staff was one of care, professionalism, helpful and generous with their attention. Our room was well appointed, clean and very comfortable. All amenities - pool, restaurants, bar - were enjoyable and faultless service. The hotel is next to the train, food, shopping and a walk to Kampong Glam, Chjimes and other attractions. We used the train extensively and the tourist transport pass is a must if you want to get around in the heat. The breakfast was outstanding and sets you up for the day. We asked for an extended check-out time and were astounded at the generosity and service at enabling this request - in fact Inn went out of her way to enquire further and extended it a bit more! So impressed with the staff and this would be our very first choice for

title: Lovely oasis in the hustle and bustle of Singapore
desc: The staff are always v welcoming and helpful. The club lounge is an especially serene and comfortable break from the hustle and bustle of Singapore. They have lovely tea tray that includes little snippets of the traditional snacks and food that Singapore has and the staff are always friendly. Through the years I have always enjoyed our stopover in Singapore and the intercontinental has always been the right place to stay.

title: Excellent serv
desc: Staff all provide willing and wonderful service and hotel benefits from a lovely and calm atmosphere. Hotel benefits from good position within walking distance of Marina Bay and conveniently just a short distance to Bugis MTR.

title: A wonderful vacation
desc: We have just had a wonderful stay at the Intercontinental Singapore. Our suite was amazing and the Club lounge experience was excellent. Thank you to the wonderful staff for our very enjoyable experience. We highly recommend the Sunday brunch at Luce and the very talented musicians playing during the brunch. The Chinese New Year Lion Dance was an added highlight to our visit.

title: Better than expected
desc: We had a great stay here and taken care by Aisyah and her team at the level 2 club. My wife and I enjoyed the afternoon and evening there but we missed the breakfast as we choose to sleep in. Room service should be an option for those who prefers more privacy and to be in the comfort of their own room. But we still had a good time.

title: Good experience coupled with good services
desc: Rooms are clean. Beds are are nice. Pillows are fluffy. Staffs are very attentive to our needs. Location is tip top right in the heart of the shopping district in Singapore. Food is good. Furnishing is nice

title: Wedding banquet
desc: Stefanie and Boon Wee were an amazing team that helped make our wedding day unforgettable. Stefanie, our wedding coordinator, was organized, attentive, and always available to answer any questions we had. She helped us plan every detail of the day, from the timeline to the decor, and made sure everything ran smoothly. We felt so at ease knowing that she was there to handle everything. Boon Wee, our banquet manager, was equally impressive. He was professional, courteous, and went above and beyond to make sure that our guests were comfortable and well taken care of. He was always on top of things and made sure that the food and drinks were served promptly and to everyone's satisfaction. Together, Stefanie and Boon Wee were an incredible team that exceeded our expectations. They

title: Serive is top-notch!
desc: The location is perfect and convenient by having a lot of food stalls, shopping malls, and iconic spots surrounded within walkable distance. The best part of the hotel is plenty of services my from staffs especially from "Miss Jenny and her team" which I met at the hotel restaurant during breakfast time. I lost a stopper of my earring which is really a small stuff and hard to find on the floor of the restaurant. I had tried to find it by myself for a few minutes before Miss Jenny and colleagues noticed and asked me what I was looking for. After that they kept findinf for me even I told them many time that they did not have to find it because it is truly understandable that a chance to find it on the restaurant floor durinf the peak hour of breakfast time was almost zero. I

title: Outstanding In Every Way !! LOVE this hotel !!
desc: We recently had a 2 week stay at this hotel last month while visiting our son in Singapore. We arrived after a very long 24 hour flight, two extremely weary travellers and our first impression as we rounded the circular driveway was how absolutely stunning this hotel is architecturally. We were greeted warmly and our luggage was off loaded quickly and before you knew it we were checked in, and escorted to our lovely, lovely room. This hotel is nothing short of magnificent. We opted for a junior suite and the floor to ceiling windows opened up to the most beautiful skyline of Singapore.The room was absolutely stunning and the bathroom was very well appointed. The bed was so comfortable and the linens were luxuriously soft. We chose to opt into their breakfast program and it

title: Real five-star and worths for money
desc: No 1 hotel in Singapore, I always choose to stay as a second home, statffs here are so friendly and professionally. I generally stay here almost a month each visit, I do enjoy a lot. I recommend this hotel will be your right choice if you look for a location which is in the heart of the city, this is the real five-star hotel indeed.

title: Easy Pick
desc: I am so happy I stayed at this place, I didn't bother trying any other hotel in Singapore and came back on my next visit. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The location is central to most of the big tourist spots and also close to public transit and a shopping center. The room is large and well-provisioned. The breakfast is incredible and took multiple days to try everything.

title: Brilliant stay
desc: Just a superb experience from beginning to end. There were no negatives at all. From checking in to checking out, all went smoothly and we were very well looked after. The Club Lounge was a delight, as were staff. We shall be making a return visit as soon as can be arranged and we are looking forward to it immensely.

title: Holiday of Lifetime
desc: A1 from start to finish: Customer Service was excellent and when we asked to change the pillows was done in 2 minutes Ideally situated and only 5 minutes to Metro and 2 minutes to Mall Breakfast was top quality and very reasonably priced Would highly recommend for both business and pleasure

title: Great room helpful concierge
desc: I really liked this hotel. Good vibe, good location and feels good to be there. Good balance between modern and tradition. The room was superb. Great comfort and space. And the concierge team - Lynn and Ronnie were most helpful. I will stay again when in Singapore.

title: Exceptional level of service by Andereen Ang
desc: I want to commend Intercontinental Hotel (Andereen Ang) for her exceptional attention to detail and her commitment to the service provided to clients. I am Amelia, a Relationship Manager with Citi, dealing with Mainland Chinese clients. Our bank has a preferential rate agreement with many hotels in Singapore, one of it is your hotel. Ever since China opened up in Jan, I have had clients flying to Singapore regularly, requesting us to book hotels for them. My client was here from 8 Feb to 14 Feb 2023. Out of the many hotels we worked with, the client eventually chose to stay with Intercontinental, and I would say one of the key deciding factors would be because of Andereen and how she won the client over. My client only decided to fly in only on the evening of 6 Feb. Hence,

title: Avoid For Dayuse, worst Stay I have Ever Had
desc: We had a 12 hour layover between flights so booked a dayrate room, the picture on the dayuse website was for a standard room, so was the description. This is not the room you get, instead we were taken up one flight of stairs to a keycard door on the left, behind here was a row of rooms down a dark corridor with old carpet, this was as good as it got. The room had a stale smell, the furnishings were very old, maybe 20 years old. The bathroom was mouldy, we could not use the shower. There was a dripping sound in the bedroom, the bed linen did not smell fresh, really horrible. My husband had stayed here on business a few times and was shocked that the hotel would have rooms like this. We spoke to reception and complained, she shrugged and said that's were they put dayrate guests.

title: Excellent !!!!
desc: Perfect location. We can approach to many popular attractions in Bugis area. The room was very clean and beautiful. Staff was very friendly and attentive. I had a problem with visa card for making a payment and staff was very helpful to help. Thanks Aiman & Zul for making our stay wonderful. We definately will come back !!!

title: Clean, good service, variety of nice breakfast buffet, and convenient location.
desc: I stayed at InterContinental Hotel on Middle Road at Bugis from 8th to 17th February 2023 during my business trip and I had a very good experience. Staffs are friendly and helpful, breakfast buffet includes many choices of delicious foods. Location is connect to Bugis junction, which you can enjoy many affordable local foods and some shopping. I can't wait to stay there again.

title: Great service from Mugilan, Lionel and Alice.
desc: Great service from Mugilan, Lionel and Alice. They are very welcoming when we arrive. They are always very attentive throughout the event for the last 2 days. We are very happy with the level of service, cleanliness and readiness of the event room. We hope to come back again and thank you for going the extra mile in giving us the best service. Mugilan lead his team so well.

title: Wonderful anniversary stay
desc: One of the best hotel stay with comfy beds, rooms, food. Best club lounge ever. Love it. The breakfast spread is the best and love the staffs who are forever great despite being super busy with the large crowds! Thanks to all for my happy weekend stay ! ;) with anniversary celebrations!

title: Great Hotel with Luxury Feel
desc: The hotel is in a good location. Has excellent service. Warm front desk staff. Employees are pleasnt throughout. The rooms are very comfortable in size and accommodations. The bed was comfortable and had lots of pillows. The bathroom has high-end furnishings with marble throughout. The only setback is the chairs at the pool need to be replaced as they're very worn out and uncomfortable to sit in. The hardware protrudes through the fabric - unbearable to sit. And the carpets on the catwalks that connect the buildings are faded and have visible water stains. Outside of those 2 items, it's truly a great hotel with a luxury feel.

title: Workshop
desc: Great service and great support from the banquet staff. Staff was very helpful from the moment I step in from setup to the end of session. The service provided was excellent. Really appreciate the support especially when we needed changes in the meal orders. Thank you.

title: Lost of wallet
desc: I lost my wallet when dining at Intercontinental.I am grateful that the service team is very helpful and go all out to help me search for my wallet. A very big shout out to Rozita Bte Ahmad Rosdin and her TEAM for the help.

title: Wedding Lunch at Grand Ballroom
desc: Just had the most wonderful and amazing experience at Intercontinental (Bugis) for our wedding. There are so many people we would like to thank for making our big day run smoothly and so much more special than we could imagine. Stefanie our wedding coordinator was so friendly, understanding and patient with all our concerns and requests. Despite having to manage so many couples' weddings, she was very responsive and helpful particularly in the days leading up to the wedding when things were hectic for us. The entire interaction was always pleasant and every sudden concerns/hiccups were resolved promptly and without stress. I'm so thankful that we got to work with Stef and was very reassured that our wedding was in good hands. Our AD banquet manager Selva and his team were

title: Well rested
desc: The room is classic and the bed is so good, I slept very well. The staffs at the Club are very nice, and looked after us all the time. I love the breakfast very much, from eastern to western food are all included.

title: Love it.
desc: Love the hotel the location the staff and particularly the staff in the Club Lounge. Room allocation a little disappointing however I have had that noted by the hotel Can highly recommend Intercontinental Singapore. It is a great spot with wall to wall cafes in abundance in the locality

title: Generous rooms and classic five star
desc: No issues with this hotel from checkin thru to checkout. Large high ceiling rooms, corridors and common areas. The club lounge very well run with generous offerings and great service. Well located close to lots of shops and close to the off ramp from the airport.

title: 1st time stay but surely not going to be the last‚Ä¶
desc: Everything is so great in this hotel in terms of equipped gym, room cleanliness and comfort, brilliant food taste except there‚Äôs some renovation ongoing in Bugis Junction Mall which bringing some annoying noise into The Breakfast Room

title: 5 star service from the Wedding‚Äôs Team
desc: Just want to give a shout out to the Weddings Team at InterContinental Singapore for being so patient with our requests and queries! Although sadly we wouldn‚Äôt be having our wedding here (due to dates being unavailable) I still want to give a honourable mention to the team Stefanie & Nicole I believe! They were so very patient with all the enquiries and their response time is impeccable.

title: Short business Trip
desc: Intercontinental Hotel never disappoint me! Anywhere I go, I always prefer intercontinental hotel as my first consideration! Love their service, food, room, etc and their personalise services always make me feel so comfortable!

title: Valentine's staycation
desc: During my staycation, Magen and the teams are very friendly and helpful in their services. The room is very clean and comfortable. It was a great staycation and we enjoyed it so much. Will revisit the hotel again.

title: Man Fu Yuan. 10/10!
desc: I went to InterContinental Hotel Singapore‚Äôs Chinese Restaurant, Man Fu Yuan. The servers that day were Benjamin and Joanne. They were super friendly, constantly checking up on my family and I to see if we were okay and needed anything else. The food was also really good! Super delicious and flavourful! Thank you Man Fu Yuan, Benjamin and Joanne for the awesome food and service, it really made my grandmother‚Äôs birthday celebration all the more special!

title: Super location
desc: We are platinum Accor members and have no status with IHG but they had a great deal that made this hotel better value and thus we have just completed a 4 night stay in a Junior Suite. The location of the hotel in Bugis is fantastic, close to the MRT and countless restaurants and shops. Our room was quite nice, quiet and had a great shower and bathroom. Lounge furniture was not very comfortable. Bed and pillows are superb. Amenities and water topped up daily, and very generous with the water bottles. Had minimal interaction with the staff but when we did they were extremely polite and obliging. This hotel would be 5 stars except the biggest let down for us was the price of dining / drinking in house. Morning coffee was $30 for two cappuccinos and these were not barista

title: So glad to have been back at the Intercontinental Simngapore
desc: Another Great Stay at the Intercontinental Singapore. The Club staff are fantastic, can not do enough for you and ensure that your stay is comfortable and relaxing. It is impossible to name one particular person as everyone made you feel like an honoured guest. The room was serviced so well with everything being done to make the room feel like the first time you walk. inThis is the first trip post Covid and will not be the last.

title: Fantastic Stay and Great Location!
desc: This was a great stay from first day till the last day. We got off the cruise ship around 9am and the hotel staff was gracious enough to let us check in earlier than noon. The room was on the 12 th floor and was fantastic. Beautiful high ceilings, great mattress and bed, huge bath and separate shower with great towels and accessories. The room was cleaned so nicely everyday I wish we could have stayed longer than our 4 nights. The location is unbeatable, close to Bugis MRT station(possibly an indoor 3-4 minute walk), there is a mall adjacent to the hotel without having to walk outside, bus stops are in front of the hotel on Victoria St and many taxis and grab taxis are readily available. We did a short leisure 15 minute walk to the Merlion. I will definitely stay here

title: Thank you Nora and Abhishek
desc: What makes this Intercontinental special is its people. My wife and I arrived in advance of the usual checkout time bedraggled and somewhat the worse for wear. We were greeted at the desk by Nora who was, to say the least, an absolute breath of fresh air. She told us that our room would not be ready for another short period of time that she would expedite it being available and then she took us to a quiet area where we could sit and catch her breath and then she made sure that we had access to the Internet and had some nominal refreshment. Shortly thereafter, again, while waiting for our room we went to have a little lunch and that is when we were taken under the wing of Ambishek. I think that he sensed how thoroughly exhausted we were and gave us good suggestions for a noon

title: Wedding Celebration at Intercontinental Singapore
desc: Celebrated our wedding at Intercontinental Singapore. The wedding planning went smoothly, especially with the help of our wedding coordinator Ester. The wedding event went well too thanks to banquet manager Fiona! Would recommend this hotel for others considering their wedding venue as the pet friendly hotel has accommodating staff with great service. Thank you once again and looking forward to our next stay.

title: Amazing Wedding in Intercontinental!
desc: We held our wedding dinner banquet at Intercontinental Bugis and the experience was amazing! Wedding planning is a stressful and tiring process but special shout-out to our wedding coordinator, Ester, who is extremely pleasant to deal with and super responsive and proactive! She ensured that we met the required timelines and was very accommodating to many of our requests all in the thought of creating our perfect wedding so we are truly appreciative of her efforts which was essential in the success of our wedding event! Also big thank you to the banquet manager, Selva, the AV team (Janson, Boon Wee and all the rest we didn‚Äôt manage to meet) and the rest of the banquet team for having everything under control and briefing us every step of the way to ensure we know what‚Äôs coming

title: Luxury and service‚Ä¶‚Ä¶worth returning
desc: We stayed six nights at this wonderful hotel. The Junior Suite was quite spacious and beautiful. The Club Lounge was amazing - fantastic breakfasts! And decent afternoon tea and cocktail nibbles if you so desire. Cocktails are quite expensive in Singapore due to their very high consumption tax on alcohol so if you are looking to stretch, then have a cocktail or two here before heading out to dinner. However, Singapore has many of the Top 100 bars in the world so you might be missing some great cocktail experiences. We really liked everything about this hotel but the service is truly exceptional. Anna, Vernon and Joseph in the Club were delightful and Fiona, the Ambassador representative, took fantastic care of us. This was our first trip to Singapore and we came with some

title: All staffs are very cordial. Specially Josephine front desk back office, Abhishek lounge restaurant, Charmaingne front
desc: Hotel centrally located. Clean rooms. All staffs are very cordial, helpful and hospitable. Specially we would like to mention the names of - Josephine of front desk back office who took special care for our Suhor dining ( Ramadan time) and other requirements during our stay. Charmagne of front office was very helpful and caring. Abhishek of lounge lobby restaurant who took good care of us when we dine in the restaurant. Also mentionable is the room cleaner whom we found very immaculate in his work and always smiling whenever we met him.

title: A luxury experience, providing an oasis in the heart of Singapore.
desc: We have visited this hotel in the past, and will continue to return, because it is simply one of the best hotels we have stayed in. We always pay extra for the club, which is exceptional value. The staff are very attentive and always aim to please, which just enhances the sense of wellbeing during our stay.

title: Fantastic hotel and service. Recommend.
desc: Everything about this hotel was superb! We had a suite with lounge access and it was the best lounge experience we‚Äôve ever had. Fantastic! Would defo recommend when visiting Singapore. The staff were excellent. Nothing too much trouble. Breakfast. Afternoon yea and evening drinks and snacks in lounge.

title: Remains one of favorite hotels in the world!
desc: This was our third stay at the IHG Singapore on Middle Road in the last 10 years. It is not only our favorite hotel in Singapore, but one of our favorites in the whole world. It‚Äôs centrally located with easy access to the whole city by inexpensive taxis or metro, and there are a lot of excellent restaurants within walking distance. The Bugis shopping center next door makes it easy to pick up supplies from a supermarket and drug stores before a cruise. It‚Äôs walkable to the Little India and Sultan Mosque neighborhoods. The staff is absolutely the best, friendliest, and most helpful you will find anywhere. Our room had been recently updated and was very comfortable for a 5 day stay. Most highly recommended!

title: I visited Singapore for two days with my family.
desc: Very good location, with excellent service and a nice breakfast with a wide variety of food, especially local dishes. The concierge team was great. The room was comfy and with nice views to the city. Excellent gym. I would definitely repeat and I highly recommend this hotel.

title: The best Intercontinental hotel
desc: Travelling on global business I always use IHG, and when available, stay at Intercontinental hotels - this one is on the top of my list having stayed for a vacation break after a cruise. Great staff, and located about 200m from the metro. Will definitely be back

title: Our wedding experience
desc: Had a wedding at Intercontinental Bugis. Loved the ballroom and foyer staircase location. Food by Man Fu Yuan restaurant was great. Stefanie (our hotel sales coordinator) did a great job for us to make sure our wedding was smooth too! ü•≥

title: Good Business Hotel
desc: This is a nice hotel at Bugis Junction, with an integrated shopping center and also many places to go out in the walking distance. The hotel is very lovely, and the services are excellent. Breakfast was mixed - lots of selection, 1-2 good breaks, coffee okay. The rooms are okay but not great (compared to Fullerton or Sofitel). They are super boring. I couldn't tell if this was Singapore or New York. If you like these professional and somewhat boring business hotel rooms, you are ok there. I even tried the Peranakan room style, but again boring setup, but with wooden floors vs carpet.

title: Wonderful Return!
desc: I returned to stay at InterContinental Singapore after a decade long gap since my last stay and it was wonderful to see this hotel has retained its high level of service, comfort and traditional Singaporean charm. My 4 night stay was seamless and as an InterContinental Ambassador member, each step of my stay was perfect. I travelled with my parents and the team were very good at placing us in rooms on the same floor in addition to upgrading my room to a junior suite. This room was lovely with so much space, a very comfortable bed and lovely bathroom. Housekeeping was very good during the entire stay with a high level of attention given to maintaining a high level of cleanliness. The concierge team were also super efficient on arrival and departure with our taxi arrangements

title: All around excellence in Singapore
desc: I had the pleasure of staying at the interCon Singapore for a business trip and had an excellent experience - great location, well-appointed room and top-notch service. The highlight of my stay was enjoying the amenities in the club lounge, especially the breakfast buffet and evening canapes. The lounge staff consistently went above and beyond and always greeted us by name. Special thanks to Anna Lau for making us feel like VIPs. Will definitely return during my next visit to Singapore.

title: Pleasant Stay and Dining Experience
desc: Enjoyable stay and dining experience. We made sure to experience the various features of the hotel. Lobby Lounge for high tea, Man Fu Yuan for Sunday dimsum and the Club Lounge (Breakfast, tea and canapes). Anson, Nur Aisyah, Hayden and Dora lead way. Great overall experience and the teams at the various food outlets were accommodating, personable and very friendly.

title: Thumbs up to club
desc: We had no regrets paying extra to try the club experience at intercontinental. The food and service all excellent. From morning to evening, it is always a wonderful time. We especially loved the soup that had the cocktail prawn at the side, it was so creamy and delicious we asked for a larger bowl. Thank you to the entire team for always going the extra mile to ensure we are taken care of. No matter when, they always finding time to pause and chat about our day. Great job to aisyah, idah, anna, afza, hockim, zin, joseph. I am sorry if we missed out to name anyone else.

title: An amazing week in a world class hotel.
desc: The Intercontinental Hotel Singapore in Bugis is the perfect place to stay. It rates 5 stars for colonial architectural appeal, happy smiling staff, as well as check in and check out technique. We (my wife and I ) had a fall on the first day of our visit ‚Ä¶and the hotel couldn‚Äôt do enough to assist with moral, help and support, ice bags and kind attention, for our bruised egos and bodies!! Our heartfelt thanks to Ronnie and Lucinda. The lounge area has breakfast, high tea and light supper in the evenings, with a very attentive staff‚Ä¶Zin, Afza and Executive Chef Kenny Chung, all providing service fit for a king!

title: Best hospitality &best property
desc: It was a family holiday so wanted to go for the best & really got the best experience @InternContinental. Right from check In everything was taken care of by Mr.Shirish, thanks to him for the warm welcome. Each & every hotel staff is well trained to take care of you, all this is under the guidance of Mr.Shirish, got an opportunity to meet & greet him what a humble man he is. Coming the restaurant food is also really good,the rooms are spacious and they have a shopping complex within the yard,which no hotel in Singapore has I guess. Everything was perfect. Thanks

title: Warm and welcoming
desc: Intercontinental delivers service, hospitality, and location. This hotel has been a favorite of mine over the last 20 years, architecturally the juxtaposition between the original row houses that are incorporated into the historic wing of the hotel adjacent to Bugis Junction against the modern tower is interesting. The fact that this is not on Orchard is in many ways a plus as the Arab district is within walking distance and the MRT is less than a 5 min walk for you to go downtown. Highly recommend booking with lounge access as the breakfast is an excellent way to start the day and the cocktail hour in the evening is a great way to wind down for the day.

title: Service (sub optimal lunch experience)
desc: Poor experience at the Lounge Lobby at Intercontinental. At at 5-star hotel, I am surprised that food ordering requires that you have a smart phone to scan and order for your food. I wonder what if there are guests whom English is not the first language or do not have a smartphone? When asked, the staff said this was implemented during the pandemic period. I further questioned that since pandemic is over, why this was not removed. And I also question how they had consider inclusive of different guests that may not necessary have a smart phone or people whom cannot read English. No answer.

title: We will be back
desc: We were there for our short vacation before we come back to UK . We have been here before as well and as always the place is very nice and people there makes it much enjoyable specially in Club lounge. All the staff in club was great and hospitable and always ready to do anything for u even before u look for anyone to ask they approach u . We met Mr. Shirish and enjoyed chatting with him daily , good sense of humor and i wish him luck with his new journey. Fatin and way kit was also very good , sorry dont remember all the names. We will be back again for sure.

title: Wish we could stay longer
desc: This may seem like an old hotel but their lobby is absolutely grand with huge chandeliers and high ceiling. There is an easy access to the shopping mall. The bed is one of the comfortable ones we have slept on. Toiletries could be better. Breakfast at luce had a great spread and variety. Evening at club was relaxing and lovely. Overall, a pleasant stay with great service all around. Jason Mae Wayne Yusof Seungwan Aisyah are very attentive and pampered us well. We had to force ourselves to leave but we will be back.

title: The Lobby Lounge: Where we could find Julius Meinl coffee in tropical Singapore!
desc: I was at InterContinental Singapore and decided to order a Flat White from The Lobby Lounge. What a wonderful surprise when I saw that the coffee was from Julius Meinl. Here is where we could find the Julius Meinl brand of coffee right here in Singapore. The presentation of the coffee is beyond expectations, and comes with a biscuit. Add a glass of drinking water and the entire experience would have been totally perfect! The Mozart Balls display and the Juiius Meinl coffee remind me fondly of the times when I was travelling in Austria. The ambience at The Lobby Lounge has been cosy and I like the light background music played. Service has been good. The staff looked smart and well-dressed. I spoke to one of the staff, Hayden, and learnt that Julius Meinl brand of coffee is

title: Another amazing stay
desc: My family and I stayed at Intercontinental Singapore during a recent family holiday. We have stayed at this hotel on numerous occasions and totally love the experience. It is in a great location with the MRT right on your doorstep which makes it so easy to travel around Singapore. We had two rooms and as we are all ambassador members we were given an upgrade to junior suites. The rooms were lovely and spacious and spotlessly clean as is the whole hotel. We enjoyed the service provided by club intercontinental, Zin the guest experience ambassador provided us with expectional service.
