Everything about club intercontinental is special from the surroundings to your greeting on arrival and each time you return. Breakfast was lovely with lots of options, afternoon tea delicious and

title: Great family
desc: Service was simply excellent. We arrived after a long flight very early (6:30am) and thanks to the team who got in touch before our arrival had organised a room for us. This allowed our family to shower, rest and have some space to keep our stuff while we explored the sights near the hotel. From the cleanliness of the room, the quality of the food and hotel to the service from staff. We had no issues whatsoever during our stay. The staff were always genuine, courteous, professional and very helpful. We will be back!

title: Fantastic Service - Great Event Space!
desc: Having planned events across multiple venues locally and abroad - I was truly pleased with the support given to my team throughout the 3 days we have held an event at the Intercontinental Singapore Ballroom. From the Sales team - Hui San, to the BQT team, Selva, Boon Hui, Auntie Bock Keck and Manav, and even the AV team.. they have shown a strong desire to cater to our requirements, and my guests‚Äô needs. Thank you so much team! PS: Ballroom could use a refresher, but nevertheless - did not affect my impression of the team.

title: A fantastic long weekend
desc: We had another wonderful stay at the intercontinental hotel Bugis. We had two rooms booked and when we arrived we were greeted and recognized as being a ihg member. We were given a upgrade on our room. The beds are so very comfortable and a nice large room. We had a club room so we got afternoon high tea and canap√©s and alcoholic drinks for a couple of hours in the evening and we got breakfast provided. The bathrooms have plenty of amenities and if you do require anything else they soon send it up to your room. There is a great selection of pillows to choose from. We found the location ideal and there is a shopping mall near by. It‚Äôs not the cheapest hotel however you certainly get your moneys worth if booking a club room. All the staff are so friendly and go

title: Lovely Hotel & excellent service!!
desc: I celebrated my birthday with my girlfriend for 2 nights at InterCon. The Front Office staff, Azhar who attended to me was excellent. When he realised it was my birthday, he upgraded my room & arranged for a birthday cake for my celebration. What a nice gesture from him & im very impressed with his service. Keep up the good work!

title: Best solemnisation experience in Intercontinental
desc: I held my lunch solemnisation at Intercontinental on 5th March 2023 level 11. It was a great experience. Everything was well arranged. I would like to take this opportunity to thank Ester my coordinator for the whole event. She was responsive and provided good customer support throughout. I would also like to thank Fiona the banquet manager for ensuring my event was running smoothly and also to ensure all my guests are well hosted. My family members have all complimented the excellent service from the crew members for this event. Highly recommend it to any couple who are looking for a small intimate ROM place.

title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: It was fantastic stayed. We had staycay there a few times and the hotel never fails to impress us each stay, . Room is always clean. Great Location and the staffs are always professional and friendly. Began from reservation team. Front Office and Housekeeping. Specially Ms. Josephine , Ms. Huixian, Ms. Nana and Mr. Fahmi who made our stays even more memorable.

title: A Great Experience
desc: Great hotel with a lot of attentions to details. Booked a corner room initially, but check in was delayed even after 4Pm due to late room cleaning. The staff was extremely polite and offered food credits. Also got an upgrade (not sure it‚Äôs due to the delayed check in or Platinum Ambassador) status. Upon check out, the manager came out and apologized for the late check in. Location is great with a mall connected to the hotel. Lots to do there. Room was clean with all amenities in good order. All staff were extremely polite and one can feel they do care about their hotel guests. Breakfast was a feast with lots of items to pick from. Overall, a great experience. Probably one of the best Intercontinental hotels that I have stayed.

title: Great wedding experience at Intercontinental
desc: Just had my wedding at Intercontinental a few days ago and would like to say a big THANK YOU to Stefanie and team at Intercontinental. The planning process went pretty smoothly and our meetings with Stefanie was always enjoyable. She tried her best to help us with our requests every step along the way. Even the one time that Stefanie fell sick on our meeting day, Ester stepped in and not only was she super nice as well, the change in correspondence for that one time did not create any hiccups. On the wedding day itself, the event went very successfully and our guests were all very satisfied with the food served as well as the ambience of the hotel. Solemnisation at the hotel itself was a dream as well. During our stay at the hotel, all the hotel staff were also extremely

title: Fabulous hotel
desc: Fabulous stay in a fabulous hotel. Not only because of its location but also because of the professional and friendly service of the team. The rooms are large and tasteful decorated. High standard. We had a junior suite (1501) with lounge access. In the Lounge which offers breakfast, tea time and Happy Hour, is elegant and spacious. Team excellent. We will definitely stay here again

title: Complimenting the stay and staff
desc: Held our wedding at InterContinental Singapore on the 17th of March 2023 and it was such a good experience. We were so happy with the service that we would like to highlight a few employees of InterContinetal Singapore that stood out to us and we were grateful for them. Banquet Manager: Nazri We would like to commend you for such a good job that night. From the Pre-event briefing before the banquet dinner to the end of the dinner service, you were sharp on your timings, had regular updates regarding the amount of alcohol left, and also were proactive with advising on potential hiccups that might happen during our dinner service. You also made it easier for my main coordinator to problem-solve any issues on that night. Your reassurance that the wedding always starts late was

title: Among the best hotels of all Singapore
desc: Not my first stay at Intercontinental Singapore and will not be the last. Amazing service, great location, best culinary options and best Intercontinental club team Even the hotel can do better by having SPA facilities or more TV channels

title: March Staycation 2023
desc: Had 2 days 1 night in king classic room on high floor. Simply classic and also a beautiful room. Think its the 2nd smallest room but its quite big enough to have 4-5 people gathering. Had a welcome drink due to my status. View from my room was very nice, able to see bugis area very nicely. Hotel provided suprise small cake for my friend as we celebrated friend's birthday.

title: great room condition and so kind staff
desc: There are many good hotels in Singapore, but the Intercontinental Singapore, where I stayed for two days on this trip, was the best. The room condition was good. And on the last day, thank you so much for responding so kindly to 'hani' who helped me in the lounge! If I come to Singapore again, I want to stay there again.

title: InterContinental Hotel ,Middle Road
desc: Good morning,I ,Mr Shrudin and Mrs Shrudin stayed there on 110323.Good and professional services by staff especially ,Safina the front desk,she went out off way to show us ,the elevator and connector way to Bugis Junction and explain about the Hotels surrounding Halal eateries near by. The Bell boy was very courteous and elegance.Very clean and very nice environment.I will come back for sure!

title: Nice hotel and good location
desc: There is actually not much to say. The hotel fully met our expectations. The staff was extremely friendly throughout, the room was spacious and nicely furnished. The club is spacious and offers enough room. The offer there meets the expectations. However, one must know that in the evening really only canap√©s are served. So if you expect a sprawling buffet at cocktail hour, you will be disappointed. The location of the hotel is also very good. There are numerous attractions within walking distance.

title: Home away from home
desc: It's undoubtedly one of the best hotel I've stayed in. The service staff throughout the club lounge is top notch. Makes you feel like you're home. It's not easy to come across the entire staffing that's both personal, yet extremely professional and efficient. Keep up the good work. And to the management and hr. Please keep up the training in other areas of the hotel as well.

title: A home away from home
desc: A home away from home is important when you travel for work. To me Intercontinental at Bugis in Singapore is such a place. I have stayed here as often as I can. Wonderful hotel with character and an outstanding service. Breakfast in the Club Lounge is outstanding, and served by a positive and accommodating team. I have been coming here for more than 10 years and I will continue doing do. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: WILL VISIT AGAIN
desc: The room is very spacious compared to other 5-star hotels that I've stayed. The bed is really good, I just kept falling asleep on this bed. And the breakfast is good because it provided much more additional choices such as yogurt and high quality bottled fruit juices.

title: Return Visit Staying in a Club Room
desc: This was my third visit to this hotel all times in a room with Club Access . Well worth the extra money!! Very friendly staff in the club Room. Especially ZIN, who went above and beyond. Children are allowed in the Room but Unfortunately on the Night we were there it was more like a Kindergarten , with children crying and screaming due to tiredness. Parents and staff didn‚Äôt seem bothered, but it somewhat spoilt our evening. Food, Pool and loungers excellent as was the Standard of the Rooms.

title: Stay in luxury intercontinental
desc: Had a wonderful stay at Intercontinental Bugis. Best location that is near to many places and near to metro station. Bed was very luxurious and features premium down bedding with thick mattress and fluffy featherbed pillowtop. Really amazing. The club staff were really friendly & professional. The afternoon tea and evening cocktails offered under the Club room was very creative, photogenic and tasty. I recommend this hotel as a luxury hotel.

title: Thank you InterContinental Bugis for exceeding our expectations.
desc: We held my wedding banquet at InterContinental Singapore and we want to thank Stefanie Heng our wedding co-ordinator for assisting us through the journey of planning our wedding day. On the day itself we had Mugilan who offered us a lot of assistance to ensure that our wedding went smoothly as well. All the staffs at InterContinental Bugis who assisted us for our wedding and hotel stay are really wonderful and offered us top notch service and everyone worked with great attitude. Overall, the atmosphere we felt throughout our stay was really cozy and warm. Thank you InterContinental Bugis for living up to and exceeding our expectations.

title: Singapore favourite
desc: We have always found the Intercontinental (Middle Rd) Singapore to be our oasis when here in Singapore. Great facilities, amazing staff and a brilliant range of food and beverage options. From lazing by the pool, taking afternoon high tea, business with clients or evening drinks in the perfect sanctuary of the Club lounge, we love returning to this wonderful hotel.

title: Fantastic hotel with great service
desc: So pleased to be back at the Intercontinental Singapore. It is a beautiful colonial style hotel. Fantastic service in the Club lounge by all the staff. Lovely room serviced twice a day which is a real joy.

title: Great 6-nights for a couple. Best Club Lounge
desc: Would recommend this hotel more for couples than families. The pool area was nice but small, therefore not ideal for kids. The gym looked good although we never used it. The rooms were nice, spacious. The location was great. Everything was within walking distance that we want to go to. Best part was the Club lounge. This must be the best lounge I have ever been to. The breakfast was amazing and so was the food during the cocktail hours. The staff couldn‚Äôt do enough for us. You never had to wait for a drink and they would help where ever they could. Special mention to Ida, she was really helpful with recommending restaurants, bars and even helped us with a late check out. Everyone was friendly. Would definitely recommend

title: Still the best
desc: The Club at the Intercontinental SG is one of my favourite places. After many visits over the years, this has been our first post-Covid return, and the ambience, food, and excellent service remain as good as ever. A top tier travel experience in Singapore.

title: Excellent service, beautiful hotel, wonderful stay for Family and Kids
desc: Every year, our family come to Singapore for tourist purpose, we choose IHG Hotels for our stay and of courses InterContinental Singapore Hotel this time. The hotel has a beautiful decoration, good service, cleanliness. Our room has club access so we come every time for breakfast before we go out to visit. Thanks to Ms. Anna in Club Lounge, Ms. Fiona in Reception counter for Ambassador and hotel team for their warmly welcoming us so that we have a very great stay here. We will come back again for sure.

title: As good as it gets.
desc: Absolutely first class hotel. Everything is excellent. Convenient location. Completely quiet & private. We were in the club and had breakfast, tea & cocktails there every day. Really amazing. Worth asking for the club on your reservation. The club staff were really friendly & professional. The Concierge staff, especially Ronnie, were outstanding. They helped us with museum and shopping recommendations; and money transfer and taxi booking--really the best!

title: Overall positive, stellar staff
desc: All the staff are amazing, the beds are super comfortable and the location is great and central, whether you're in Singapore for business or holiday. However, there are a couple of niggles which might be a deal-breaker for some: Children, of any age - including babies and toddlers - are allowed to freely roam in the Club Lounge, even during evening cocktails! while the quality and consistency of the F&B offerings in the Club Lounge don't match those of the Intercontinental Robertson Quay and other five star hotels in Singapore.

title: Exceptional facility and service
desc: I take between 15 and 25 business trips per year, and this hotel is one of the very best that I‚Äôve experienced. The level of service was exceptional and team members like Ida in the Intercontinental lounge went above and beyond to ensure my trip went smoothly.

title: Disappointed and miffed
desc: Server John Tan was rather unfriendly. Experience was unpleasant due to quality mgt issues such as not being able to split bills from the same table, rather inconvenient and unusual and poorly communicated promotion privileges.

title: Welcome, Warm and Well
desc: What a good feeling to be welcomed, to feel the warmth and being treated well. As if 2nd home, the hotel staff greeted every passing staff and with respect including the senior staff. Guests are spoiled for choices to do anything and everything in and out of the hotel. Be it shopping, dining / drinking at various F & B outlets, visiting nearby museums and gym/swim in the hotel including meals. It's centrally located in the city easily accessible to public transport and a nearby train station. Specially mention and applaud the following staff for their good if not great services. They are friendly, accommodating and served with passion and smiles. Certainly an asset to the Organization. Hotel Manager; Joyce Rooms : Lucinda Club Intercontinental : Aisayh and The Team : Anna,

title: Classic yet old
desc: Classic hotel with nice layout Previously stayed there and really liked it However, yesterday's stay was disappointing The room is a bit old, and there were numerous stains on the floor, 1 dirt seen on the mattress

title: Enjoyable experience with the staff, beautiful architecture
desc: Friend had a wedding at the Grand Ballroom here. I helped out and worked with a couple of hotel staff on the AV system, they were very easy to work with! Stef and Naz (managers) gave great assurance in running the whole operation. Hairul (AV) was sharp in transiting audio between the segments. And definitely the entire wedding was amazing! Food, servers, ambience... Superb indeed.

title: The InterContinental - old fashoined service from a beautiful hotel
desc: The hotel is very well looked after, and offers excellent service. From the time you check in to leaving, the service is A1. All staff are friendly and provide assistance readily and quickly. I particularly liked the Club Lounge where they offer breakfast, afternoon tea, and snacks throughout the day and evening. You can sit and read papers, (provided) or catch up with emails on your laptop. They even have a Head Butler, (Mr Shirish Shrivastava) who is happy to arrange services for you, (we needed an early breakfast one morning and to cater for a guest who was joining us for afternoon tea) The location of the hotel is in town so it was easy to get taxis, the MRT, (train) and buses everywhere. Our family will stay again on our next trip to Singapore.

title: Wedding at IHG
desc: Wedding was a huge success thanks to the extremely professional and attentive hotel staff. Special mentions to: Stefanie, main wedding planner. Selva, actual day coordinator. Janson, actual day AV coordinator. Highly recommend to hold wedding at IHG!

title: Great Stay in Singapore
desc: excellent hotel. Rooms are very comfortable and of good size. the location is excellent and very convenient. There is a grest restaurant on site for Italian Food. The service is great and prompt. Breakfast is decent. Bed is very comfortable.

title: A brilliant week at the Intercontinental Singapore
desc: In Singapore to celebrate my 65th birthday and returning to the island after a 58 year break as I lived there for 3 years as a child . This hotel was exceptional. From the minute Charmayne met us at the door and booked us in the feel good factor was there . The room was excellent and immaculate, the lounge team went out of the way to provide advice, friendship and exceptional service. Particular mention please to Zin who really looked after us, Foo who met us with a smile and warmth at breakfast and Nur who helped with great ideas of where to go. Ronny at the concierge desk was always cheerful, informative and very helpful in sorting out our trips and taxis on may occasions. If you eat in Man Fu Yuan ask for Phillip who expertly guided us though an extensive and impressive

title: Unconditional fans of the intercontinental of bugis for the past 30 years.
desc: We have regularly come to the intercontinental of bugis since its opening. we are real fans of the hotel and have enjoyed each stay totally.. The staff is very friendly and customer service is among the best in Singapore - which is not a mean achievement.

title: A most wonderful stay, home away from home.
desc: Finally had some time to pen this review after a long break from work. The entire team had been so helpful n made our stay so lovely during 4 - 16 Apr at Intercontinental Singapore located in Bugis Fiona, Guest Relations Mgr attended to our requests promptly, making sure our needs r fulfilled. Jeff, staff Porter was so welcoming n helpful, had a great chat each time we saw him. Wayne, Concierge helped my partner with a special request at the late hour n got it done so quickly. The team from The Breakfast Room - Suresh, Hafiz, Mae & Faz were so helpful upon learning that we had missed a few breakfast cos we like to have something different and went the extra mile to spruce up some delicious local delights for us. Harris from the Lobby Lounge had a great chat with us bout his

title: Nice hotel experience
desc: Room is clean and tidy, feel homey when turn on Spotify from hotel TV. Staff are really friendly and helpful, highlight to the bfast, worth if money for various food and beverage. Nice hotel experience, enhance pleasure to this trip

title: Wonderful evening cocktails
desc: Went to the evening cocktail reception at the club intercontinental. Wondeful snacks and service . Special mention to Joseph for his wonderful service and knowledge of the wine. Thank you Joseph for your "teaching " The atmosphere is also very relaxing.

title: Wedding banquet
desc: Excellent accommodation with fantastic wedding banquet, enjoyed so much during the stay from 27 April to 3 May of 2023. Tried out the chinese restaurant on 2/F, it was also very tasty. I would consider it is a 6/7 stars hotel with reasonable charges.

title: Always a delight to be back!
desc: Stayed for 2 nights redeeming my Ambassador benefit. We choose club room benefits and enjoyed the stay ana access to the club tremendously. Staff team at front desk and club were attentive and helpful to me and my elderly mom and took good care of us during the entire stay. Membership was acknowledged at point of check in and all it took was 10min for the entire process to be complete. Late check out at 4pm, welcome amenities and drinks were all additional touches that made our day. This is our 5th stay in Intercontinental Bugis and it never fails to disappoint. Thank you very much and we'd continue to be back!

title: Excellent Choice
desc: Stayed for a week on our arrival in Singapore. Very convenient for airport. Room was a decent size& beautifully clean. During our stays, Club lounge was highlight , wai kit , zin and Shirish has provided with excellent service ,their attentiveness and promptness, which added a personal touch to our stay. We were always been welcomed with great smile to lounge. its is very nice to experience such hospitality. We are loyal to IHG hotels and specifically Intercontinental so we will be back for sure upon our return to singapore in future.

title: Good, but not great
desc: Quite good overall. Hotel has a rather strange layout. Doesn't have a proper bar. Lobby drinks & lounge access ruinously expensive. Breakfast room layout not great either and rather chaotic. Has an Ambassador desk, but seemed to be always busy.

title: great staff at the InterCon Singapore
desc: My husband and I stayed at the Intercontinental Singapore for three nights, and overall, I thought it was a great hotel even better staff. I am a Diamond Elite Ambassador with IC/IHG, and they have a dedicated check-in area that was always staffed. They almost acted like a concierge, sometimes helping with recommendations and options. They barely clearly told me the benefits and walked me to the room. I was upgraded to a junior suite, and it was a quite spacious room with two TVs and a great view over the indoor mall. I have no complaints about the room and everything was updated and modern. Location was convenient to the MRT station, and the hotel provided a walking tour of the nearby Muslim quarter that we took advantage of. Lots of little food streets around here as opposed

title: Excellent experience
desc: An excellent and enjoyable stay from the moment of arrival to departure one could not find any fault. All the staff made us feel welcomed. The room was well appointed and very clean and well maintained. We experienced a number of the restaurants and found them perfect in all aspects. Highly recommend the hotel for both business and leisure stay.

title: Noisy and poorly maintained rooms, ANNOYING TICKING SOUND
desc: Finally managed to write a detailed review of this stay that was frankly, appalling.  The rooms were very nice, which is expected for a hotel of this calibre.  Apart from that, there were many signs of aging.  Firstly, The bathtub was peeling, so we didn't get to use it. There were also some weird stuff on the windows (see pics) Secondly, there were times when the room door didn't close fully. A security issue. Usually, The hotel door is expected to close fully behind us when leaving the room, but this did not always happen. During checkout day, this even caused the cleaner to enter our room because he thought that we had checked-out. Imagine if this had happened when we were asleep or when we were not in the room at that time (or any other time when our room door wasn't

title: Exceptional
desc: Best Hotel, We stayed for meeting . Its very good hotel and big breakfast buffet with indian dishes also which we dint expected. Service was also good though it was very crowded . Everyone always try to accomodate our request. Thank you for Feona and Mr. Shirish who helped all of us upon checkout and had good chat . It was nice to see that that everyone was helping us in the lobby . Thank you everyone for all your help

title: Great hotel....even better club lounge
desc: Great hotel in excellent location. We took advantage of the club lounge facilities...was really good every day,well worth it...special thanks to ALL the staff in the lounge..all were cheerful and most obliging at all times...couldn't do more for us..made our little break so much better.....absolutely will be back

title: InterContinental Singapore
desc: I had a thoroughly enjoyable stay at ICS, staying for 10 nights through late May to June. The room itself was clean and well presented as one may expect, the bed and pillows were extremely comfortable and made for great night rests. Breakfasts were to a good standard for a buffet breakfast. The highlight of my trip however was the service of Fazira. Friendly, warm and open, it was always an enjoyable experience. I looked forward to breakfast time and would seek to return as a result of her exceptional service. An asset to ICS.

title: Another amazing stay
desc: My husband, 10-year-old daughter and i stayed at the Intercontinental Singapore for seven nights in April 2023. We booked a heritage room, but on arrival, we informed that it might not be big enough for the extra bed for our daughter. We upgraded to the junior suite for an additional $50 per night. Would highly recommend purchasing club lounge access as the food, staff and drinks as well as service. Fantastic at the club lounge level. In particular, Zin was very helpful as well as one of the ladies who worked the breakfast on weekdays. She overheard my daughters order and had placed it before she even formally asked for the order. Incredible service. Ronnie at the concierge was also very helpful and informed. Another enjoyable stay at the Intercontinental. Will certainly be

title: Faultless club experience
desc: This is the fifth time we have stayed at the Intercontinental. We have always stayed in a club room and a full breakfast, a high afternoon tea and a full cocktail hour (2 hours) with hot and cold canap√©s we actually bought very little food, apart from a few local hawker experiences. This saves a lot of money in one of the most expensive cities in the world. The level of service only goes from high to higher. Every person has exceptional service skills. The Head Butler, Shirish, who made a personal connection with all and had a great sense of humour and even came to our room to ensure we didn‚Äôt miss breakfast on our last day. I‚Äôm amazed that the standards remain so high. We are a family of five and joined the ambassador program for the room upgrade, which gave us more room.

title: IHG Does Not Disappoint
desc: Just spent five nights in the Singapore Intercontinental hotel with lounge access and have done this for 15 years. Friendly and memorable service from staff who seem to predict your needs. I was most taken by Veron, a great coffee forecaster, and by Shirish the Head Butler ensuring smooth operations. Looking forward to our next visit: Tatiana and David

title: Location ‚úîÔ∏èStaff ‚úîÔ∏èFacilities‚úîÔ∏è
desc: We had a superb stay at this hotel. The staff were absolutely excellent and the level of service was spectacular. We particularly enjoyed the breakfasts and the service from the chefs and waiters and waitresses was first class. I loved the ‚ÄòEgg station‚Äô at breakfast. And I‚Äôm very grateful to Charles, the head breakfast chef, for allowing us to have a quick taste of what a local breakfast is like. We felt that all staff went the extra mile, including our chamber person (Tei?) room 710. We also thanks the front desk staff for all their help during 9/10 days stay, the breakfast welcoming staff for their ‚Äò good morning‚Äô each day. Facilities and amenities were excellent. We loved the swimming pool after a hot day in Singapore. There are plenty of towels as well as changing rooms and

title: Amazing Lynn at Intercon SIN
desc: Beautiful hotel. Amazing concierge team. Lynn at concierge provides fantastic professional advice and support to visitors and went above and beyond to help me revolve some travel challenges I was experiencing. She‚Äôs an amazing asset to the hotel. She went out of her way to find solutions and to help me over come my issues. A true star.

title: Great venue for Business Lunch Event
desc: Email InterContinental Singapore for booking of venue to host a business lunch event, was recommended the Library and the process of securing the venue through email communication was responsive and comprehensive. The staff provided detailed instructions and questions in setting up the place, and everything was up and ready by the stipulated time on the event day itself. Everything, service, food, support from the staff exceeded my own as well as all my guests' expectations. The service crew members were all very courteous. Organising your personal or business event with them will be effortless and you won't be disappointed.

title: Great Experience
desc: Special mention for Safina - at the front desk - patient - helpful- lovely ; May, Charles (at breakfast) always willing to serve with a lovely smile The hotel is warm, hospitable, clean, helpful and absolutely so central - I always have a wonderful time here

title: A wonderful service recovery story
desc: There were some issues with my request for no feather bedding. However, the service recovery was excellent and we felt very pampered after that and had a wonderful stay. All staff were excellent and very professional. On the very first night, Josiah Gwee took responsibility of the issue and provided sufficient compensation and remedies. On the second day, when the issue was not completely resolved by housekeeping, Muhammad Azhar provided an upgrade and assisted housekeeping in preparation. It was very appropriate and erased our disappointment. Nur Aisyah made exceptions to the lounge rules at our request and assisted us in restaurant bookings and Anna Lau went out of her way to make us feel at home. Ronnie Yeap at the concierge was at our service daily with pleasant chats and

title: Feeling like part of a family
desc: Service simply outstanding Special note of thanks to the following for going above and beyond in taking care of us: Wayne - concierge Harris - lobby lounge Jeff - Door Porter And lastly Fiona - guest relations manager A hotel stay is made so much more like home when you feel part of the family - and you‚Äôve all exceeded expectations. Thank you

title: Excellent services and good location.
desc: The staff is very helpful . We sent Amazon parcel to our hotel during our trip and they put the parcel in our room when we are back to our room . They are very considerate and helpful . They provided us umbrellas when it was raining .

title: Wonderful upscale Singapore hotel with excellent service in buzzling and very convenient location
desc: This is the place to be - historic building with very thoughtful and historic as well as modern decorations, wonderful suites, super friendly, great service at reception, in restaurants and in particular in the club lounge which offers superb afternoon tea and prime cocktails. Child and family-friendly and for us the perfect Singapore home away from home. Very conveniently located right at Bugis mall and Arab street with MRT connection and in walking distance to many sights. Highly recommended.

title: Classy but old hotel
desc: Quite a nice room, if not very clean, and the hotel is definitely showing signs of age. Some peeling on the bathtub, which made me wary of using it and i was therefore unable to have the full experience. Furthermore, the cold-tap-water-indicator dropped out somehow during the stay. There were a few times when our room door couldn't close properly, and it was also due to this which caused the cleaner to enter our room because he thought that we had checked-out. Also, the sound insulation wasn't very good. We could hear the neighboring doors being opened and it was very distracting (sometimes we thought that someone else was trying to open our door/was knocking on it) We also heard the occasional "tick" sound with a regular rhythm  Weirdly, the hotel also erroneously noted

title: Heritage Luxury at its best!
desc: Convenient location. Beautiful hotel with comfortable and spacious rooms. The staff was friendly, professional and helpful. Shashika, who was at the lobby guest services, ensured we had a wonderful stay by recommending places to visit, helping with a smooth checkout, etc.

title: Most enjoyable luxury stay, thanks to the wonderful staff that contributed to this. Great location.
desc: We have been staying at the Intercontinental Singapore for the last 10 years or so when on holiday. We have never been disappointed. The hotel staff ( at the front desk - Fiona) are always friendly and go out of their way to make you feel at home and comfortable. The rooms are spacious and very clean. The club lounge is a wonderful place to wind down and thanks to Aiysha, Foo Wai Kit, Zin and Joseph they made us feel very welcomed and extra special with their smiles, conversations and attention. Breakfast at the lounge is also a great experience especially when you walk in , get that smile and your order of coffee has been remembered! Thank you Veron ! I don‚Äôt usually write a huge review but I thought that the staff we came across this stay , well deserved a mention and we will

title: Nice IHG Hotel.
desc: Very nice and kind reception. Nice pool & nice location. Bugis plaza is connected so, you can get any food if you didn‚Äôt include breakfast. It takes 17-19 minutes from/to airport. So, its also good for last night.

title: Amazing club lounge
desc: Where do I start...... our booking was a deluxe king with Clubroom access - from the moment of our early arrival, we were personally shown around the hotel then escorted up to the club lounge to enjoy a fantastic breakfast with great coffee. Our rooms were very clean, beds extremely comfortable and we had welcome chocolates. The club lounge has not changed since our previous visit 8 yrs earlier - still the same friendly attentive staff. High Tea from 3pm is not to be missed and a great way to start the evening is with canopes and cocktails @ 6pm. Food variety is always different, a wide choice of cocktails, spirits, wines and beers. The staff are always more than willing to assist, from charging a phone, to calling to reserve tours or using the business centre to print out

title: Feels like back to home again
desc: Room was already ready when I check in and it was clean and neat. I had breakfast at the Club Lounge. The food selection has indeed improved a lot and I enjoyed the nice Asian and Western selection. Service is very prompt and staff are very friendly to ensure that we are comfortably and well taken off. Bed is nice for a good night rest and I have no problems falling asleep even on a foreign bed. The only pity is that my short 2 night stay has to come to an end and I look forward to another stay with the hotel soon.

title: A must stay whilst in Singapore
desc: Very friendly and helpful staff, especially in the club lounge, they cannot do enough, I would high recommend staying at this hotel, great hotel and a very good location, central to most places and if not an easy taxi ride away.

title: Connect with the Concierge Team to help plan an amazing stay in Singapore!
desc: My Mother and I recently stayed at this iconic luxury property in the heart of Singapore and we were not disappointed. We wanted to take time out to highlight the amazing services from the Concierge Team and in particular highlight Lynn who was a pleasure to work with. We used the Concierge Team daily to plan our trips around Singapore and to be able to home in on my Mothers interests (flowers and horticulture). Our day from beginning to end was planned meticulously with Lynn and it was a delight to return to the Hotel to see her friendly face helping out other guests about the best way that they can spend their time in Singapore. Our recommendation is definitely to spend time with this team when you are next at the Hotel to ensure that your time is well planned. Having

title: Wonderful excellent stay
desc: Perfect service in club lounge, wonderful atmosphere feeling like in colonial time, very friendly staff, location of hotel is quite central nearby Bugis, having been here already and we will come again, thanks to everybody especially Mr. Shrivastara for the excellent service

title: Very pleasant experience
desc: very attentive staff in whole hotel, but especially at the club lounge. I have been to many places but this was really extraordinary. Well trained and very professional. The right amount of distance but right there when you need them.

title: We just love it
desc: We love the Intercon Singapore and are regular guests since years. We very much appreciate the ambiance, the lovely, helpful and (genuine) friendly staff, the quiet Club Lounge as a ‚Äûliving room‚Äú with great food options during our stay. And will definitively come back. The personal attention to guests is one of the highlights, like staff remember your ‚Äûcoffee for breakfast‚Äû and ‚Äûwine preference‚Äú, which adds a very personal touch. The Concierge has a great wealth of knowledge - so much more helpful than searching Mr. Google. Without deminishing the hospitality of the entire team, we would like to name Mr. Shirish and Miss Jovy and their natural ability of connecting with people. All this made our visit again very memorable. Two things we could see for further improvement: 1.

title: Luxury and relaxed stay
desc: A luxury hotel in the heart of Bugis and conveniently located. Club lounge staffs were welcoming. Housekeeping was efficient. During the time of our stay there was the construction work on the street. But the windows stopped the sound well. A great stay overall.

title: Feel like home and concierge team goes extra mile
desc: This is the second time I stayed in the hotel. I always feel like coming home when I am here. It is not perfect and the hotel is abit dated the hotel but the service level is unbeatable. Gym facilities are very good. I will definitely come back next time.

title: Great service always.
desc: As usual, everything about the IHG, and intercontinental experience is great. The team in Intercontinental (Bugis/Middle Road), sets itself apart in terms of customer service. The rooms here are big and spacious, and to get a more complete ‚Äúintercontinental‚Äù experience, do upgrade your rooms to the ‚ÄúClub Intercontinental‚Äù where you have access to a great breakfast spread, afternoon tea, and evening cocktails and canap√©s. Their breakfast features items like truffle eggs Benedict with smoked salmon, and lots more. Evening drinks comes with a free flow cocktails, wine, and liquors of your choice, with cheese spread and some seasonal small bites. Perfect. Additionally, the location of this hotel can‚Äôt get any better, located conveniently in one of the most connected

title: Great location, Good staff and amenities
desc: Great location and excellent staff. Check-in experience has been slow in my opinion as the desk was unattended when I arrived. In-room dining options are great. Suits the business traveller very well.

title: A great experience
desc: This is our third time at the Singapore Middle Road Intercontinental Club rooms, first post COVID. It is still an excellent hotel and club room experience. One of the small but big things we notIced was the use of wooden chipped key room cards, a great initiative to reduce plastic use. It is the first time we have come across this. Well done to the Hotel for this approached. In an interesting perspective, this does not appear to be universal across the Intercontinental hotel chain as we spent 8 nights in two different Intercontinental hotels in USA. They are still using plastic key cards.

title: Amazing wedding!
desc: Amazing food and top notch service! I would like to thank our banquet manager Nazri and his wonderful team for making our wedding a success! They were able to handle last minute changes to the programme well and without any fuss!

title: Top notch!
desc: This hotel has it all. Our stay was so smooth, there was nothing to be annoyed or worry about. Location is great. Check-in smooth. A small leak from A/C fixed quickly when we were out. Junior suite that was amazing. Felt like home. Club room with access to a lounge that had impeccable service and food. Great room service for the kid. Didn‚Äôt try the pool but looked inviting. Check out was easy, getting cabs too. If I should point at one minor issue it would be the toiletries. Bottles too small and brand could be lifted up a notch. Everything was perfect apart from that-this is what every hotel should aspire to be! We are definitely coming back here!

title: Memorable wedding dinner and stay
desc: We held our wedding dinner at InterContinental Singapore because I really love the colonial style and look of the wedding set-up. We are especially grateful to our wedding coordinator, Ester, for guiding us throughout our wedding planning, and her patience with our last minute changes and requests. Also a big shoutout to our Banquet Manager, Selva for ensuring that the whole event ran smoothly. The food was delicious and all our guests enjoyed the dinner. We, including our parents and friends, also enjoyed our stay at the hotel.

title: Iconic hotel in Singapore
desc: Really nice experience, clean hotel and lovely atmosphere. One of the best hotels in Singapore and always my first choice to stay. Good location and many restaurants options Great customer service specially from Syafiq, Azhar and Aishah. Thanks :)

title: Best service you can ever get
desc: We stayed for 2 nights for our wedding anniversary. Hotel staff was nice especially Masagoes, he made sure our stay was comfortable and relaxing. He even send us a bottle of wine and dessert which i really appreciate. A big thanks to him for making our Singapore stay memorable. I would definitely come back.

title: Wedding Lunch
desc: We had our wedding lunch banquet at InterContinental Singapore and it was an excellent choice. Our wedding coordinator, Stefanie had helped us a lot during the journey of this wedding planning. She readily answers all of our queries and managed to resolve all of our issues/ queries. Our banquet in charge, Boon Wee also helped us a lot in ensuring a smooth flow of event. He is very patient and calm, which we found to very reassuring. He made sure our event is on track and improvised when there was a delay before the 2nd march in. The food for the lunch banquet was excellent as well! Definitely will recommend InterContinental Singapore for hosting wedding banquet!

title: Good stay in Singapore
desc: 5/30/2023, 3:05:46 PM InterContinental Singapore is a luxurious and elegant hotel located in the heart of Singapore's historic Bugis district. The hotel features beautifully appointed rooms and suites, offering guests a comfortable and stylish stay. It also has an impressive array of dining options, including award-winning restaurants such as Man Fu Yuan and Ash & Elm, which serve delectable Chinese and European cuisine respectively. In addition to its excellent facilities, InterContinental Singapore is also known for its exceptional service. The hotel's staff are friendly, professional, and always willing to go above and beyond to ensure that guests have a memorable and enjoyable stay. Whether you're visiting Singapore for business or pleasure, InterContinental Singapore is a

title: Excellent services provided by Josephine
desc: Josephine is great with her Cs skills she replaced my in room dining order with exceptional thoughtfulness . Great job well done we were amazed with her excellent quality services provided to us . Thank you

title: Our stay stay at the intercontinental hotel Singapore
desc: Excellent service, rooms very clean our room chamber maid Suna has been highly diligent maintaining the room very clean and very helpful in every respect. And the staff at the breakfast room and the club lounge very friendly and helpful. In general all staff very friendly and helpful, we enjoyed our stay very much

title: Over the par excellence
desc: Stay in Singapore I was there for few days for business and I must say room is very comfortable.Bed and pillows are very nice. Hk cleans the room nicely. Breakfast option is also good.Best part is connected mall and in the centre of the city. Mr.Shirish was very interactive.Thank you.I will be coming back.

title: Best Business Hotel
desc: I must say if you are coming for 2-3 days for business trip this hotel is the best. Very clean and the staffs are very friendly and polite. They always help u with a big smile and have great sence of humour. Shirish was very good with my family . When i visit Singapore next, i will sure stay here.

title: Great hotel in central Singapore
desc: My wife and I stayed in a King Classic room with Club Longe access for a few nights and really enjoyed the hotel. The hotel itself is in a great location and the room was fantastic. We made use of the club lounge for breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktails/canap√©s, all of which were excellent. Staff were brilliant too, very attentive!

title: Amazing stay!
desc: I stayed for 4 nights due to a large-scale supplier conference. The planning phase took a few months and we worked very closely with the sales and project team (Andereen, Belvin, and Hui San). During the planning phase, the team always supported very promptly with all last-minute changes on the contract and various changes. They were all patient and always willing to accommodate. Even during the actual conference week, Shang Jun from the project team went above and beyond to ensure that the preparation was up to our standards. Check-in was very seamless and the front desk staff was very helpful throughout my stay (Fahmi & Azhar). They never failed to provide immediate support and gave a few suggestions on my help requests. Overall, a very positive experience with

title: Thank you for the unforgettable and magical wedding experience!!!
desc: Dear InterContinental Singapore, We want to express our sincere gratitude for the wonderful wedding we had at your venue. From start to finish, everything was perfect, and we are incredibly grateful for the unforgettable memories. We would like to thank Ester, our wedding coordinator, for her professionalism and attention to detail. She made the planning process stress-free and ensured our vision came to life. She went above and beyond by remaining present throughout our entire wedding event until late at night, ensuring that everything flowed seamlessly. Chef Aaron, the culinary delights you prepared were outstanding. Our guests are still raving about the delicious flavours and beautiful presentation of each dish. Your expertise and specially crafted banquet dishes added a

title: Respectful, gracious and welcoming stay.
desc: I am happy to say that Intercontinental Singapore have a strong team that demonstrates how to manage the client's expectation. Thoughtful and respectful was taken into consideration when on communications. When checked in, I received a handwritten note to me. It demonstrates the individual her time and efforts to deliver this message to me on my stay which gave me a warm appreciative feeling. Throughout the stay, the hotel staff and teams were gracious and welcoming! The experience was a lovely one. Cheers and kudos to the Intercontinental Singapore Team!

title: Great stay in Singapore
desc: I've already been several times in this wonderful Hotel and it's always my first choice in Singapore ; the Hotel is beautiful and the location is very convenient to reach many attractions, the rooms have a very high standard in terms of cleaning and elegance, the staff is friendly and helpful. Loved it as always.

title: great experience
desc: Firstly, this hotel has a very good sense of design, indicating that the taste of the hotel is very good. Secondly, the hardware and software facilities of the hotel are very good. The faucets and shower heads are all equipped with good brands, and even come with Arrow's massage toilet. Shampoo and shower gel are all quite good. The product is also very good, and the softness and hardness of the mattress are quite suitable, and there are two types of pillows available for customers to choose from, including down pillows and cotton pillows, which are completely at the five-star level. FinallyÔºå Housekeeping Wen Fei helps us a lot! Thanks!

title: A great choice for Singapore accomodation
desc: Before I even got to the hotel, the welcome emails were a lovely attention to detail that made me feel like they wanted it to be perfect when I arrived. When I did arrive, the hotel was immaculate and the staff were very welcoming. The room was well set up and spotless. The food was delicious. I'll stay there again. The location of the hotel was excellent for easy access to the city.

title: Wen Tei , the house keeper is the best !
desc: Best experience ever, Wen Tei the house keeper did such an amazing job making the room very clean and feels like paradise every single day I walk into the room after business meetings. Will definitely return.

title: Excellent
desc: We had our wedding dinner banquet at InterContinental Singapore and it was an excellent choice. Our wedding coordinator, Ester had assisted us a lot during our planning of the big day. She answers all of our queries and managed to resolve all of our issues/ queries even with our last minute changes, she‚Äôs able to get it thru. Our banquet in charge, Selva was a good help in assisting us throughout the dinner, and ensuring a smooth flow of event. The food for the dinner banquet was excellent and delicious and nicely plated as well! Definitely will recommend InterContinental Singapore for hosting wedding banquet!

title: Great times at the Intercontinental Singapore
desc: From the moment we were picked up at the airport to when we checked out, we experienced wonderful service, accommodation and facilities for our stay. The staff were courteous and attentive, especially so in the Club Continental lounge and staying in the Royal suite was a true pleasure. Special thanks to our head butler Shirish who always made the effort to say hello, ensure that everything was going well, thank you Shirish, we appreciated your help. Unfortunately we could only stay for 3 nights and if we do come back to Singapore we will ensure that the stay will be longer. Thank you everyone for a memorable stay.

title: One of the best IHG experiences in Asia Pacific
desc: Great Location, Amazing Food Options, and most of all Excellent Service and Staff. The Club Lounge Made My Stay Easy As I Managed To Make Most Of My Meetings There. Staff Members Are Amazing And Attentive To Details. Will Stay There Again For Sure.

title: A most pleasant stay
desc: The hotel staff at the reception counter and the club lounge are all very courteous and helpful. I and my wife thoroughly enjoyed the brief stay at the hotel and had a good tour in the surrounding area.

title: I recommend to stay here
desc: Very nice colonial-style hotel. Absolutely polite, professional stuff. They are ready to provide additional support and help if needed. Big choises of food during breakfast. Several bars and restorans inside. Good location is on top to above)

title: Experience was a mega SLAY!
desc: Great time at the Intercontinental! Even greater service by Afza in the Club Lounge! Extremely attentive and helpful with all my request. Stepping in, I was a little lost with the orientation but she quickly directed me and took my order; also really helpful with recommendations! Room at the hotel was nice and big, comfortable for myself! Overall, 10/10 would come back again!

title: NOT ORDINARY
desc: HIGHLIGHT OF MY TRIP IS THE CLUB.THE BEST AMONGST ALL.THE SERVICE IS THE BEST.FOOD IS DECENT.BUT THE STAFF NOTHING CAN COMPARE.THEY ARE REALLY WELL TRAINED.KUDOS TO THE MANAGEMENT.YOU MUST BE PROUD TO HAVE A TEAM LIKE THEM.SUPERB AND FANTASTIC!

title: Old colonial Style Hotel
desc: On arrival, Ambassador Diamond Elite status recognised. Escorted to Club Lounge for registration. Lovely calm relaxing area with superb staff with a good sense of humour go beyond to ensure your stay is 100%. Breakfast (Buffet style. With a good choice of hot food to order) , afternoon tea and evening canap√©s & cocktails are of an excellent standard with good variety. The whole hotel is furnished in a colonel style. Roms are spacious, clean, and well-appointed. It is located in the Bugis area, close to an MRT Station, for visiting the sights of Singapore. And a couple of blocks from the famous Raffles Hotel. Nice refreshing pool to cool down to escape the heat after exploring Singapore. In all a very pleasant stay with superb staff and would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: A Superb Experience
desc: We were pleasantly surprised at just how much we enjoyed our stay. Everything about the intercontinental is superb. The staff, the cleanliness, the food, the Club lounge, the bed, the pillows, the location. We highly recommend and will definitely return.

title: The staff makes all the difference
desc: We have stayed at the Intercotinental Singapore for many years and to us, it is always like home away from home. What makes it so good is the staff - they are always so welcoming, friendly and attentive and that is the most important thing. We've tried other establishments but always come back to the Intercon. On top of that, it is also conveniently located which is a bonus. The staff is just amazing especially Fiona G and the executive lounge team. Keep up the great work.

title: Short holidays in singapore
desc: Unbelievable Service in lobby, especially Mr Zin - wonderful, reads every whish in Our eyes! Everyone here is so kind , attentive and professional! All espeacial dishes are great! Kirchen really good and creative!

title: Outstanding! Probably the best Intercontinental property I stay in compared to Melbourne or Fiji,
desc: Exceptional mention to Ada (in the Club Lounge). She is awesome! She leads and works with an outstanding team. Always eager to help make your experience a better one each day. The lounge is a mainstay for a hard day in the office for regular guests and Ada makes a difference!

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: Everything about the hotel , room and service was excellent. I got the junior suite. The room was big enough for my parents and I with the sofa bed. The location was perfect with super easy access to food and public transportation. The staff was superb from check in to room cleaning staff to check out.

title: Wanna try local food? Food lovers Stay here, Great Location.
desc: No worries even though in heavy rain day with wheelchair. Hotel connect with Bugis Junction shopping mall & Bugis Plus, 4min walk to Bugis street which you can get local fresh fruits, Mango, Durian , watermelon etc‚Ä¶ Food court in mall, Albert food court , restaurants & cafe around this area by 5-8 min walking distance. Walking distance to visit the Cultural sightseeing, the famous Kuan Yin temple (Chinese temple), india temple, india street, arab street. MRT Subway/Metro just 100m near by. Call GRAB / Taxi with Very friendly concierge service mini birthday chocolate cake received after check in, so warm & sweet surprise from Hotel, memorable family trip

title: Man Fu Yuen üëç
desc: Great food and service by Ben and Moon. Definitely enjoy the experience and will come back to visit here more often now. Recommend place to come for authentic dim sum. Was never disappointed coming here and would organise more family luncheon and dinner here in future.

title: Singapore on a half-day post cruise indie excursion
desc: Wife and I got off Oceania Cruise. They and Intercontinental staff set us up for a day room. Hotel was ideally located at Bugis Junction shopping mall and MRT stop for one 4-hour sightseeing spree before getting to Changi Airport. Front desk, concierge and bellhops were friendly and efficient. Room was clean with great Wi-Fi signal and a coffee machine. James W. IHG card holder

title: I will be back!
desc: Delightful & comfortable stay. I would love to express my gratitude for the exceptional customer service provided by Fiona during my stay. Thank u Fiona for your attentive & outstanding service, your efforts have not gone unnoticed. For sure I‚Äôll be back! Thank you once again!

title: Birthday Staycation.
desc: We booked the staycation to celebrate my daughter's 21st birthday and it all turned out very well. We ordered some helium ballons to be sent to the concierge and the concierge did a fantastic job in putting up the balloon decorations. We would like to thank Ronnie and Mark from the Concierge team. Indeed they made the staycation a special one with their sincere services. Thank you!

title: Comfy stay
desc: Amazing stay! The bed was extremely comfortable and the shampoo smells really nice. The hotel staff were professional and friendly. The breakfast has a good selection of cuisine. Would stay with Intercontinental Singapore again in the future!

title: Wedding Dinner
desc: We had our solemnisation and wedding dinner at Intercon and they went very well with the help of Ester (wedding coordinator) and Mugilan! Before the wedding, Ester was very friendly and prompt in all her replies which really helped eased the anxiety from wedding planning. The feedback from food tasting was taken into consideration and the food on the actual day were all amazing! During the wedding, we were guided by Mugilan throughout the whole programme so we didn‚Äôt feel lost about what to do. From when to go and change for march in, pouring of champagne or even our speech, they were there to help us along the way. Because of this, we felt a lot less stressed as we didn‚Äôt have to manage our schedule on our own. After the wedding, we also got to enjoy amazing perks like

title: One of the best hotel in Singapore
desc: One word to describe: AWESOME! The moment I arrived in the hotel, every single staffs I came across had been nothing but friendly, nice and service oriented! The room that I stayed in came with Intercontinental Club access which is totally worthwhile. You get to have free high-tea from 3-5pm and cocktail from 6-8pm. The servings are very generous and you can always ask for more. During the cocktail session, the alcohol selection is great which ranges from Cocktail, White Wines, Red Wines, Beers and Spirits. For non-alcoholic guest, their mock tail, especially Mango Mule, is really good! In addition, you can choose to have your breakfast at either at the lounge (highly recommended) or the general buffet line at The Breakfast Club. Another advantage is that if you had club

title: One of the best stays! Excellent Club Lounge!
desc: Recently stayed at the IC Singapore on a good deal with points. I've stayed at around 8 ICs the last couple of years and this was easily the best experience. Probably one of the best stays overall too! A really nice start receiving a modest upgrade as a Diamond Ambassador (which the hotel is not obligated to provide for reward bookings). With lounge access, this hotel's Club Lounge was hands down the best (also one of the biggest!) I've been to so far. Manager Aisyah gives an amazing personal touch. All the Club Lounge staff provided excellent, thoughtful and friendly service. Special mention to Joseph for being a star and Zin for going above and beyond. The food offerings at the lounge were really good, and the daily special local dish at breakfast was delightful (loved the

title: Excellent Club Lounge
desc: The room with Lounge access is very convenience from Check-in to Check-out. Love the food and service at Club lounge. Very attentive and Friendly service. We will definitely come again for next visit.

title: Amazing Club Lounge!
desc: The King Corner Room was spacious with separate living area and 2 TVs (with Chromecast) - perfect for having friends over. Absolutely loved the Club Lounge - the Peranakan inspired decor was charming, the ambiance was relaxing while the food and beverage offerings were plentiful and well curated. Above all, the staff at the lounge was FABULOUS! The lounge got a bit busy during breakfast but the staff was always attentive and friendly. Highly recommended!

title: Our Wedding at Intercontinental
desc: We held our wedding at Intercontinental on 20 May. It was a beautiful 300 pax event held at the Grand Ballroom. Our wedding coordinator, Ester, was simply amazing & so efficient. It was such a joy & breeze working with her. She was also prompt in her responses & extremely professional. Everything from the planning, food tasting, check ins & the actual event ran seamlessly thanks to her & her team. On the wedding day, our banquet manager, Selva, was such a blessing as well. He guided us & our bridal party through & we received so much positive feedback from everyone be interacted with. Despite the hectic schedule, he was calm throughout & took the burden of time management off our hands. We could not sing higher praises of our experience & the wonderful team at

title: GreatBusiness Hotel
desc: We stayed as a group for meeting confrence for Daikin . We enjoyed our stay . Room was really clean and spacious . Hk did a very food job . I was offered free membership program also which is great. Thank u Shirish for all ur help . Hope i will come back soon.

title: Another fantastic InterCon stay
desc: Fantastic InterCon service as always from all staff encountered during our stay. Hugely comfortable bed and pillows, stayed at 5 hotels on our recent trip and this was the best nights sleep we‚Äôve had by far! Club InterCon is as always a huge benefit, with a great selection and fabulous continued service. We‚Äôll certainly be returning in the future.

title: A cosy & peaceful stay !
desc: The service from the check-n counter is excellent. Polite, friendly and efficient. The ambience is good. I love this place as it is buzzing with activities below but peaceful and serene upstairs, from the corridor to your room. A fantastic place to stay !

title: Quick Business Visit
desc: Business Trip, I was staying classic room and room is beautiful and real value for money . Their meeting space is huge and we enjoyed their service. I would like to mention Mr. Shirish whom i met upon departure and he was really helpful and another guy prakash who also assisted us with our luggae n taxi.

title: excellent
desc: excellent. can't fault any of their services... from start to end of my stay, they always provided excellent services. location is also perfect...near mrt,,near coffeshop hawker and shopping mall.. ..

title: Wedding Lunch at Intercontinental Singapore Grand Ballroom
desc: I would like to thank Ester Chong (Wedding Manager) and Siva (Banquet Manager) for their kind and prompt assistance during our wedding that was held on 25 June 2023. Prior to the actual day, Ester has been very helpful and assistive in ensuring all aspects are taken care of, and ensuring we did not miss out any details. It's great to have her in the organisation. She is not only professional in handling the whole event, but also very responsive to our message even at wee hours due to our busy schedule. Siva was the banquet manager during the event. His confidence and experience gave us the necessary assurance that the event on the actual day was run smoothly without any hiccups. It was a huge success! The guests loved the decor of the ballroom, not forgetting how delicious

title: One of Singapore's Finest Accommodations
desc: From the first moment we entered the Intercontinental Singapore we were treated very special indeed! The hotel facilities are clean and well-maintained to the highest of standards. Our chosen room was very comfortable and immediately felt like a second home throughout our entire stay. The Club Lounge is beautifully appointed with a dedicated team providing a quiet, calm and professional area to relax and work at any time of the day or evening. We would like to convey particular thanks to the following Club Lounge Team members: Nur aisyah Syahidah hamzah Anna lau Zin min ko Tan hock Kim Foo wai kit Joseph yap Afza amal Fatin patail Jovy We would also like to express our most heartfelt thanks to Shirish - Head Butler for personalising our hotel stay unlike any other

title: Bad food quality in Luce. Wifi was not stable.
desc: Sauce is very salty and food quality is no good at all. I don't see any service in the restaurant too. Front desk staff did not arrange to deliver my luggage to my room until I call to request. Staff at ambassador desk counter is very helpful, nice and professional. Housekeeping lady did a great job to make the room comfortable and tidy!

title: Wonderful Heritage Vibes and Chinese Food at Man Fu Yan
desc: The hotel is beautifully decorated and oozes peranakan heritage vibes. The staff are pleasant and the food at Man Fu Yan restaurant was tasty and delectable. A big shout out to Shawn the Chef, Chin Chin, Joanne Lai, Rene Tam, and Anna the assistant manager for making my family staycay and visit to the restaurant so pleasant.

title: Anniversary Staycation
desc: We have a great Staycation experience celebrating our Anniversary. The services and ambience is great. The Buffet breakfast at Luce has many varieties. Especially thanks to Mr Zin Minko for making our stay a memorable one.

title: Great Experience conducting hosting an business event in Hotel InterContinental Singapore
desc: We work closely with Hotel InterContinental Singapore Event team and Guest room team, and all is well managed on the Meeting Rooms and all the guests rooms. We appreciate Keith Su for for his professionalism, attentive to details and great support.

title: Nice room and nice location
desc: So far the stay is really nice and comfortable. We are well cared for by Wen Fei, the housekeeper. She is very nice for giving us extra water and clean our room very tidy. Looking forward to enjoy the rest of the stay. Thank you so much.

title: EXCELLENT
desc: Friendly, helpful and clean hotel. I lost my headset, they helped me find it. If you will go Singapore, I prefer to choose Intercontinental hotel. I am sure you will be satisfied. You can easily go anywhere from the hotel.

title: Great service, super food and whiskey bar
desc: I was keen to send a note of thank you for my recent stay at the InterContinental Singapore (80 Middle Rd). The service in each area was excellent, the food very nice and the whiskey bar was very welcoming! Of particular note for me was the outstanding assistance at Reception by Aishah, who was always so very helpful. From super efficient help with printing, to help with operating the TV and collecting items that I incorrectly left in my room after checkout, Aishash took personal ownership of resolving my request through to completion. It made my stay so much more smooth and effortless. Thanks again. John B

title: Charmagne is Review Worthy
desc: Outstanding! Stupendous! Superb! Perfect! If you're how a stay in Sing, stay at the Intercontinental! By the way, I'm doing this review for the number one reason which is for Charmagne at first services! She was excellent! =]

title: best meal ever
desc: this is the best place i‚Äôve ever been in my whole life this is a surreal experience thank you intercontinental i cant wait to come here again soon and have a really good stay with my friends and family,breakfast was amazing too

title: Splendid breakfast at the Club
desc: I enjoyed a truly splendid breakfast at Intercontinental club lounge. Many thanks to Joseph, Anna and Veron üëèüèºüëèüèº for their prompt service and pleasant demeanor! With this quiet and tranquil setting, I had a productive time of solitude and reflection over a warm cappuccino, waffles and French toast!

title: Great Service for Extended Suite Stay at InterContinental Singapore
desc: We recently completed an extended stay in a suite at Intercontinental Singapore on Middle Road. The property is well located walking distance to Bugis, Raffles City and Suntec City. We also walked underground to the Merlion through the City Link. Walk was 1.5 km (one mile) each way. The staff at the Intercontinental enhanced our stay. You know you have arrived when the iconic doorman meets your car. Moving inside, they have a special check in desk for Ambassador Elite guests. Guest services was very accommodating extending our reservations and making complimentary car transfers from and to the airport. The best part of our stay was the service overseen by the head butler who was available for us to contact but also checked in with us consistently throughout our stay.

title: Amazing Service
desc: Fantastic stay at InterconSIN. The room was comfortable and great, and we were spoilt for choice with the breakfast spread. The hotel is super convenient, a stone throw away from Bugis Junction, Bugis Plus and Bugis Village with lots of local delights. It is also very convenient to access the public transport as well. Highly recommend!

title: Love this place
desc: Magnificent hotel with all the amenities. The staff are amazing and willing to help in every way. The club floor crew, led by Zin and backed up by Joseph and A isha are like family and breakfast with Veron in charge is a hoot. Thank you for a wonderful 7 night stay. Would come again in a heartbeat.

title: Great experience
desc: Great room experience for me. Fluffy pillows and very neat room all through and great friendly house keep by Jia Long. I wish I could stay longer but it may be out of reach for me. Generally I did enjoy my stay. Thank you

title: Amazing stay and excellent service
desc: My wife, 4 year old son had a blast at Intercon Singapore. Their hospitality is fantastic from the moment you walk in. The hotel is beautiful and is one of the oldest buildings. The lounge is fantastic and we thoroughly enjoyed the high tea and evening drinks. One of the amazing things was when their head butler, Mr. shrish saw my son coloring his PJ mask and then next day he did a beautiful sketch. My son loved the gift and these small things and the efforts do matter. Their breakfast is amazing as well. Overall, excellent stay and amazing service.

title: 5‚≠êÔ∏è
desc: Everything was excellent, from check in and out. Breakfast spread was great, room service was prompt. Guest services were always accommodating to the request me and my family had. Overall a wonderful stay. Will come again and recommend this central location

title: Small room, Holiday Inn Express Service
desc: Stayed for four nights/five days in June to bring my Mother for her first trip to Singapore. Had high hopes for this property based on my Diamond status and good experiences at other InterContientals. The location is very good and the breakfast buffet was very impressive. However the room was small with a tiny shower and the service was indifferent. At one point I asked the front desk for some help with a small issue. The gentlemen standing there seemed annoyed that I was bother them. They did not offer any assistance nor were very forthcoming in giving advice on where I could buy the item I needed. When checking out, it was raining and the doormen did nothing to manage the small drop off/pick up area in front the lobby. A taxi ended up blocking the entire area for

title: Underwhelming experience
desc: We‚Äôve stayed at numerous IHG hotels but this is one is probably our least favorite. The reception are very hospitable even when they charged us an early check-in rate on a weekday during lean season ‚Äî this is a first time for us EVER. The rooms were extremely outdated. We only booked the standard room and it was obviously worn out. The chair was broken and it smelled of mold. The beds were wobbly and a bit unstable. But I guess you get what you paid for. We even started an internal meme because there was this piece of candy wrapper so obvious at the staircase and it‚Äôs been there since we arrived and was still there on our departure ‚Äî I made sure to throw it away. But it shows that some of the employees did not have an eye for detail and in the industry, that speaks

title: We stopped the world and got off here.
desc: It was a most enjoyable stay from the minute we arrived. Check in was swift and very friendly. Our room was excellent, quiet, well furnished and the amenities as expected. If I had any suggestion it would be to improve the quantity of drawers and cupboard space. This was limited for our requirements. Service from the staff on the club floor exceeded expectation and the eggs benedict amazing! We will be back.

title: Wedding reception
desc: Wonderful service by the team from Intercontinental Singapore! Never regretted our choice to host our wedding solemnisation and lunch reception at Intercontinental, with such a great location, pretty ballroom and hall! Food turn out amazing of course. The service before, during, and after was also impeccable! Thank you Stefanie and Selva for everything.

title: Intercontinental never fails to deliver.
desc: Lovely and attentive staff and a superb location near the Suntec Convention center. Right on top of Bugis Junction, so easy access to the MRT if you want quick transport. I usually have a club lounge access room, which suits me for business meetings and casual catch-ups. But for me it's the people that make this place great.

title: Excellent
desc: Indian spread at breakfast needs a lot of improving. Rest all is good and I look forward to coming back. Shirish, Sarah and Anna from HK were awesome. Thanks for the experience. Location is close by to buggies.

title: Bridal suite for two nights
desc: Bridal Suite was really pretty and especially comfortable ( very much needed after the wedding). Really enjoyed our stay there for two nights. Bonus point cause we managed to catch the fireworks from our room on Saturday night!

title: Fancy hotel
desc: A fancy hotel in a great location in Singapore that‚Äôs walking distance to many restaurants, bars, and shopping. My room was nice and spacious with a large bathroom - walk-in shower and tub. Friendly staff that always greeted you with a smile. Fitness center had three working treadmills and some free weights and it was usually hot‚Ä¶ the AC is automatically turns on at 6:10 am‚Ä¶ Lobby Lounge and Wanderlust bar served great drinks and cocktails. Club International on the 2nd floor always offered great breakfast option and happy hour drinks, appetizers, and hot plates.

title: Wonderful Stay with great hospitality‚Ä¶.
desc: Everything was very nice but would like to mention special courtesy by one of the Hotel Executive Sh. Shirish Shrivastav who has helped us a lot and was extraordinary cautious to make our stay comfortable.

title: Our experience in Intercontinental
desc: The staff were very sweet and helpful. Shirish and Kamesh always made us feel at home. The front desk and everyone we have encountered were extremely nice, friendly and helpful. The staff that also helped us find a taxi and helped us with the shopping bags we would bring bag alway greeted us with a smile! All the staff radiated such a positive and loving energy that will stick with us throughout our life

title: Fantastic, would gladly stay again
desc: The beds were divine! I have to say it was a wonderful stay for us. The people were incredibly helpful, and a special shout out to the weight staff in the executive lounge. Everyone made the whole family feel exclusive and taken care of!

title: Extra mile service and good experience at Lobby lounge
desc: Hayden L√†m at Lobby Lounge is really friendly and care about customers. He is really care about guest experiences and very happy Smiling Face. He walked to all the table and checked if the guest all are good üëç. Very high motivated person. Will coming back for his service

title: FEELING HOME
desc: Staying in the Intercontinental Singapore is a true delight every time I am there. Every staff member is genuine friendly and helpful. Nothing is too much. Very save and high quality of food and drinks but especially the gut feeling of being an appreciated guest here. Close to the lively Bugis and easy to travel to anywhere. I have the privilege to be guest at the club floor but all facilities are pleasant. There might be even more luxurious hotels but being far away for me it is important to feel at home.

title: Classy Stay! Awesome hospitality!!
desc: An exceptional property located right in the middle of Singapore‚Äôs business district. The property is classy! The hospitality matches the amazing infrastructure. We got amazing personalised service from the team. Being from India & being vegetarians traveling with an 8 ur old, we needed a little bit extra from the team & they came through like how. Special mention to Shirish, he took personal care of us.

title: Fun in Singapore!
desc: We had a great time in Singapore! Lynn the concierge recommended and scheduled a number of trips around town for us. Cooking class with a private instructor was really fun! We would definitely stay there again.

title: Great experience
desc: The room is extremelly clean, staff so helpfull, and the water is clear and flowly does not need long time to full the bathup. Easy right to bugis junction with a lot of food in the way to mrt station. Me and my family really enjoy our stay at intercontinental

title: Into it!
desc: A nice stay at Intercontinental. A large room and amenities that you‚Äôd expect from this hotel brand. A convenient location, close to trending cocktail bars, and plenty of Singaporean late night eats. I felt comfortable and well looked after.

title: Great stay in Intercontinental Singapore!
desc: The hotel room is very comfy and cozy. The location is super convenient. It‚Äôs just next to Bugis MRT station and Bugis Junction. Club Manager Nur Aisyah offered fantastic service to us. She even escorted us to the room herself. She made us feel like home. The staffs are also very attentive. Highly recommended!

title: Wonderful stay in your hotel, loved the club intercontinental, manager Kim was always so welcoming and charming.
desc: Housekeeping was faultless-excellent thank you . Bed was very comfortable . Housekeeping service was perfect thanks to Su Na . Also evening turn down service from young gentleman was excellent , sorry , I didn‚Äôt get his name ! All the staff here at intercontinental Singapore have been lovely, you have a great team .
