Club intercontinental manager , Kim always made so welcome and was a charming gentleman, thank you .

title: Wonderful staff
desc: The room service and clean team were excellent. Su Na was lovely and extremely thorough in her cleaning, we always appreciated coming back to our spotless room and restocked fridge! Would highly recommend.

title: Wedding Banquet on 03.06.2023
desc: My husband and I are really grateful to the sales coordinator, Ester Chong who promptly responded to our queries leading up to our wedding day! She was patient, and provided really good advices for our table seating arrangements. We're also super thankful to the banquet team for handling the hiccup immediately and ensuring that the dinner flow was smooth. Our guests enjoyed the food from Man Fu Yuan ;)

title: Top Staycation Experience
desc: Had a staycation with the family over the long weekend holidays in June. It was not our first staycation experience, but our first time ever had at IHG Bugis. Me and the family were made to feel welcome at check in the club lounge. We had an early check in, and were allowed late check outs. Drinks were always pro-actively served during our time in the lounge. Breakfast options were plentiful either at the breakfast restaurant or at the lounge. The executive lounge staff provided excellent service throughout and even offered a unicorn balloon to my daughter when she was making a fuss. Movie night for the kids during evening cocktail hours were also a hit with the family. It was a wonderful experience that we are planning our next return there soon. The only downside was

title: A memorable birthday staycation and luxury escape at Intercontinental Singapore
desc: Booked a 2 nights staycation with my family to celebrate my birthday. Intercontinental never failed to impress us and is our favourite must stay hotel in Singapore. Love the hotel ambience and the room layout and most importantly the top notch service given to the guests. From the moment I stepped into the hotel, I was greeted with warm smiles and exceptional service from Mr Fahmi that set the tone for an unforgettable experience. The location of the hotel is superb, situated in the heart of Singapore's cultural and historic district. I was within walking distance of numerous attractions such as the vibrant Bugis Street, the stunning Sultan Mosque, and the iconic Raffles Hotel. The nearby MRT station also made it incredibly convenient to explore the rest of the city. One aspect

title: Best stay!
desc: One of the best stays I had in awhile! The location of the hotel is perfect and there is a shopping mall as well so is crazily convenient. The staff were all very helpful and just smiles all around. I have to personally commend Ms Eeza, the manager who attended to me. I had a small cut on my finger (my own carelessness) and I just asked for a plaster. She just fishes out a plaster from her jacket and at the same time asked me if everything is okay. Her level of concern was truly remarkable and something I would not have expect since is just a small cut. Thank you once again to Ms Eeza and the team for the wonderful stay.

title: Spectacular!
desc: What a stay at Intercontinental! From the moment I checked-in until I left, everyone was amazing! I loved every interaction with all of the front desk, especially the Manager Eeza. She is truly amazing, sharing with me the best places to eat around the hotel (I haven‚Äôt been back home in Singapore for over 6 years). Moreover she kept reminding me to drink lots of water and to bring the umbrella out as the weather is brutal yet unpredictable! Truly the best stay I‚Äôve had!!!

title: Wonderful people
desc: I hv not stayed with the property however I was passing by and had some questions about the hotel. I was in luck as I had bumped into Eeza Jais, who had explained clearly on the facilities. She is knowledgeable and confident. She projects a good image of the hotel. A good ambassador indeed!

title: Genuine Service and Personalized Touches Make Every Stay A Story
desc: I've been staying at InterContinental Singapore for over 20 years and it is the team there that makes me truly feel like this is my second home. Attention is paid to every detail, genuine care and service delivered at every interaction, and every touch is personalized from the moment you walk in. From the GM and Hotel Manager, Andreas and Joyce, to the wonderful team at the Club Lounge with Kim, Ren, Nur, Idah, Dora, and Victoria, and my room attendant, Tom, the whole team was wonderful, as always. The beautifully restored Peranakan design cues and modern amenities further elevate the experience to create an oasis in the city, which itself is wonderful to explore and easy walk from the InterContinental Singapore, but it really comes down to the people that make every stay a

title: Amazing stay
desc: The arrival was good, staff was professional, we reached a bit early and the rooms weren‚Äôt ready so we were offered TEA/COFFEE at the All Day Dining. As soon as the room was ready, we were accommodated. The breakfast was very good and a very good spread. Tried the lounge opposite the All day dining, food was very good, service at the lounge is a bit slow and need to be looked at. Room cleanliness was very good and up to the mark. Special mention of Shirish at the front desk and also the pretty smiling lady who checked me out of #601 on 20th afternoon.

title: Lovely experience!
desc: Amazing staff hospitality, very attentive to us, friendly. Room is clean and exceeds expectations. Perhaps to update your pictures on all touch points to make it convincing for people to stay. I didn‚Äôt expect the stay to be luxurious. Thanks for having us. Suggest to present to customers the map of the hotel so we know the accessibility to Bugis Junction and Malay Street.

title: Most Elegant and Bespoke Hotel in Singapore
desc: Shirish and the entire team at the Intercontinental operate an absolutely outstanding, elegant and bespoke hotel. Everything from the design of the lobby to the classic cocktails by the pool, the comfortable beds and broadest room service menu in the city make me want to come back again. My chosen hotel in Singapore. I am also a Gold IHG member and couldn‚Äôt be happier with the program, hotels and resorts. Best in the world.

title: Beautiful Hotel and Team - Heart of the City
desc: Intercontinental Singapore provides exceptional service for business, personal and or family stays. They have a unique ability to create a wonderful hospitality experience in the heart of the city. From check-in, to rooms, to breakfast, coffee and wine at Lobby Lounge or dinning at Man Fu Yuan or Luce. This property provides all guests with an abundance of delicious options and coupled with great service. For those who opt to select Club Lounge rooms, you're stay is taken to a higher level. A beautiful sanctuary led by Aisyah and her team. You can enjoy made to order breakfast, tastefully designed high tea and a relaxing evening with canap√©s and drinks. A very attentive team, who know all the Club Lounge Guests. The Lounge is quiet, relaxing and is highly recommended. They

title: Amazing Stay & Wonderful Wedding Experience
desc: Very clean and remarkable service. I would like to compliment Stefanie (wedding coordinator) and Nazri (banquet manager) for fulfilling most of my requests, even last minute ones, to deliver such a great wedding experience for me and my wife. Housekeeping was exceptional too. We requested for housekeeping while we went for our morning breakfast, and in that short span of time, the room was all done up with items replenished when we returned to our room.

title: Fantastic location
desc: The hotel is located next to the MRT, shopping centres and a whole lot of restaurants. We stayed in the King Bed corner city view. It was a big, clean room. Staff were polite and had great customer service. Highly recommended. You will not be disappointed.

title: Superb customer service and excellent quality stay
desc: We had such a superb experience with our stay here. Top notch service from Jeff (thank you so much for your care and attention for our daughter Claudia) and lovely woman at check in and also great guy Suresh at check out (so sorry I didn‚Äôt catch your names!). Thank you for helping us find a late check out when jet lag had ruined us! Excellent comfortable bed, extremely clean room, great shower pressure. Would 100% stay again. And recommend!

title: Nice Hotel, Good Service and Great Location.
desc: We have not stayed at this hotel for quite long. Nice Hotel, good service and great location, we still get these things. Located next to Bugis Juction, we get easy access to the subway with lots of restourants and shipping centre around. For sure we will come back stay again at this Hotel.

title: Relaxing Stay
desc: My friend and I had a wonderful 5 nights.The staff could not do enough for us.Shirish and the staff in the Club room in particular were very friendly and helpful.We thoroughly enjoyed our breakfasts and the evening canapes.My room was immaculate and very comfortable. We are looking forward to our next visit.

title: A place like home
desc: A hotel where I would always be looking forward to stay in Singaore. You will feel the warm welcome of the staffs whenever you step foot in the hotel and very helpful ,caring too. Especially their housekeeping department (Wen Fei; in particular), never fail to keep my room clean and comfortable to stay in .

title: Still classy after all these years.
desc: Spent two nights here after a week at the Intercon in KL. It was around 15 years since my last visit and it was nice to see that the hotel is still classy after all these years. I used to stay here on a regular basis for work trips and got to know the hotel very well. We booked a Club King room and as top tier IHG members we received a complimentary upgrade to a Corner Club room. The room was well appointed and spotlessly clean, albeit a little on the tight side, especially the shower in which you could hardly turn around. There was a nice fruit bowl, mineral water and note from the Club Manager which was a nice touch. We found the bed to too firm for our liking but this is a common thing in Asian hotels. The in-room amenities were excellent although we wished they‚Äôd

title: Attentif service by staff of Mr Magen
desc: Breakfast: excellent variety. Good quality. Staff restaurant kind and attentif. A real pleasure! A special remark for Bread and vienoiserie corner. Waffles are crispy and with nice bite. Size of Croissants not too big.

title: well
desc: The room is not very spacious, but clean and comfortable. Toilet very nice, except for the toilet there is no place to plug in a hairdryer. The corridor sockets can be used for hairdryers but there is no light on the mirror. The corridor of the room is too winding and it is like walking through a maze every time you go out

title: Great Weekend Getaway
desc: Special thanks to Charmagne who has been of great help. She has made our staycation experience a wonderful one. Overall experience (room, food & hospitality) is great except for parking. We stayed for 2 nights. Charmagne has helped to resolve by arranging for valet service. On top of that, in recognition of the IHG Ambassador membership, she arranged for a special upgrade.

title: Solemnisation, wedding banquet & bridal suite
desc: We had our wedding solemnization & banquet at InterContinental Singapore. Service given to us was great, even prior to the wedding day and stay. Love the Peranakan & colonial vibes of the hotel. Staff were attentive to our guests at the banquet and our wedding coordinator supported to all our requests. The bridal suite was amazing! Will recommend InterContinental as part of your special day or a staycation!

title: Very pleasant stay !
desc: Superb refurbishment of the rooms, great service and flexibility throughout the stay. Good guest recognition leading to a very pleasant experience. And of course, the convenient location right next to Bugis Junction.

title: Fabulous hotel stay
desc: The staff at Intercontinental Singapore are truely exceptional and catered to our every need. Thank you Zin and Joseph and all the staff. The club lounge is fabulous with authentic decor and great for relaxing. The food and drinks were really good with plenty of healthy options. We give this hotel 5 stars and will be back.

title: Great place to stay
desc: Good choice of pillows for a good night sleep. Very good location. What's refreshing was all the staff seem so ready to help n very friendly. Makes one feel at home. Unlike many new hotels with wide expansive spaces, this hotel is converted from a old classical building giving it a cozy warm feel.

title: Its became my top list hotel so far
desc: Everything was just perfect all helpful staff and the best service and the room are so comfortable, Club lounge was great relax working space. The convenient location next to shopping area and MRT ....Thank you and will be back next trip

title: A True Gem of a Hotel in Singapore
desc: What can I say about the Intercontinental Singapore that I haven‚Äôt said in previous reviews. It‚Äôs the best! This is our 10th year of staying here and we love it as if it was our first stay. The staff are all so friendly and always there to assist. If you can, try to stay in a club room because the club lounge is an oasis from the daily hustle and bustle of Singapore. A place to enjoy a quiet breakfast as well as drinks and canap√©s in the evening. Give the Intercontinental Singapore a try, you won‚Äôt be disappointed.

title: Exceeded expectations
desc: My gf and i had a wonderful stay at the intercontinental. Club lounge is definitely the place to be if you‚Äôre staying there. It is cozy and has a wide variety of food with great selection of drinks, accompanied with friendly staffs. We had a good chat with the manager Aisyah. She is very hospitable and professional in her service. Do look for her if you‚Äôre staying there!

title: Great stay
desc: Very conveniently located. It‚Äôs connected to major shopping malls in the area as well as MRT stations. Also super easy to get around with a Grab. Good services. Good food. Cleaning crew Wen Fei has been doing a great job.

title: 5 star service and more
desc: Held my son‚Äôs first birthday at the Library function room and was impressed by the space and food servings. The service staff were very helpful and attentive. Definitely 5 stars service in a five star hotel. My one-night stay in the city view suite was really enjoyable too. The room‚Äôs decor gives off a very cozy and timeless aura which made the stay even more relaxing and enjoyable. I thank Belvin and his team (Fiona and service staff) for their hospitality and service.

title: best for business and family!
desc: options of pillow! imagine that! really good.. so comfy and homey.. location smack in the middle of major tourist attractions. on top of MRT, same location as bugis junction, plenty of authentic singapore cuisine.

title: Top notch service and food
desc: Great service from Ms Stefanie (Wedding Planner), Mr Selva and the hotel room service staff! Great experience from the start till the end, I am glad I chose Intercontinental Singapore for my wedding the staff had shown patience and professionalism. Room service and housekeeping was top notch, housekeeping staff was friendly and meticulous to our needs too! Definitely look forward to have another chance to stay at Intercontinental Singapore.

title: Pleasant Family Stay with 2 Toddlers
desc: We had a pleasant 2 nights stay over the weekend, warm welcomed by the Service Team. Extremely pleased with the services rendered. Encountered a situation in the washroom at late night, which was responded very quickly within 5 minutes.

title: Lovely hotel in Singapore
desc: We really enjoyed our stay at the intercontinental Singapore. Beautiful city hotel and very centrally located. The MRT was just downstairs. The heritage rooms were great. Hafizah‚Äôs service was outstanding and made our stay particularly pleasant.

title: Excellent room standards. Su Na from the cleaning team did a great job. The hotel staff were very friendly.
desc: Great housing cleaning attendant Excellent room standards. Su Na from the cleaning team did a great job. The hotel staff were very friendly and gave good tips on where to shop and what to do during my free time over the weekend. The food at the lobby bar was tasty.

title: A fantastic experience
desc: We had an enjoyable stay at Intercontinental Singapore. The staff made us feel welcomed right from when we entered the hotel. We had the privilege to enjoy the club lounge and the lounge manager (a malay guy whom we did not managed to get the name of) was extremely hospitable. He brought us for a tour of the lounge and explained to us the timings for the hi-tea etc. Staffs were also attentive during the hi-tea and cocktail sessions with them constantly checking on us if we needed anything. I would definitely stay at Intercontinental Singapore again.

title: Nice stay
desc: Hotel is very clean and the staff are polite. Location is great as this is connected to a reasonably priced mall, and MRT. You can walk to a local market and hawker center to experience local food and environment

title: ÊúçÂãôÈùûÂ∏∏Â•ΩÁöÑÈ£ØÂ∫ó
desc: The InterContinental Hotel is a hotel that cares about its guests. From the check-in reception, it is very caring. It is very attentive to everything about the guests. The cleaning of the rooms is also done very carefully. It is a hotel worth staying in again.

title: High quality
desc: Clean, perfectly polite staff, nice food, great location. The good service extends through the foyer to the breakfast and also the cleaning staff. We appreciated that staff members quite often remember our names. We intend to stay there again when next in Singapore.

title: Family hotel stay experience in Singapore
desc: We stayed at Intercontinental Hotel for 5 nights. Our whole experience was very comfortable and felt just like being home. Overall we got fantastic service in the hotel and also had a very caring and professional housekeeper Wenfei. Because we have a 18 months old baby with us so she needs take a nap everyday and our housekeeper he always comeback and clean after my daughter‚Äôs nap time. We do really appreciated his service and made our stay more enjoyable. We will definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Fantastic stay
desc: Had a great experience at Intercontinental Singapore. Spacious rooms, great facilities, very clean and great service from the staff. Special thanks to Chia Yi of the front desk staff who was so lovely and helpful throughout my stay.

title: Wonderful time at Intercontinental SG
desc: The people here are really friendly and they make you feel like home! The house keeping lady Su Na, the Club server Azfar and the welcome ladies Charmagne, Wasana, Chia Yi Ida, concierge Jeff and Jabriel are all super helpful! They treat you as a friend and they give you all the info about the hotel and services. The highlight of the experience was that you could borrow the Kabayan dress to take photos! Azfar offered to help take many for me:) And the girls offered to take pics with me! Location is superb as well, there‚Äôs a shopping Center right behind it.

title: Excellent service
desc: Wonderful stay at this beautiful hotel. We spent the weekend at this well located hotel. It is close to the main synagogue where we wanted to be for shabbat. The hotel staff was particularly accommodating to our needs and helped us with elevator and room access. Social call it to Prakash who was fantastic and very attentive

title: Very great five star Intercontinental Hotel !
desc: Stay here for 2 night and it was very incredible, all the staff was very helpful and kind, start from the front desk, doorman, bell boy etc, very initiative. Room facilities are very awesome, the location is perfect, next to Bugis Junction. Breakfast also very delicious, a lot of food types. The property are mix of old colonial and modern era, very elegant. Intercontinental service are top notch!

title: Service above and beyond expectations
desc: This was our second stay at the Intercontinental Singapore and, once again, it did not disappoint. The level of comfort is as good as it gets.... Loved being able to select my preferred pillow to ensure a great night's sleep. The service from the staff we interacted with was beyond expectations. We had the privilege of meeting the Head Butler, Shirish, who not only assisted us with directions but took the trouble to put us on the right path to our destination. We stayed in a Club Access room and every time we entered the Club Lounge we were greeted by name and welcomed with a genuine warmth. With its central location in the Bugis district, the hotel is a convenient stepping off point to all the amazing attractions of Singapore. We know we will be back!

title: Remarkable Hospitality
desc: Remarkable Hospitality Stayed in July for couple of nights and everything went smooth because of Mr. Shirish whom we met in lobby upon arrival. He helped us fix our bathroom without even asking as he read our mind . This one really exceeded our expectations. Room was clean and housekeeping was great. Best part is hotel is located in very nice location and everything is just 10-15 mints distance. Only one thing I would like to say that breakfast is really crowded. Rest everything went well. Thank you for great service.

title: Comfortable 5 nights in Intercontinental
desc: Stayed for 5 nights and had the most comfortable 5 nights. Room is large with so much space and I enjoyed the bath tub. Room service is so kind enough to leave me a heartfelt note to warn me of the heat wave!

title: Wedding banquet
desc: Had our wedding done over in intercontinental and the service was great! Shout out to Ester who was the wedding coordinator & Mugilan who was the banquet manager for our wedding! Bridal suite was well prepared as well except that its slightly smaller than others, the normal rooms were good as well!

title: Great stay
desc: Due to the peak season, I was not able to have the room upgraded as the ambassador. However, they said they would give me 10000 points. The staff are very helpful. Room is clean as always. Will recommend to friends.

title: Head Butler Extraordinaire
desc: Outstanding service and attention by the Head Butler Shirish Shrivastava, we arrived from our overnight flight from Frankfurt very tired, we asked for an early check in, and as the hotel was full Shirish gave us a complementary breakfast in the Club Lounge and shortly returned with our room keys, having found us a room. He went over and above our expectations.

title: Excellent choice
desc: Excellent location. Right next to the MRT and Mall. Everything from food to shopping to amenities. Service is great. Attentive, professional and thoughtful. Rooms are spacious, clean and nicely furnished.

title: An experience in itself!
desc: Upon arrival, we were completely enamoured by the elegant interiors which reminded us of the colonial era. The staff welcomed and treated us like long lost friends and we were very soon taken to our room upon check-in. Coming to the room, it was unlike any other I had ever seen. The room was huge, beautiful furnishings coupled with some choice retro electronics in perfect contrast to the modern technologies (even the bathroom had speakers which were linked to the TV in the room) adorned the interiors. The beds, the most comfortable ones I have ever slept on, pulled me in deep slumber very quickly. The breakfast spread consisted of cuisines from around the world, something for everyone. Being a vegetarian this was a big relief. The food was as good as you can imagine. The

title: Amazing Experience at Intercontinental Singapore for our Wedding Banquet with help of Ester, our Sales Manager
desc: Held our Wedding Banquet last weekend at Intercontinental Singapore Grand Ballroom and I have to say the service has been top notch. I want to give a 5 star shout out to Ester, our sales manager for the amazing service and assistance for our needs in preparation for our wedding night. She has been thorough, meticulous and kind in helping us achieve our dream wedding night. From table arrangement to arranging our hotel suite, she had made sure we are comfortable and everything has been taken care of. Thanks to Ester, we had a blast and the wedding night went incredibly smooth. Intercontinental Singapore is an ideal venue to host your weddings and events for its big event venue with aesthetic architecture and great lighting/sound system. 100% Recommend!

title: Amazing Buffet - Outstanding service
desc: The service is amazing and they staff are so friendly and accommodating. The food is the star of the buffet with food range of Dim Sum, Indian, Western, variety of Eggs to order, cheeses and meats and desserts that were amazing. In short an epicurean delight that should not be missed

title: Wonderful staycation with mum and sister
desc: Wonderful stay with my mum and sister. Been here many times. The staff here never fails to provide good service -from front counter to house keeping to club lounge and during breakfast. This round is no difference. Check in was smooth and staff was warm. Throughout our stay staff provided great service especially Josiah Gwee. From helping us with the reservation to making our stay a very comfortable and welcoming one. Breakfast was great too. Mum was impressed with the spread and quality of food

title: A pleasant stay for a short break
desc: Pros: friendly and supportive staffs both in reception and club lounge Specious room and good location, adjoining shopping centre and closed to MRT. Cons: bathroom amenities was not fully replaced on my second day stays. Buffet lunch at Man Fu Yuen was below standard for their price, some dishes were cold or just warm.

title: Perfect stay for both business and pleasure!
desc: The highlight of my stay was undoubtedly the event held in the hotel's grand ballroom. What truly set this experience apart was the hotel's remarkable event planning and execution team. They demonstrated an extraordinary ability to accommodate even the most challenging and last-minute requests with grace and efficiency. The event itself was a resounding success, and I was amazed at how flawlessly everything ran. What impressed me most was the staff's ability to handle unexpected requests with ease. Despite the inevitable changes and challenges that arise during large events, the team remained composed and adaptable, ensuring that every guest's needs were met. Their willingness to go above and beyond to ensure a seamless experience truly left a lasting impression on me and my

title: Lounge Experience
desc: A super nice place for casual business discussion or business associates catch up. Ordered some finger food and drinks. Prices are extremely reasonable if you are IHG member. Hotel staffs are also very attentive and helpful.

title: Wonderful holiday.
desc: Have just returned from another stay at the wonderful InterContinental Singapore. From the Managers, Joyce Chua & Judy Koh through to their wonderful staff: Kamlesh, Shirish, Nick, Fahmi, Nur to name but a few, we received wonderful care and service from the moment the Concierge opened our door until we said goodbye. Breakfast selection excellent. We were fortunate this visit to have a butler experience and a wonderful experience it was. Nothing was a trouble to Kamlesh and we all still talk of the thoughtful touches, not to mention all of the delicious and artistic creations that surprised us on our return of an evening. This hotel is so well situated . As IHG members we were also able to enjoy the calm and ambience of the Club Lounge. The food and beverages on

title: Wonderful experience with Bubbly and Enthusiastic Staff
desc: Breakfast.. most important meal of the day. To be served and greeted by Ms Foo Wai Kit for our breakfast made it even more fulfilling. Despite the semi buffet setting, her smile and going the extra mile made a huge difference for us. Thank you Wai Kit for improving the start of our day.

title: Friendly
desc: Nice ! Friendly staff, nice breakfast, great location, clean and cosy room with beautiful interior. White toned building is lovely, staffs are caring and very near to MRT station and Bugis Junction. Highly recommend.

title: Great hotel for stopover or short stay.
desc: The intercontinental Singapore is a great place for a short stopover or long break. This was our 5th stay here and won‚Äôt be the last. Staff are so professional and friendly. Hotel is in a very convenient location right next to Bugis Junction and the MRT station. We stayed in a Club Access Room which comes with the benefits of breakfast, High Tea, Evening drinks and canap√©s as well as all day snacks and non alcoholic drinks. Pool, although on the small size, is a welcome relief from the hot humid weather of Singapore. Rooms are spotless, of good size and well maintained. The only issue I had was with the booking. I booked a King Classic Club Access Room but the booking showed a Heritage room and so I was upgraded, as an Ambassador Member, to the room I actually booked. I showed

title: APPRECIATION TO THE CUSTOMER SERVICE
desc: My stay here was pleasant due to assistants from the duty manager, siti aishah. Fnb server, kaiyum was very funny and friendly. He got good customer relation with us. I enjoyed my 2 days 1 night stay here. Would definitely go again. üëç

title: Pleasant stay
desc: The Duty Manager Siti Aishah was very attentive when we were checking in. Superb customer service. F&b server Kaiyum at the pool bar were very polite and friendly. Funny guy. Thumbs up. I enjoyed my stay here.

title: Stay At Intercontinental
desc: The stay were great! From CI till we CO. CI was smooth. Duty manager Siti Aishah was really friendly and kind! Later tht evening we went to the pool, enjoy couple of drinks by the pool staff Kaiyum was great! He definitely know how to make us feel like home. Great first time experience! Will come back again, and definitely recommend to others!

title: Awesome experience, dwarfed by rude concierge incident.
desc: Been an enjoyable weekend at Intercon, having our beautiful room and time to ourselves for our anniversary date. Had the check-in facilitated by both Tharani and Shirish, who held up a good conversation with us during our check-in even through they were overwhelmed with other bookings. It was very nice of them to remember our anniversary and send a chocolate cake to celebrate with. The room was beautiful, having the accents of an old British royalty feel while a newly renovated bathroom puts the icing on the cake. Kudos to the housekeeping staff, Eddy who made the room for us. Spent the wonderful night at LUCE with one of the most amazing Italian food we had. ‚Äî ‚Äî Everything was brilliant up to the point of check out. As my wife was handling the checking out process,

title: Wedding at The Library and Pet Suite Stay
desc: My wife and I got married at The Library in a small family only ceremony. Ester and Fiona were amazing and made sure that we got everything we needed. Thanks a lot! We upgraded our complimentary room to the pet-friendly suite and our puppy loved it as well. The room was a square with 4 main areas al connected by doors and he spent a good amount of time running in circles and generally had a great time.

title: Excellent hotel where Lounge Access is value for the money.
desc: As a customer that have spent about two thirds of my adult life in hotels this is without a doubt one of the very few where I felt at home. Staff all the way from curbside to the Intercontinental Lounge are doing their utmost to accomodate you in every way. I think this is the hotel where a Lounge access is well worth the money. The staff always attentive and friendly. This hotel is definitely the place to stay while in Singapore.

title: Great location, friendly service
desc: Amazing location and service. Staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, just ask for anything you need. They were accommodating and gave great recommendations. Some of the things on the tourist information card were out of date (Chinatown Heritage Museum is closed now) so make sure you check, but the getting around in Singapore is easy and there is so much to see that even if you make a wrong turn it isn't a problem. The hotel is right by Bugis Junction so if you forget anything it is super easy to get it, or buy gifts right downstairs before you leave. MRT is minutes away.

title: Wonderful Service
desc: Very impressed at the service I have received from the staff at the hotel. Hotel room is very well presented and facilities at hotel are first class. I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Singapore. A worthy experience.

title: Perfect relaxation place in Singapore!
desc: Very clean Hotel and helpfull Staff. Location good to reach singapore highlights. Special thanks to club lounge Persons: joseph, fatin and zin. Pool area is not big but still enough for children to swin and Enjoy holiday in the heart Of big city. Fully recommendations to future visitors!

title: Great friendly service
desc: The staff was extremely friendly. Check in experience has been great and very accomodating given I was travelling with 2 young kids. The man helped with carrying luggages and was very friendly. Great so far.

title: Great staycation
desc: Was there for one night staycation. Had a great stay. The room is big and clean. Staff was helpful from check in to breakfast. Charmaine helped me look for an available room when I checked in early. The staff at the breakfast were friendly. Saw a waitress asking a mum, who was alone with a toddler, what she wanted from the buffet and brought them to her. Great service.

title: My very good experience with Intercon
desc: Everything was so convenient at this hotel. From covered walkway to easy access to Bugis Junction. I can ever walk underground around 500-1000 metered from the hotel. I also like that they clean the hotel every now and then. The bathrooms are clean and more than large enough.

title: Hotel with great service & heart ‚ù§Ô∏è
desc: We stayed at the Intercontinental Hotel for 2 nights to celebrate my mum‚Äôs birthday. From the start to the last day, all the hotel staff -the front desk, ambassadors, service staff, porters and cleaners were friendly and helpful. They were genuinely concerned especially when they saw my mum was in a wheelchair and always asked if we needed help. The rooms were clean, spacious and the food standard and the variety is excellent. I did not know but a staff told me there are wheel chair friendly rooms. I will definitely check this out on my next visit. Thank you Intercontinental Hotel for a pleasant and wonderful staycation!

title: 10/10 Stay!
desc: Great stay at the Intercontinental Hotel especially the Club Lounge and the staff that served us were amazing. Had a few mishap upon arrival because we requested an extra bed prior to arriving and there wasn't any in the room but that was quickly resolved by the housekeeping team. Also they delivered a really nice cake for my parents who were celebrating their anniversary. Thank you Nur, all the staff at Club Lounge and everyone at Intercontinental who made our stay a wonderful experience.

title: Totally recommend!
desc: Fantastic stay. Very glad we decided to go with a club room. The club lounge at this IC is very special! The food and beverage is especially good. Breakfast, afternoon tea and Canap√©s hour all exceeding expectations.

title: Good hospitality
desc: This is my second time stay at Intercontinental Singapore. I was impressed with their hospitality. Any request and response are very fast too. Our room was upgraded to Junior Suite King Bedroom which is very spacious and more comfortable. I'm very grateful. Can't wait to stay at Intercontinental again on my next visit to Singapore. Thank You..

title: Bad experience with Intercontinental Hotel SG
desc: No parking lot provided. The hotel expected a foreign tourist to find their parking lot themselves! What a bad experience for me & family! End up I drive round & round the area for more than 30 minutes to search for parking lot at 11.30 pm mid night!

title: Staffs in Club Intercontinental are Superb!!!
desc: The reason why I keep coming back to this property is definitely the staffs in Club Intercontinental. The quality of service delivered by them during my last trip has convinced me that I can always rely on this hotel for the home-away-from-home feeling. I have my own daily routine and like things to remain the same. For example, I eat an apple every morning before I start my breakfast and I always have a vegetable noodle soup every morning while I'm staying with this property. Club Intercontinental staffs know my preference and they always fulfill my request before even I ask for it. However, the first morning during my last stay, I was told that the menu has been changed after new Executive chef came and my favorite menu is no longer available. I tried the new menu, but I

title: Wedding in The Library
desc: Had our wedding in their cozy venue overlooking the National Library. Everything was even better than we imagined. Stefanie, our venue organizer, helped us to accommodate our surprises guests and extra food. Nazri, the banquet manager, was attentive and managed our guests and accommodated to their dietary requirements with no flaw, professionalism, efficiency and personal touch. The venue itself was so beautiful and perfect to our needs. We wanted something intimate and cozy for close friends and family. Unknown to us, we could also enjoy the firework display as it was during NDP practice. Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. Thank you to the whole team who made it happen!

title: Best hotel
desc: I have been here a few times and it always is the best hotel experiences I have. Staff is very helpful, effective and friendly and hotel is very tidy and quiet. Special mention to Rafael Eswaran who was super attentive during my visits to the lounge

title: Wonderful living experience in Inter Continental Hotel Singapore
desc: Very convenient location, excellent food in hotel, numerous restaurants and shops nearby. The high level of room cleanliness is well maintained by Lu Mei. Excellent service provided by the hotel staff.

title: GREAT STAY
desc: everything perfect - really nice people everywhere I used the Club access and food, drinks and service was really good. I would go back for my next business trip to Singapore. The Hotel includes a great Italian Restaurant.

title: Location, Front Desk
desc: Good Location. First, I met the girl Front Desk to register check in. I check in about 10 AM because just came back from the cruice. She said the room not ready, if ready she will call me dan my luggage will pick up the room. I came back to hotel about 7PM, i complain my luggage still at lobby and ask my room to a man front desk why my luggage still at lobby and give twin bed, i already booked king bed, after that waiting long time to change room to be king bed. I am VERY DISAPPOINTED Front Desk at Intercontinental Singapore.

title: At Home at the Intercon.
desc: I always feel at home whenever I am at the Intercontinental especially with the room upgrade extended to me by the Guest Relations Manager, Ms. S. Hamzan. She was so lovely and gracious and really appreciate it. I was very comfortable and would always choose to stay at the Intercon. Whenever, I am in SG, I always choose to Live the Intercontinental Life".

title: Absolutely amazing!
desc: We had an absolutely amazing experience staying at InterContinental Singapore. The staff was very welcoming and assisted us with any matter, the room was spacious and clean and the location super central. Food options were really outstanding! Never saw a breakfast buffet which covered all dietary needs this well with such a great diversity. I could even get my coffee latte with oatmilk! We enjoyed our time to the fullest and will be back!

title: It was an enjoyable stay once again
desc: We returned to the hotel for our short stay since we were there four years ago. Apart from one request which the housekeeping team has missed out, the room was prepared accordingly prior to our arrival. The room was clean, functional and comfortable. Drinks prepared by the Palms Champagne & Pool Bar was thirst quenching and delicious. We would like to once again thank Ms Eeza and all members that were involved in making our stay comfortable and enjoyable.

title: Excellent hotel - club lounge is the best
desc: Excellent Hotel especially for families Good position - excellent and friendly staff - good selection of restaurants BUT the best bit is the Club Lounge - the staff in the lounge are fantastic and our granddaughter ( 3years old ) was allowed to stay with us in the lounge for evening canapes/drinks - this was the highlight of our family holiday - we were always made welcome and this was appreciated

title: Excellent hotel - club lounge is the best
desc: Excellent Hotel especially for families Good position - excellent and friendly staff - good selection of restaurants BUT the best bit is the Club Lounge - the staff in the lounge are fantastic and our granddaughter ( 3years old ) was allowed to stay with us in the lounge for evening canapes/drinks - this was the highlight of our family holiday - we were always made welcome and this was appreciated

title: wonderful
desc: Amy she is the best and kamlesh always available professional. coming back soon to see them again.they have been there all the time we needed their helps.when you have these people around you you an not feel alone

title: Good vibe and good service!
desc: Overall we enjoyed our stay here at Intercontinental Singapore. The transport is convenient. The room service was great! The cleaner Jian Hao cleaned our room very well :) Thank you very much for keeping our room tidy and clean.

title: Best ever in IHG hotel
desc: Room was great and kids had thier fun. Best services received so far with IHG group. Donavan from front desk was greatly helpful in attending to our needs and enquiry, and young man Azhar or Azfar, couldn't get fis exact name was extremely friendly while checking out from hotel. Would definately be back, thanks to the entire team from Intercon SG, perfect stay!

desc: The restaurant manager NADDA's service was very considerate. After staying in the intercontinental for four days, breakfast made us feel at home every day. Because we are with the baby, we will prepare the baby chair every day, and will ask us about our needs. Intimate service is a crucial strength of a hotel. I think we will choose to stay again next time we come to SingaporeÔΩû

title: Amazing service
desc: Best breakfast service ever. Friendly staff. There was a lot of variety from the breakfast buffet. Chef was helpful and staff assisted me in every way possible. Morning nasi lemak was so great! The asian food was also good.

Thank you!

title: Beautiful Club Lounge with Excellent Service
desc: The Beautiful Club Lounge with Peranakan theme. Very helpful staffs lead by Manager Aisyah,Josiah and Anna. Especially Zin and Fatin were very friendly and beautiful smile. Maintain your great service.Will be back again.

title: A home away from home
desc: Stayed in IC every month when im back for business. The staff has an excellent service culture. From the concierge to reception to housekeeping and dining. This trip i had the room with a free upgrade, which is brilliant. This morning breakfast met Magh which has the warmest smile and one can feel that he is serving with his heart. The manager Naad has been welcoming and checking in. The housekeeper rearranged my toiletries like a make up counter(rm 1527). Cant thank them enough. The quality is getting better despite they are short of employees. Keep the good work up. Will definitely be returning!

title: Awesome
desc: Jenny Mah was very friendly and helpful. She remembered us and called us by name even though we haven‚Äôt been here in a year. The manager and staff was also amazing at the Breakfast room and Lobby Lounge. Dora was amazing ensuring everything ran smoothly at my mom‚Äôs 90th birthday party at the Lobby Lounge.

title: A Truly Remarkable Stay
desc: If I could give more than 5 stars for our recent stay at Intercontinental Singapore (Middle Rd)I would do it in a heartbeat. From the moment we stepped foot into the lobby until the time we reluctantly checked out, the hotel staff exceeded all of our expectations in terms of customer experience. First and foremost, the warm and genuinely welcoming reception we received upon arrival instantly made us feel at home. The front desk staff, with their infectious smiles and helpful attitude, ensured our check-in process was smooth and hassle-free. The room itself was nothing short of luxurious. Immaculately clean, elegantly decorated, and equipped with all the modern conveniences one could expect, it truly felt like a home away from home. The attention to detail, from the premium

title: Excellent service
desc: Nice bed and good pillow for a good night sleep. Excellent service and all our request and kate checkout was permitted. Room was big, excellent location around hotel, easy accessible through transport to everywhere.

title: Improved second stay
desc: 2nd stay at the Intercontinental Singapore- hotel's operations felt much more streamlined and efficient. Staff at the lobby were proactively asking guests if they needed any help and also expediting the check-in process. Calls and requests were fulfilled timely and room was no longer as noisy as previously Interactions with staff generally pleasant. Encountered an issue that was resolved timely and satisfactorily.

title: Relaxed and comfortable
desc: Thank you to Fahmi for welcoming our family ever so kindly and going the extra mile to ensure our comfort. Shout out to Jenny Ong for the great and prompt table service. We will definitely come back again.

title: The best hospitality hotels
desc: We used this hotel for a family holiday with my elderly mother. It is connected to the train station and a large shopping mall. The location is very convenient. A cozy and relaxing hotel, unlike the big modern hotels. Above all, the staff are excellent. Sightseeing, dining, shopping... all consultations were answered appropriately and we had a very fulfilling hotel experience. I would like to stay the hotel again next time!

title: Have a best experience in Singapore.
desc: hotel is connected to mall , MRT , near to Clark quay , little India and Marina Bay ( walking distance).what else you want.best experience in Singapore till now for me. Staff is so helpful and ready to help anytime anyday without any hesitance. Good quality food variety you can taste in breakfast, lunch and dinner. special thanks to 2 staff 1) ( Mrs ) ( i forgot her name sorry )who guided us for map near hotel sitting left side of reception table and 2) Mr Shirish Shrivastav - is helpful , caring and best part is he puts a smile on face of staff and tourist .. it's a very unique quality and I don't think so so many people have it ( I am writing this pure due to his work commitment not because of I am Indian ).

title: Amazing
desc: Intercontinental great experience amazing dining wonderful server very friendly helpful Adbul latherf it is excellent it is excellent recommended place wonderful band they have great choice of food and it is wonderful night amazing

title: Birthday celebration stay at Intercontinental Hotel, Bugis - HAPPY!
desc: The service at the Club Lounge was impeccable! From check-in, high tea, evening drinks, breakfast and late check out. I'll give the team a 6 stars. Our room was large, clean and well furnished with a very thoughtful happy birthday greetings on the mirror & cakes on the table. Very impressive! Dinner (for 9 paxs) at Man Fu Yuan was awesome - food and service were lovely too. Our night drinking with some family members at the Lobby lounge was unfortunately not as great. We wanted to be seated closer together so it will be easier for us to chitchat, drink/toast and share some nibbles but was told that is not possible. We end up moving our chairs closer to each other ourselves. We were there from 9.45pm till closing. All in all my one night stay at this hotel is a happy and

title: Indulge in royalty. Awesome experience high tea at Intercontinental Singapore. Awesome service by anna and Zin.
desc: Indulging in the afternoon tea at the Intercontinental Hotel's FnB was an absolute delight. Anna and Zin's exceptional service added an extra layer of elegance to the experience. Their attention to detail in explaining the array of treats and tea selections was impressive. If you're seeking a refined and delightful afternoon tea experience, the Intercontinental Hotel is the place to be, where Anna and Zin's outstanding service shines through.

title: Wedding Banquet on 5 Aug 2023
desc: We would like to express our sincere gratitude to Ester, Boon Wee and the team members at Intercontinental Singapore Middle Road for their exceptional work in planning and executing our wedding dinner on 5 Aug 2023. Their dedication and professionalism made our once-in-a-lifetime event truly memorable and stress-free. Ester, in particular, was an outstanding sales manager and coordinator. She went above and beyond in every aspect, from the initial planning stages to the flawless execution of the event. As for Boon Wee, the banquet manager, his attention to detail was remarkable, ensuring that every aspect of the banquet, including the march-in music, and tea ceremony was perfectly arranged. The rest of the team members also deserve commendation for their exceptional

title: Welcoming, warm, friendly and very efficient.
desc: Asfar the lobby manager and Megat the Bell desk was very hospitable. My mom felt at home when they spoke Malay with her since she‚Äôs of Peranakan descent. The staff overall has been amazing and cheerful, always ready to help. I‚Äôd equate the feel at this location to a Four Seasons hotel in the USA.

title: An exceptional hotel located in the heart of Singapore downtown
desc: We stayed here for two nights in a room on the Club InterContinental category. From arrival until the very last second of departure, no other hotel could be better in guest services and recognition. We felt so welcomed upon our arrival and smooth check-in process at a dedicated area, then we were escorted to our room along with a hotel tour and recommendations. Our room was perfectly prepared, clean and crisp fresh bed linen. Large clean marble bathroom with all the high quality amenities. We have stayed in a heritage-touch Peranakan room and the furnishings were so lovely. Heritage doesn't mean olded or dated here, very well maintained. The Concierge services and Guest Relation services team members at Club Intercontinental are exceptional, way more than just nice.

title: The hotel that care about your feelings
desc: Among all the intercontinental hotel I stayed before, I would say Intercontinenal Singapore is one of the hotel that concerns guest feeling the most. They will send several mails before/during the stay to make sure that you have a enjoyable experience. They may not have the most modern room, but the service is way better than other hotel with fancy room. This will be my best option to stay next time I visit Singapore again!

title: Awesome !!!!
desc: Had a great time here, the room was great and the club lounge was amazing. From the wide range of food available there to the good service provided.Staff Anna ,Jia yi, wai kit very friendly ! I‚Äôm very enjoy it! Thank you so much !

title: Shout out to Anna, wai kit, jia yi, fatin, aisyah, and zin. I had an exceptional dining experience with them!
desc: What a memorable trip this time round with intercontinental Singapore. I would like to have a big shout out to Anna, wai kit, jia yi, fatin, aisyah, and zin. I had an exceptional dining experience at the hotel's F&B outlet. The food was exquisite, awesome service, and the ambiance was delightful. Highly recommended!

title: Excellent Service and Amenities
desc: Luxurious hotel with a beautiful decor and cosy vibes. Hotel comfort exceeded my expectation, the bed was extremely comfortable. Had a really good sleep Please extend my appreciation to chiayi, rendered very gracious hotel service. I felt very at ease with her service. In totality, guest services at this hotel are gracious! They make the effort to ensure your stay is comfortable.

title: Best service and Best Beds
desc: The staff were amazing , the service is impeccable, we will come back to this hotel , they never say no to anything, everything is achievable and they make us feel welcome , not to mention the beds and pillows are the best , and the rooms are very quiet

title: Five days in singapore
desc: The service provided at this hotel was amazing. Every member of staff went out of their way to make yo feel special. The rooms were massive and spotlessly clean. The food was first class in the many on site restaurants and were always busy , a good sign. The Iconic raffles hotel was a 5 minute walk away , and the city tour buses Red and Yellow routes had bus stops a couple of minutes walk from the Intercontinental. The Botanic gardens is one of the stops on the yellow route and should not be missed. A taxi ride from hotel to light show at Marina bay was around ¬£10.00 worth seeing. After the light show a visit to Lavo bar on the 57th floor of the Marina Bay Hotel is a must.

title: Convenience place
desc: Room was not big but very clean and comfortable. We enjoyed staying there. We enjoyed breakfast as well. Food was good. You can eat all king of food there. This hotel is in Bugis where is very convenience to go everywhere.

title: Best suite experience ever
desc: I booked a suite at Hotel Intercontinental Singapore to celebrate a special anniversary with my husband. Three days before the stay the head butler was in contact with me asking about preferences. On our way to the hotel, he asked for the car‚Äôs license plate so he and Kamlesh, the butler assigned to us would be there to greet us on our arrival. We we were led to our suite, where they revealed that we were upgraded to the Ambassador Suite, and were checked in. There was a welcome bottle of merlot and assorted desserts laid out on the huge dining table. They even embroidered our pillowcases! (And yes, got to take them home). There were so many lovely little details that Kamlesh took care of for us that made the stay truly wonderful! It exceeded our expectations ‚Äî and I have to

title: The feeling of staying in a hotel
desc: that is good and ‚ÄúHONGYAN‚Äù the service is very good. The breakfast is also very rich, and the hotel is fully equipped. It's a pleasure to spend these days in this hotel. It's very pleasant. The hotel environment is also good, and the waiters have a good attitude.

title: A very pleasant city break
desc: Very enjoyable stay for 2 nights. Good level of personal service - especially from Azfar in the Concierge team. It‚Äôs a decent location from which to explore the City and direct access into the Mall with a good selection of food and retail options. Fabulous breakfast!

title: Like no other!
desc: Club lounge space is extensive and huge unlike other lounges I have been to.The food is top notch and service is above and beyond.Thank you Aisyah and team for being a wonderful host every day we were there.You made us look forward to come over every evening after a long day of work.

title: A hotel that focuses on details with excellent service
desc: This hotel is at a great location. It features nice colonial heritage and the rooms and common area are all beautifully designed with attention to details. What makes this hotel stands out, however, is its exquisite service. From the front desk to the restaurant (Rene), to in-room service (Jia Long), everyone went above and beyond to make sure we have a good time. The service is professional, warm and personable. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

title: Super good service
desc: Great experience I visited for their japan hi tea with a friend. The hi tea set is very delicious. We had a warm welcome and friendly served from Mia and Hayden explained about the food in detail. we got very good service from him. Will come back again!!

title: A memorable trip with support of Genetec and team.
desc: Ambience in the hotel is excellent and staff supported and guided us supb with low travel expenses. Happy thing is we found our Indian local (Hyderabadi)chefs and supporting staff in the hotel. Thank you to intercontinental hotel.

title: Amazing staycation!
desc: Great hotel with great facilities. The location is very convenient as there is an interconnecting mall next to the hotel. Staffs were all friendly and shoutout to Chia Yi whom I met at the lobby and managed to have a small conversation with. Thank you for your kind gesture in providing my family with water after knowing that me and my family will be heading out to the zoo in the hot humid weather. I will be back!

title: National day break
desc: Great ambience and amenities Friendly staff esp Mr Fahmi, the assistant duty manager whom automatically permitted us for a late check out Extensive breakfast buffet spread with a unique pancake maker Fantastic bed

title: When class meets modern times
desc: The Intercontinental in Middle Road in Singapore is one of the chicest hotels of the IHG chain. The entire setup seems to be beamed from the early days of this country to the actual times. The staff is super friendly and makes your stay a special one.

title: Wedding Banquet
desc: Thank you Ester for the detailed and efficient planning for our wedding, really enjoyed the whole experience in Intercontinental hotel. Would üíØ recommend you to find her for wedding planning‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞üëèüèªüôÜüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Professional.Patience.
desc: I would like to express my special gratitude to Ms.Leong Shi Qi from the reservation department. In the terrible situation where I may encounter fraud when booking a hotel through someone, she assisted me in solving the problem and played a particularly important role in recovering my losses. Thank you so so so much!!!

title: Breakfast at Luce
desc: The breakfast a Luce is spectacular. Floor manager Suresh went out of his way with his suggestions. Appreciate the old world charm and Suresh‚Äôs courtesy. Will certainly return on next visit. The food was a good mix of various cuisines.

title: Singapore hotel at its best
desc: Hotel lobbies were spotless as usual. The room was beautifully accommodated and the pillows and mattress were excellent. I have stayed several times over the past 9 months and this was the best. Breakfast buffet was an excellent mix of Asian and Western cuisine.

title: A conveniently located Hotel
desc: Singapore Intercontinental is very conveniently located. From there, we could go to Bugis Junction and DT 14 Bugis Station quickly. The lobby is nicely decorated and the staff are friendly. A staff member showed us the direction of breakfast after we checked in and her smile was friendly

title: High quality service
desc: to Fatin Thank you very much for your repeated orders. I would be very happy if you noticed that I didn't have enough drinks and called out to me. I was happy to play. Thanks to you, I had a good trip. The smile was nice too.

title: A great experience
desc: Enjoyed a stay at the Intercontinental Singapore on my way back from Australia. 2 nights. Pleasantly upgraded to a suite. Had a problem with the tv which was promptly replaced. So the service was very prompt! The concierge staff (particularly Azfar) went out of their way to make my stay enjoyable, including providing lots of options for me to explore in the city. Went on the Heritage history walk (2 hours) with a number of other guests. Free for hotel guests. Jus was a great tour guide and made sure we got to learn a little bit more about an area that is rarely explored. All in all a great stay made even better by great staff. I look forward to my next stay.

title: Felt at home
desc: Had a comfortable stay for 6 days, felt at home.Were welcome with smiling faces, and taken care by all the staff especially Kamlesh, who always made it a point to check on us that we were comfortable and satisfied.

title: Choose another hotel in Singapore!
desc: This is not a 5 stars hotel!!! Our room is perhaps three-star. the windows overlook an alley and it is also noisy as it is an entrance to a shopping center, in the photos on the site it is absolutely not like this. I will definitely come back to Singapore, but to another hotel.

title: Happy stay
desc: The rooms were very spacious and luxurious. Staff were all extremely courteous and helpful. Overall ambience was fantastic. Location is excellent too with the mall connected and lots of shops and restaurants.

title: Great stay, Grat hotel and Great staff
desc: Great stay in the hotel. The staff is so kindly and helpful, especially our house keeper Hong Yan, She help us to tide the room quickly and offer us a lots of useful suggestion which make our stay feel at home. Hope to travel to SG again and stay here for more days.

title: Friendliest staff, comfiest room, AMAZING STAY!
desc: We have had the loveliest time on our stay. Many thanks to the help of hotel staff for going out their way to give us a room upgrade to add an extra bed to make our stay more comfortable. Special thanks to Anna for the assistance to my mother‚Äôs need, she went out her way to make our club lounge experience memorable. Traveling with wheelchair isn‚Äôt always easy and meeting empathetic staff always makes our journey more wholesome.

title: Exceptional service
desc: We have been staying at the Intercontinental in Singapore for 4 days and the service has been impeccable. I would like to call out Fatin as an ambassador for the Intercontinental and more importantly Club lounge.

title: One of my favorite hotels...globally
desc: This was my second stay in last thirty days...I had liked the hospitality so much the first time around that I actually cancelled my reservation at their sister hotel in Robertson quay for this stay...things you would surely like...large rooms...modern but grandeous architecture...fantastic restaurants...proximity to Bugis...which is connected to the hotel...Suntec is a walk...so staying with family makes total sense...but what really sets these guys apart is the hospitality, courtesy and genuine affection of the hotel staff...Shirish leads the pack...he does everything in his capacity to make you comfortable and definitely has made this place a much better one...Joseph at the club is always smiling...Kamlesh, Judy...literally everyone goes out of their way...and that's what

title: Perfect in every detail
desc: Every detail is perfect in Singapore Intercontinental, especially in Club Lounge. Its location is in Bugis. The flavor of food is gentle and delicious, that suits adults or kids. Double espresso is far better than anyone I have tasted worldwide. I never like the afternoon tea but that in club really impresses me. One of the best Singapore Sling is here served between 18:00-20:00. We feel comfortable and relaxed in club surrounded by light music, mixed IC-Malay-Chinese designed furniture and arts, and of course the best staffs leading by manager Nur Aisyah. No doubt I am sure this is the BEST intercontinental I have stayed. title: Great Hotel
desc: Loved the pillows the best ever the housekeeping staff were great room was spotless and the bathroom was stocked with fresh towels daily and the amenities as well. Very friendly staff from housekeeping to reception and restaurant.

title: Great stay at the Intercontinental
desc: Really lovely hotel and the service was excellent. Made to feel welcome from the moment we stepped into the property. The rooms are spacious and light and airy. We had breakfast included in the rate too which is highly recommended, large choice of items, excellent service and top notch coffee.

title: Breakfast- Christine Ang üëç
desc: Amazing breakfast. Christine Ang is special , very kind and attentive at serving guests in the breakfast area. Food is good and choice wide. We had fantastic time. Indian corner , sweets and very nice coffee!

title: Intercontinental Middle Road - a locality you can‚Äôt go wrong
desc: Very comfortable room & an extremely comfortable bed. Our housekeeper, Amy, made sure the room was clean every morning. And the malls next door (Bugis Junction & Bugis +) made sure our 11 yo son was entertained the whole time.

title: don't expect 5stars services
desc: Poor service! it took too long for check in. thats how you treated a platinum elite member. there is no turndown service. please tell your reception, i said it clear im scared of pets not "dislike". please understand the difference between "fear" and "dislike"

title: Very good experiences
desc: Very good services provided by Su na. She was friendly and professionally . All room services were fantastic. Will back again!! It‚Äôs worth to stay this fantastic hotel with good people here. I will definitely choose again!

title: Thank you Shirish for making our stay husstle free and memorable
desc: Amazing Vacation, We stayed for 3 nights in 2 rooms and we really had a great vacation and the staff was very hospitable and helpful in every way. rooms are nice and clean. The best part is the location of the hotel and the connectivity. we requested a late checkout, and the team was really helpful and did it without any hesitation even though the hotel seems to be very busy I would like to mention Shirish who helped us really with every request, especially with our kid's requirements, he ordered food for us in advance when we were outside of the hotel. Thank you for everything and this would be our favorite hotel whenever we return to Singapore

title: Satisfied Guest Returned
desc: Great Staycation and Great Service Summed up the Day. Especially the Hotel Manager Judy Koh and Club Intercontinental and Guest Services Manager; Aisyah and their Team who served with passions and smiles. Always greeted with respect to every passing passengers. Comprehensive Facilities and Good Meals to enjoy with friends. Indeed, it's satisfying and I will be back again. Specially mention and applaud the following staff who made me feel comfortable and satisfied. Hotel Manager Judy Koh Club Intercontinental Lounge : Aisyah, Josiah, Anna, Hock Kim, Zin, Joseph, Fatim, Veron and Theresa. Head / Butler : Shirish and Chai Yi Front Desk : Ida and Aishah Housekeeping : Jiang Lirui and Chen Mai Luce : Jacquelihne, Sam and Aska A great staycation to be in.

title: Tasty Treats!
desc: My family travelled in from the middle-East for an Asian vacation. We had a lovely breakfast - full of all the tasty food we don‚Äôt have at home! When you go - look for Nadda. He looked after us attentively and joyfully!

title: Amazing hotel with fantastic service.
desc: I don't normally write a review but I just finished a stay in a 1 bed suite at this lovely hotel and felt it was right to do so. Food and location are great ( my daughter loved the shopping mall right next to it), but what makes it really stand out are the attentive staff. The room we had came with its own butler and special mention goes to both Shirish and Kamlesh who really know how to make you feel welcome. You could not fault their level of service which went above and beyond anything I have experienced before. This will not be my last visit.

title: Room for improvement
desc: This was our third stay at this beautiful heritage hotel. Our last two stays were exceptional but this time it was very underwhelming, one big let down. It all started at check in, the guest service agents were all busy, the concierge came to attend to our check in. He attempted to do a preauthorisation payment on my bank card, the first time it failed, he attempted a second time, this also failed, I told him not to do a preauthorisation and to take the payment, he said he didn‚Äôt want to do that at it might also fail. I ended up having to call my bank who told me that no payments had been attempted or has been declined! We went back to him and he went and asked the duty manager, who told him to take out the full payment which I had already authorised him to do and it worked.

title: Wow what a fabulous hotel!
desc: Excellent hotel. Cannot fault anything. Service is 6 star plus! Brilliant location attached to bugis mall. Stayed club level in a 1 bed suite. Club lounge is wonderful. Good choice of a la carte breakfast options and amazing afternoon tea which looks as good as it tastes. Would not hesitate to recommend and already planning a return trip.

title: Nice business live
desc: The hotel's room service is very careful and attentive, Lu Mei pays great attention to the privacy of guests, observes and learns their habits and implements them into her work, a nice business live

title: Great location and traditional style hotel
desc: Really lovely stay at the Intercontinental Singapore. I stayed with my family in two higher floor King / Twin rooms with breakfast included. Whilst the hotel lacks some of the glitz of the newer flashier Singapore hotels it scores multiple points in service and style. Fantastically comfortable beds with very soft pillows and also a mattress topper. Should the pillow not be to your liking then they have a menu of other pillows that you can ask for. We went for the inclusive breakfast over the Club Lounge access and weren't disappointed. There was a huge array of cuisines to choose from and none of the buffet options ever ran low during our three day stay. The pool area is lovely and calming, as is the feeling that you get as you walk through the front door. If I had one complaint

title: Celebrating my mothers 80th birthday
desc: Having visited Singapore on several occasions, this time we chose the Intercontinental for it‚Äôs beautiful aesthetics, atmosphere and superb location. I cannot recommend this hotel more highly. From the super efficient Megat at front of house who treated us like royalty to Jenny our breakfast angel who welcomed us like favourite family. Every single member of the team who we had the pleasure of interacting with were incredibly caring, welcoming and helpful. The rooms are beautifully appointed and the beds are cloud-like in comfort. This hotel is situated in the most convenient location in Singapore based on our previous visits. Thank you Team will see you on our next visit!!

title: 5 star services!
desc: Chia Yi is so friendly and warm hearted! Thanks to her hospitality for my stay in Intercon! Vintage hotel and the rest of staff are friendly too! I like the bolster the most, it super comfy to sleep on.

title: A Positive 3 Days & 2 Nights.
desc: We had a great stay at the InterContinental. Situated less than 5 minutes walk from the metro it's a convenient place to stay. Connected to Bugis Junction means convenient accessibility to various things, example: I forgot my charger, there's a Challenger (electronics/gadgets store) at the basement. Also a supermarket in the basement of Bugis Junction if you'd like to buy some snacks back to the room. I'd like to give special mention to Jeff. His friendliness helped give a positive spin to the start of our days during our stay.

title: Amazing hospitality and good food.
desc: It was really nice meeting Mr. Kamlesh Mishra who extended up with the best possible hospitality. It was always so pleasant interacting with him. Had also enjoyed the delicious Italian food. Good location.

title: Very good choice
desc: The athmosphere was excelent and Service worked very well, and all personel was very kindfull and willing the service. The Hotel location is perfect according the shoppings, no long distance to walk nowhere or take mrt or taxi. We were very pleased at the visit.

title: Very good choice
desc: The athmosphere was excelent and Service worked very well, and all personel was very kindfull and willing the service. The Hotel location is perfect according the shoppings, no long distance to walk nowhere or take mrt or taxi. We were very pleased at the visit.

title: Afternoon Tea Lobby Lounge
desc: We were not staying at this hotel but decided to visit for a special afternoon tea in our continuing celebration of 48yrs of marriage . Having already visited Raffles for their afternoon tea we already had a benchmark. As soon as we entered the main entrance lobby we were given a warm and happy welcome . On advising the reason for our visit we were shown through to the Lobby lounge to be served our heritage afternoon tea. This is a spacious, well decorated and impressive high ceiling room . The furnishings were all to a very good standard on par with such a good hotel group The staff were attentive friendly and accommodating, Faez in particular was very friendly and took the time to assist us in obtaining photographs of my wife and I . The afternoon tea provided was really well

title: Great stay at the Intercontinental Singapore
desc: We recently stayed at the InterConti in Singapore and had a great time. We booked a room with club lounge access and didn‚Äôt regret! The choices of afternoon snacks and evening canap√©s were really delicious. Especially breakfast at the club lounge was really good. I probably had the best egg Benedict of my life, and I stayed in a lot of hotels. All of the stuff in the lounge were very friendly and helpful, special thanks to Josiah, Shirish and Zin for making this stay great. The pool area is good, but could receive a slight update, but is not outdated as other people write. Good is the layout, because you have sun the whole afternoon. Maybe 3 or 4 more sun lies could be good in case it is crowded. A big plus of the hotel are the elevators, never expected any long waiting time,

title: Final night of holiday in Intercontinental Singapore
desc: The Club facilities and service at the Intercontinental are outstanding.. This holiday I travelled across India staying in various hotels and with access to Clubs. The Intercontinental beats them all! Zin was the Club manager on duty and he was friendly and customer service driven. All staff we came across were polite and accommodating. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Good hotel w nice service close to shops- maybe lacking any Wow factor
desc: To preface the review I stayed just before the Grand Prix so the hotel was completely full. As a Diamond Ambassador normally used to getting a nice room and with the hotel full got a regular room on a higher floor. What was nice is they did try and i understood as we were there for just one night they wanted to look after guests staying longer. Room was clean and nicely decorated but nothing especially stood out. View honestly was just over a shopping mall so being higher or lower made no difference. Bathroom again nice but nothing extra special. The best part of the hotel was the breakfast which although packed the hotel had organized well. Amazing variety of cuisines and excellent number of servers. Room itself felt special and is used for lunch and dinner The common

title: Fantastic stay :)
desc: I stay at this intercontinental regularly and I always very much enjoy the rooms, service and team working there. This time I had 2 stays for business. One stay of 10 days and another of 1 day a week later. I had a fantastic time, the room given was very spacious and super clean. Already at arrival I was recognized by the staff, although i had not been there for half a year. Somehow they always remember me. Check in went very smooth and in no time we were in the room. We used the lounge daily which was also fantastic. The team there is absolutely brilliant and always are ready to serve, help and support to ensure the stay is as pleasurable as it can be. The lounge has breakfast, afternoon tea and bites / drinks in the evening between 6 and 8. The team was super supportive and

title: Great service
desc: Staff are all very friendly and helpful. Housekeeping (clean team) delivers efficient service. I will definitely use this hotel in my next trip to Singapore. I wish all the staff in the hotel the best. Especially Wen Fei.

title: Great stay at the Intercontinental Singapore
desc: We recently stayed at the InterConti in Singapore and had a great time. We booked a room with club lounge access and didn‚Äôt regret! The choices of afternoon snacks and evening canap√©s were really delicious. Especially breakfast at the club lounge was really good. I probably had the best egg Benedict of my life, and I stayed in a lot of hotels. All of the stuff in the lounge were very friendly and helpful, special thanks to Josiah, Shirish and Zin for making this stay great. The pool area is good, but could receive a slight update, but is not outdated as other people write. Good is the layout, because you have sun the whole afternoon. Maybe 3 or 4 more sun lies could be good in case it is crowded. A big plus of the hotel are the elevators, never expected any long waiting time,

title: My wonderful trip to singapore at the intercontinental hotel has my title
desc: Suna Sooner. I did a great job cleaning my room. Everything was perfect and she was very accommodating to my schedule. I am very grateful for her service. She is wonderful and I hope that I can see her again during my next trip to sing. Thank you very much.

title: Super stay great staff thoroughly recommend
desc: We stayed for 6 nights at Intercontinental Hotel, Middle Road , Singapore. This was over the recent Grand Prix. The hotel was walking distance to the circuit which was brilliant and in the centre of town. The heritage room we booked was good size ,comfortable, and well serviced. As part of our booking, which was stated to be room only , we were given Club lounge access. This was open all day and snacks and coffee, tea and soft drinks always available . However every morning there was a super breakfast with very large assorted continental buffet and large menu of a la carte international breakfast dishes and local Asian specialities. In the afternoon there was a lovely afternoon tea available consisting of delicate sandwiches, scones jam and cream, flans ,cake and chocolates and

title: Exemplary Customer Service from Events/Banquet Staff
desc: Dear Management Team of InterContinental Singapore, I am writing to express my sincere appreciation for the exceptional service I received during my company event (Company Name: Intuitive Surgical Pte Ltd) at your hotel from 19 - 21 Sept 2023. The level of professionalism, attentiveness, and genuine care exhibited by your staff members exceeded our expectations and made our company event truly memorable. I would like to specifically recognize: 1. Wendy Gan - Events Executive 2. Yau Boon Wee - Asst. Banquet Operations Manager Both hotel staff went above and beyond to ensure that our company events were coordinated smoothly. Your team‚Äôs commitment to excellence is evident in every aspect. I will wholeheartedly recommend your hotel to friends, family, and colleagues based on

title: The Benchmark Lounge and Hotel Experience
desc: I am an IHG member and have had the pleasure of staying through many hotels along my travels through Asia in my travels for business and holiday. The Intercontinental Singapore has always been the benchmark with the most responsive, supportive friendly staff with all the amenities available for a pleasant memorable stay.
