The Club Lounge within Singapore has similarly been a home and office which has supported my every need and request.

title: Our first experience at the intercontinental Singapore
desc: The room is quite okay. However the air conditioning does not seem to work efficiently. We set it to 18C but late into the night, it seems like it is automatically turned off leaving room quite humid. We were perspiring. The men‚Äôs sauna is also quite pathetic. No towel. The fitness room is not well equipped. The serving staff at the breakfast restaurant, by the name Alice, was exceptionally good. Compliments to her.

title: Our Special Day in InterContinental Singapore
desc: Getting married is every woman‚Äôs dream, and when this happens in a fairy tale and dreamy ballroom, it‚Äôs like a dream come true. Magnificent high ceiling with the Crystal chandeliers, pillar-less grand ballroom and beautiful classic staircase at Foyer area makes it a perfect venue for our wedding. We were really grateful that we made the right choice to choose InterContinental Singapore as our first choice to host our wedding dinner. We were very lucky to book the venue on a very hot date #230923 and yet we have met the best team in InterContinental to assist us and work together with us to fulfil our wishes. Special shout out to Ms Ester Chong, our main hotel coordinator who spent months with us to ensure that our wishes and needs were fulfilled. She is very professional,

title: Superb experience at the Club InterContinental Lounge, Singapore
desc: I had the pleasure of staying at this hotel for a week. I already had high expectations from this brand and the fact that I was in Singapore, but the Club InterContinental Lounge far outweighed those expectations. This was by far the best hotel club lounge I have used. Impeccable customer service, delicious hot and cold food at high tea and in the evenings, beverages that included hand-made cocktails and a delicious and plentiful breakfast menu. The general ambience was more like a restaurant rather than a lounge and it usually felt strange to have to leave. The lounge staff, led & managed by Aisyah, were all fantastically attentive but never over-bearing. A true credit to her, this hotel and to the InterContinental brand as a whole. I sincerely hope they are recognised for

title: Loved it
desc: Fantastic. Really enjoyed our stay and the club lounge is so worth it. Fantastic breakfast, wonderful afternoon tea and great cocktail hour with amazing hot snack selection. Plus the staff are incredible, so friendly and helpful. Particular thanks to Fatin for looking after us so well.

title: great experience
desc: warmly recommend. went to the club lounge during our stay and joseph and fatin gave us very good service. place is clean and staff are friendly. gym is 24/7. front desk & house keeping also prepared cakes for my sister‚Äôs birthday.

title: Thumbs üëç up Service from Jun Yi!
desc: Will like to give a super thumbs up to Jun Yi from Audio Visual. He is prompt and professional when attend to our business event in bugis intercontinental hotel. A front line friendly and Young professional staff üëçüëçüëç

title: Mr
desc: Luxurious and sophisticated. Very clean. My corner room was larger than most Las Vegas rooms. For Singapore, that‚Äôs saying something. The staff was amazing, especially Lingo l, the check in assistant and Jeff

title: Old charm beautiful stay
desc: This would be in the top 5 of the best Singapore hotels. Beautiful building retaining old charm. We stayed 4 days in a King Classic room which was spacious at 39sqm. Room large with comfortable bed good. All bathroom ammenities good quality. Lounge bar relaxing and efficient staff. Excellent breakfast with egg station and wide variety of food. We have stayed at this hotel 6 times and the service is excellent. Special thanks to the following staff.Hafiz and Dines (breakfast room) Karesh (concierge) Nadda (room service) All the names are a credit to the hotel.

title: Intercontinental Singapore review
desc: Stay was super good. Enjoyed it nicely.josephine the staff was courteous and helpful to plan my travel trip.i will recommend surely this hotel for ur stay at Singapore. Happy to give this feedback .thanks

title: Great hotel in excellent location
desc: Good experience everything is very well taken care of . Room was good breakfast had elaborate spread every day changing menu of Indian items. Hotel is very well kept. Staff very helpful. Special mention to Kamlesh Mishra he was on the spot and very helpful. Location is superb very central.

title: Very good service with polite and friendly staff
desc: Excellent service with very polite & friendly staff - from check-in to club lounge to restaurant for buffet breakfast. Most noteworthy is housekeeping, both the operator taking the calls & prompt attention to our requests. I‚Äôll definitely stay here again for staycation, though not much to dat around bugis area except shopping. The main wing is more convenient than heritage wing, for staycation as we like easy access to the pool.

title: super
desc: this is my first to Singapore. I don‚Äôt know Lot of Policy at Singapore . But lingo help me so much. And good service. fast check in. it was amazing. it never done before thank u lingo. again thank u so much.

title: 5-Star for great service, quality food! Will be back again.
desc: Checking-in (01/09) & out (02/09) was a breeze. Our package entitled is to dine at L2 Club Lounge. Greeted & served by Zin on both days at Club Lounge. Great service and he gave us very good advice on pairing of food & drinks. Thumbs up for his service! Josiah served us on day 2 breakfast. Great service, quality food by Chef Lai. We had such good time throughout. Will be back again üòä

title: Great stay in Intercontinental Singapore
desc: The hotel is elegant and classy. The service is exceptional and the location is great. We asked for a change of the room because of outside construction work noise, and it was done smoothly and quickly. Downstairs is the Bugis Junction center with hundreds of shops and tens of restaurants.

title: Customer Quality service needs to be reviewed
desc: 3 1) Booking was initially in the Heritage rooms which were smelly & the AC temperature did not work well so we refused to check in 2) Room service food (goulash dish) was fatty, chewy and the quality of meat was poor 3) Because of our status we were offered ironing of 2 items for free, they decided to wash & iron the items & asked to us to pay for the washing we complained but they did not budge and refused to deliver the items till we paid ‚Ä¶ that was poor customer service 4) In the club lounge they never offer a tea spoon for the sugar and each time we have to ask for it 5) All services are overpriced when compared to South East Asia Intercontinental hotels

title: F1 2023 - Hotel Summary
desc: All hotel staff (Wasana), the breakfast, pool, location, amenities, room service were incredible! I highly recommend staying at the Intercontinental (Middle Road) in Singapore. Its conveniently located close to the F1 entrances, malls, and the airport.

title: Appaling service
desc: I don‚Äôt write much review as I don‚Äôt write one unless I know that it‚Äôd be useful. I am an ambassador member and wife and I‚Äôve been a loyal IHG group for years. This last visit to Singapore however made us wonder whether we should continue our membership for next year. We booked a room at Intercontinental Singapore a week prior to our arrival and we‚Äôre supposed to get an upgrade (guaranteed with the ambassador membership) but to our dismayed we were told that they can‚Äôt provide us one due to high occupancy. It is unacceptable and I tell you why. We were exchanging emails prior to my arrival (one email 3 days prior and one was just yesterday one with Aloysius See and one with Raidah Ahmad) yet they didn‚Äôt allocate any room for us. The duty manager, Josiah Gwee thought that

title: Top notch hotel SGP, pool so-so
desc: This hotel really has a perfect price-quality ratio for Singapore. Wonderful rooms. Excellent restaurants, lounge, service, etc. The only real point of critique is the pool area which is simply average.

title: Fancy-schmancy
desc: If you like the Heritage style this is the place for you. Normally I'd prefer something more modern/sleek but for a change (and only 1 night) it wasn't bad. Great location in the city centre within easy walking distance of business areas and Clarke Quay. Staff very professional and super friendly.

title: Beautiful Hotel, Beautiful Service
desc: We stayed here for 6 nights in the Executive Suite. As we are Ambassador Members, the hotel ambassador met us at the aerobridge at the airport to escort us to our waiting car. Once we arrived at the hotel, we were taken to the club lounge for check in. Our room was large with everything that you could ever want. Walking into the room, you have a lovely entry with a powder room on one side, an entry table & lamp on the other. You walk into the lounge, consisting of couch, coffee table, lamp, large tv mounted on the wall. A drinks cabinet & desk finish this space. The bedroom had a king size bed, comfy pillows & mattress. Two club chairs with small table in between and a full length mirror, 2 decent sized side tables and lamps, a space for the suitcase, a decent sized wardrobe

title: Highly recommend
desc: We stayed here for a week in April 2019 to celebrate my husband‚Äôs birthday. The hotel was excellent, everything you‚Äôd expect from an Intercontinental. Our room was a fair walk from reception however was quiet and spacious, and mostly importantly, well air conditioned! Bathroom was spacious, bed was comfortable and house keeping was excellent. Our room rate included breakfast which included an excellent buffet. The service at breakfast was second to none, particularly the two gentleman who I think were the shift managers. They went out of their way to ensure we had everything we needed. The outdoor pool was small but amazing and a swim at the end of the day was wonderful respite from the heat. The hotel is in a convenient location near Bugis MRT station and bus stops. The

title: The best hotel!
desc: We stayed here for almost one week. Everything is very organized. And very clean the room is really good the food service they are on time. And most of all the people are very hospitalable and entertaining! I am planning to come back here!

title: Excellent place
desc: I stayed in this hotel while visiting Singapore on business and it was my third visit. It did not disappoint. The hotel is very well maintained. I stayed in the new section of the hotel, and the rooms are very nice, it was also good to have a bathroom with natural light. Staff is very professional and well trained. The location is great for attractions and shopping. They have a nice outdoor swimming pool, although is not particularly large.

title: The best!!!
desc: My soul felt rested here, it is a beautiful hotel to stay in with everything you expect from Intercontinental hotels If in Singapore again I would gladly book in without hesitation thankyou Middle Road IHG you were just right

title: Lovely experience
desc: Everything was absolutely perfect! Wonderful, helpful staff. Utilize the Club package if you can ...breakfasts that were fantastic and afternoon tea that was invigorating . Pool was a welcome delight to cool off from the heat.

title: Amazing Heritage...
desc: What an amazing stay! Though I entered several Intercontinental Hotels, it was my first time to stay in one. The room was clearly showcasing the history of the place and the Singapore culture & architecture. Definitely not the most modern hotel room, but very functional, comfortable with fabulous bathroom amenities. Even if the room was located on the first floor, right on North Bridge road, the soundproof was excellent. The Fitness Center is spacious, provided with Sauna and the needful equipment. A floor above, you can enjoy the swimming pool, just the right size, the right water temperature and a fabulous view on the hotel's facade and surroundings. The lobby lounge is truly impressive, but the InterContinental Club Lounge is magnificent. Service, food selection & quality,

title: 3rd time in Singapore, 1st time at Intercontinental
desc: Great 3 nights. Got to check in on a private counter, great recognition at the spot - very smooth. Nice room, great bed. Great meeting room, where I had to spend a day. Good location with small restaurants near by.

title: Good but needs modernisation
desc: The hotel is possibly in one of the best locations in Singapore with walking distance or short car journey to all the attractions. The check in was fine and the room was spacious with a very comfortable bed. The service was great too however, the only downside is that the room was quiet a distance from the entrance so when you come back tired, you had a bit of a walk before you could actually get to your room and relax. The other downside which in my opinion needs great improvement is the damp smell in the corridors with the dirty carpet needing change. It's actually quite bad for a hotel that's meant to be 5*.

title: Great Business Hotel
desc: Being an IHG member meant we chose to stay here during the Singapore F1 weekend, great hotel in the heart of the city, minutes walking from Raffles, Bugis, Little India & Arab Street. Check-in was swift and friendly, rooms are well appointed and the breakfast & lounge area is accomodating with good service all round. We did not eat dinner in the hotel or use any other services, but overall I would recommend this IHG hotel for business or leisure stay. The lack of city views would mean me choosing another option if I visit Singapore again, but that does detract from the fact the hotel is in a great location and offers 5* services. Oh and the city comes alive on F1 weekend. . . Sunday race day will be remembered for the rest of my life. . Thanks Singapore!

title: Your Trusted Advisor: Vivek The Concierge
desc: Not only was the hotel great (clean rooms, great service and fresh bar food), but we arrived with lots of free time and very few scheduled activities. The concierge Vivek was so helpful, pointing out various areas of interest within walking distance of the hotel. Also he made great recommendations at very local, well priced, delicious restaurants that we never would have found on our own (or even known where to look). Our time in Singapore was made special by Vivek, who has been at the hotel for many years. It made me want to book another trip to explore more of the city.

title: Great stay
desc: We had a great stay for 2 nights at the start of our honeymoon. We arrived at about 7am (long before the 3pm checkin) but they let us into our room early and were lovely. They also sent us a special honeymoon treat. The staff were great and we had everything we needed. Thank you!

title: Great Service by Yen Ling
desc: She has an energetic smile that creates an excitement to us as guests. The ambience was great that gave a relaxing feel that compliments while we are enjoying our wines. It's a great place to have gatherings or just spending time with yourself.

title: Fantastic Weekend Stay
desc: One of my favorite hotels in Singapore but had not stayed there in 8 years as not visiting as much as I once did, took my girlfriend for her birthday celebration and we were not disappointed. Check-in was smooth and efficient even with an early morning arrival and room was very nice, however for my own personal reasons I asked to change the room which was handled smoothly and efficiently by Ann Mapula, Club InterContinental Manager. We visited the lounge each day and Ann was warm and welcoming each time, she even arranged a birthday cake and celebration upon learning of my girlfriend's birthday that very day. Service in the lobby lounge and Idlewild Bar were very good making for a great stay. Many hotels to choose from but InterContinental Bugis is at the top of our list

title: Superb!
desc: I must say that Everything was excellent! It was my repeat visit. It was so far the best that I have visited! From arrival to departure, the service, the location and the room.... Brilliant location and accessibility. Room were spacious and comfortable. The best is the hospitality of the staffs! Yen ling, Anna, Raven, Jess. And many more, sorry that I can't recall the names! All of them were great! Keep it up! I will be back! Thank you!!

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: Cannot recommend this hotel highly enough, from the moment we arrived, until we left the service was impeccable. The hotel is beautifully decorated, rooms spacious, spotless and very comfortable. We stayed in a Club Room and the Club Room facilities are the best we have experienced. Ann, Jess and staff went above and beyond to ensure we had a great stay. All the restaurants looked very inviting, we visited The Lobby Bar and Ash and Elm and the food and service in both was first class. We will definitely be back. Thank You.

title: Hats off to the team
desc: Best service and hotel in Singapore. Ann and her team do an outstanding job ensuring guest are well looked after. Booked a club room and as an Ambassador Spire member received an upgrade to the next room category. Room as expected was clean, well furnished and decorated and very quite. All the staff in the Club Lounge are great and breakfast better than most most other lounges without been over the top. Stayed at this hotel a few years ago and think its just got better over the years.

title: Great location, great staff
desc: Nice hotel in the heart of the city with full facilities and great staff. Nothing at all to complain about- everything was perfect from check in all the way through the entire stay. I didn't have breakfast in the hotel as there are a ton of local places around the hotel to explore if you are in an adventurous mood. No regrets. Had a great time discovering new places full of character in the heart of the city.

title: Perfect way to end our 5 week holiday
desc: Absolutely loved this hotel . This was our first trip to Singapore and we wanted a bit of luxury before we flew home. We arrived from London after flying all night and we were tired but the staff were wonderful. Our room wasn't ready as were got in very early. We were taken to the Club lounge and had breakfast and a nap. The staff were wonderful throughout our whole stay. The room was lovely and more than we expected. Loved the canap√©s and drinks in the evening. Have nothing bad to say about this lovely hotel and it's staff. Am planning another trip in November 2020 and will stop over again in Singapore and will stay here again. Many thanks to all the staff for a wonderful stay.

title: Perfect place but one big problem
desc: Checking in was a breeze. One thing I noticed was asking the front desk upon checking in if they have football channels and was told no because they are too expensive. I was shocked and upon checking into my room I noticed it was a mistake by front desk and the hotel actually does have every sports channel you could want. The loung in the lobby is a great place to have a drink. The bar is decorated very well and takes you into something from a movie. They have every alcohol you could possibly want. The room was amazing and everything about it was 5 stars. We have a junior suite for our stay. The pool is huge and has many places to sun bathe. The gym is top class as well and the sauna too equipped with showers. I would have liked if it had some bathrobes available to not have to

title: Pleasant stay
desc: The InterContinental Singapore is a lovely hotel to stay at. Rooms and staff are very nice and welcoming. Especially the club lounge is a nice place to stay. They serve food around the clock and we especially enjoyed the afternoon tea. I also liked the location with a nearby shopping mall.

title: One More Business Trip
desc: Intercontinental Singapore is my home in Singapore. Stayed more than 80 time sthe last 10 years. Always make me feel like home. I would like to thank again all Club staff and special thanks to Ann making my stay superb and Ain teaching me bahasa.

title: Met All Expectations
desc: It was my first time staying at this hotel and it met all expecations. Was fortunate to be upgraded to the club floor and hence had access to the club lounge for breakast and afternoon tea/snacks and happy hour drinks/hor d'oeuvres. The room was spacious and well-appointed, laundry service was prompt and the fitness centre is opened 24 hours and quite sizable for a hotel gym. Staff were very attentive and friendly. Overall, the hotel met all my expectations.

title: A fantastic stay, with all of the quality you would expect from such a hotel
desc: I stayed here for a few days after working in Singapore on business. It is an ideal location to explore the city from, and then to rest in luxury in the evenings. Close proximity to a metro station also makes this hotel even easier to access. Staff, concierge and the general feel here were all fantastic, the room I was given was very luxurious, and well equipped. Gym and facilities were also amazing for a hotel, they could easily compete against some big gym chains! Next time I am in Singapore, I know where to stay!

title: Truly the best service in the world
desc: We recently spent three nights at the Intercontinental Middle Rd after a few days in Sentosa for the kids. It was actually only supposed to be one night and day, but my daughter got very sick on the day we were due to check out. We were staying in a Club Intercontinental Lounge room and already had a convenient late check-out and been treated to a gorgeous birthday cake as part of Afternoon Tea even though my daughter's birthday was some days previously! When my daughter fell ill the next day, the unbelievable service of Ann Mapula and her amazing staff became even more obvious. The way Ann and her absolutely phenomenal Assistant Manager Anna took care of us is just so appreciated and I cannot rate their service high enough. Truly above and beyond. The Lounge itself is just

title: We loved our Junior Suite.
desc: We arrived into the hotel from a very long flight from NYC. We totally enjoyed our 2 day stay here before we left for the JW Singapore a few nights before our trip to Maldives. Being a Platinum with Marriott and Spire with IHG. The only difference is they offer an Executive lounge for loyalty members unlike IHG. I'm a Damond with Hilton and they offer the free breakfast and all. I only wish IHG would do the same. We loved Singapore too! We ate breakfast in the hotel and it was very yummy. The buffet style and the staff was very nice and friendly. We stayed here because the charm we wanted to feel of the old times. We loved our stay and would go back. Great area and walking distance to all.

title: Another home away from home experience at the InterCon
desc: My family has been staying at the InterCon almost every past year and this latest adds to another memorable experience. We were emailed an upgrade to the Club Intercontinental (on account of the Ambassador?) from our booking of Club Heritage, even before we arrived. But the family always prefers the Heritage Wing; while the high floor Club level has a commanding view of the Bugis and city area, we find the Heritage rooms on level 2 warmer and more homely. Alicia who handled the email correspondence and received us at the Club was kind to ready the room for an early check-in. Over the next few days, she and the team including Feeza, Yen Ling, Anna, Wai Kit, and everyone else took very good care of us at the Club, especially our young children. Feeza in particular transited

title: As Expected (would stay again)
desc: Comfy. Expensive. Great gym. Foyer Bar is good. Location great. Bathroom awkward. Beds comfy. We checked out the pool but didn‚Äôt swim. Check in and checkout smooth. Bar in room waste of space but coming from Perth it‚Äôs uncommon

title: InterContinental Singapore
desc: Great stay at the InterContinental Singapore, super friendly staff, amazing rooms and great feeling overall the location is very good, about 7 minutes walk from the subway, short ride to all the main attractions in the city!

title: Best club lounge in Singapore
desc: The Intercontinental Singapore is my ‚Äúhome away from home‚Äù. I stay here often and always utilize the club lounge. The service is outstanding! My favorites from the lounge are Ain and Anna. They provide personalized service and always with a warm smile and friendly hello. I have tried other hotels in Singapore but the Intercontinental Bugis is the best in the city. This hotel will always be my go to hotel in Singapore.

title: King & Queen in Prenankan Style
desc: Started our anniversary staycation today and we were greeted like king n Queen during check-in by Jo, I felt so comfortable chatting with him that I told him we are here for wedding aniversary. Then we were pampered by Lisha in the club lounge with great tea n service. To our great surprise, we were greeted with a lovely anniversary cake when we returned to our room. What more can we ask? What a great start....looking forward to the rest of our stay here.

title: Breakfast was disappointing
desc: Hotel with nice heritage theme both exterior as well as interior. Room was nice and functional and the bed was very comfortable which is typical for IC hotels. We booked the Weekend Jump Start deal which included breakfast & it was rather disappointing. Most Asian dishes were not tasty. Service at the buffet was good. Found the jazz music too loud & intrusive first thing in the morning especially when a number of business people were discussing work going over charts etc., may be it was catering for the young demographic. Check in was quick and smooth. Used the concierge for directions and the staff we had encountered were very knowledgeable, friendly really excellent.

title: 3 days family staycation
desc: We had a great stay . Rooms are big, cozy and comfortable. Breakfast was great and service was excellent . Hotel is connected to Bugis Junction so you have shopping and food nearby. It is also a few minutes away from MRT station . Encountered a problem at the pool side on the 12th October but feedback will be sent to hotel directly . Overall stay was pleasant . One of the best hotel I have stayed so far in Singapore , in terms of room size and decor as well as location .

title: Fantastic stay in lovely hotel!
desc: We loved our stay at the Intercntinental Singapore. the hotel is clean comfortable and the service levels are fantastic! Our room was comfortable and everything was in wroking order. After spending 7 weeks in Europe it was great to stay at a hotel where all amenities were fantastic. All equipment was in great working order! Ain Anne and Annie at the Club lounge need to be highly recommended. They really added to our stay with their friendly, can do attitude! Intercontinental Singapore is lucky to have such great staff!! Our whole experience was top notch from the doorman, check-in, club brerakfast afternoon tea and cocktails to our checkout!!! HIghly recommend. Great location also. We are now home working out when we will book in there again, but, this time for longer!

title: Recent holiday to Singapore
desc: This hotel is first class and great location to MRT, shopping and short distance to many other attractions. We believe to pay the difference for Club access is well worth it with a great breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktails with hot and cold entrees served with such a high standard. The staff really make the difference in the Club and we have grown to know many of them well over the years. Special mention should go to Anna, Ain, Wai Kit, Yen who go out of their way to make a difference to the customer experience. They are a real asset to the Club and we noticed that were well respected by many customers during our stay - please pass on our thanks to these girls who do such a fantastic job and work very hard!! They continually perform very professionally and always

title: Thanks again.
desc: A most comfortable and enjoyable stay once again at the property on Middle Road. A very homely and friendly hotel with a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Much nicer than some fairly impersonal hotels. Quite the nicest club lounge you will find with a really good selection of cocktails and canapes available from 18.00 to 20.00. Also a good breakfast and a lovely afternoon tea served daily.

title: Always a perfect stay
desc: Always a perfect stay. Everything in the room works, with spotless service throughout. There‚Äôs a master switch that actually does turn off all the lights without compromising the power outlets, and the AC doesn‚Äôt make noise. Breakfast service is also great. The only improvement point would be WiFi service, it keeps logging out very often and doesn‚Äôt automatically log in.

title: More than pleased
desc: I have been here many times over the years and this hotel and its staff has been like a second family. They always treat you with respect and genuine concern for your needs. I love the Intercontinental Club Lounge. So many amazing things I could say, but only one word comes to mind. HOME! You are made to feel like your at home. Ain and Wai Kit always treat you like a regular. Call by name and greet you with a smile. So amazing!!

title: Staycatiin
desc: Booked a Premier Suite for 2 nights and it was a wonderful experience. We particularly liked the heritage trail (Sat 4 to 6pm) which was complimentary. Our guide Catherine from the Singapore Tourism Board was entertaining and humorous. I would highly recommend Singaporeans to go for the heritage trail as Catherine offered information which we never knew! We had access to the club lounge and were there for the afternoon tea (230pm to 5pm) and evening cocktails and canap√©s (6pm to 8pm). The afternoon tea was average but the evening cocktails and canap√©s were good. If you have time for only one session, opt for the evening cocktails. Premier Suite was of good size. Bed and quilt were comfortable. Swimming pool was small with limited deck chairs and day beds. As a platinum

title: Service good but the queue for the breakfast...
desc: The service was good and there were lots of staff in the lobby. However the elevators are old and we had to wait for ages for one to arrive. Also the sink in my room was not working properly, something you would not expect from such a well known hotel. The worst thing is that we had to queue for the breakfast. I would never thought that at this level of hotel one would have to queue in order to have breakfast. Luckily I came down with lots of time to spare before my meeting, if I was in a rush I would have panicked if I have to wait this long (over 15 minutes) in order to get a seat for breakfast it would have been a disaster.

title: Very good, I would give a 4.5!
desc: We stayed at the hotel as part of our trip around Asia. Beautiful hotel, lovely entrance, high ceilings and grandeur. We had the heritage room which was fantastic, huge room, very very comfortable king bed, sofa and brilliant bathroom. Hotel staff all great. I would say the concierge were mixed. Some people good, others not so. I think the restaurant recommendations were poor. They recommended Violet Satay which was very poor but should have been guiding to better places like Lava or C‚Äôest la Vie which is more suited for their guests. These were not even mentioned as options by the concierge. Rooftop pool was lovely and gym was good but we didn‚Äôt use either.

title: Intercontinental at its best
desc: Beautiful colonial hotel that contains everything you would want from a hotel of this quality The facilities are just outstanding We stayed on the club level which provides breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktail/drinks at night along with food Tea and coffee is available all day The staff are just excellent, always willing to help and provide tips as to places to visit food to eat I have never seen such happy people willing to help anywhere, such beautiful people Rooms are spotless and serviced multiple times a day Fruit was left and fresh towel supplied even if you showered after the original service was done A great place to stay and highly recommended A big thank you to the hotel for making our stay so relaxing

title: Consistent Excellence
desc: This was our second stay at the IC. Having stayed as some of the nicest Singapore hotels including the JW, MBS, Shangri-La, and Tang Plaza, this has been our favorite hotel and we will make it our primary choice for future trips. With our last stay being over three years ago, the service is just as good as before. The value you get for the room, amenities, and service is hard to beat. The rooms are well appointed and very comfortable. The location is perfectly situated between Little India and Chinatown, making it very convenient to walk everywhere. The mall that is directly attached has the convenience of everything you would need during your stay and has nice midrange stores. The food at the hotel is excellent and if you have the opportunity to add the club to your room, it

title: Booking through Third party website
desc: I stayed here for a few days for visit local exhibition, with feeling motivated. Ideal stay at IHG near Burgis junction and MRT station with short walk 5 minutes from national museum of Singapore. Plenty of good Chinese restaurants that area. The room was nice in overall, contemporary style, professional staffs with well-equipped amenities. The check-in time is 2.00 PM the hotel comprises of a main tower and heritage wing, room interior dedicates to wood furnish and furniture. Normally, I book through the 3rd party websites (Google will help everyone find the source) Third-party websites allow this ease of price, combine flight and service comparison (without commit on points to loyalty program)

title: High Marks!
desc: Truly a luxury hotel with attentive service and a terrific location. Historic property, which often means that the plumbing is wonky and the elevator is temperamental. Not here - everything works, everything is thought out and the staff actually cares about the guests. The lounge is beautiful and the food on offer is scrumptious. A quiet place to relax after a flight for sure, but also great after being a tourist in the warm Singapore daytime. Bed is a welcome change from others in Asia; they use something called "padding" here to allow for a great sleep!

title: Great value and location
desc: The Intercontinental Singapore offers great value for those looking for decent 5* stay. The hotel's design is unique and sets it apart from all other hotels of similar standard. The rooms are functional and the location is ideal, particularly for frequent visitors to Singapore. The staff was friendly and the breakfast was of high quality. Above all, the hotel's price point is perfect especially for larger groups or extended stays.

title: Still fabulous
desc: We stayed at the Intercontinental two years ago as our usual venue of Raffles was closed for renovation and loved it. We returned again last year as we now regard this as our new favourite hotel in Singapore. The suites are large and beautifully furnished with everything you could want. The Club is excellent with wonderfully helpful and friendly staff. They also know the difference between "can" and "may"! Amazing that you need to go all the way to Singapore for staff who understand English usage! I hope all the wonderful staff are coping with the current situation and that we will be able to return later this year!

title: Overnight stay
desc: This was booked as an overnight stay before catching a cruise the following day. I upgraded to a club room because we were due to arrive late afternoon and, after a long flight from London, would welcome a couple of drinks and snacks before heading to bed. As it happens, the plane was delayed for over two hours, and after going through immigration et cetera, we didn‚Äôt get to the hotel until just 15 minutes before the happy hour ended. Reception and the staff in the club lounge couldn‚Äôt of been more helpful. They insisted we go straight to the club lounge, sat us down and got us a drink and something to eat even before starting in the checking in process! Wonderful service The room was billed as a heritage room, which meant it had some period features. It was a little tired but

title: Luxury at its best
desc: I had stayed at a couple of Intercontinental properties in Mumbai and Mauritius, so I always knew that they are one of the best as far as 5 star hotels go. I was visiting Singapore for the 4th time, so I knew the place well. But this was my 1st time with a 4 yrs old kid, so I wanted a hotel close to MRT station, Indian eating joints, etc. And this hotel fitted the bill perfectly. We had booked a Junior Suite and to say that it was very good would be an understatement. The Suite was very spacious and luxurious. The decor was very good. We loved it. Our suite was located on the 9th floor and we have a nice view of the city from it. The room service, in-house dining, and concierge were top notch in service and promptness. The morning breakfast spread was very good and we were

title: An oasis
desc: well truth to tell I have never stAyed in this hotel but I ha e been to Singapore many times and always visit, if you want to visit the huge market at Bugis and maybe some of the shops around that Area, it‚Äôs hot, always hot so take. Stroll through the old Bugis chop houses, in through the back door of the Hotel, after the bustle outside it is a welcome relief to sit in the Very comfortable lounge and have.a Drink or afternoon tea, if you time it right you may be entertained by the piAnist. It is situated Very close to the metro and the doorman will always call you a taxi. I would love to stay here alas it is out of my price range but I am sure it. Is worth every penny so do what I do drop in and enjoy.

title: Fine stay
desc: We picked this hotel primarily due to its location on the green subway line from the airport and the blue line that goes so many places. The subway connects to the Bugis Junction shopping mall and through it to the hotel, so you are in a covered walkway most of the walk. The location on Victoria Road is also great, so if you want to take the bus instead of the subway to get around, there are lots of options. The hotel was very nice: comfortable and large room, clean, excellent AC. Wifi continually dropped off and required logging in again. Breakfast very expensive here but there are many alternatives nearby, including the food court under Bugis Junction mall. Very nice lobby lounge. I am sure that there are other equally nice hotel rooms at a lesser cost somewhere in

title: Amazing Stay lovely 5 star experience
desc: we had 4 days here in November as a start of our 6 weeks anniversary trip this was the first hotel of the trip and we loved it . we arrived very early and the people in the reception arranged early check in and thank me for been a platinum ambassador member and upgrade my room. we were in the room taking a nap very fast the room was nice clean not to spacious as we were three people and we had an extra bed but had space for all of us and our bags. breakfast is amazing and afternoon tea was a nice experience the room was nice temperature the hotel is located next to a mall witch was nice for out first stay in Singapore. we would definitely stay here again

title: Amazing stay again
desc: My husband and I had an amazing 10 days here and from start to finish we only received exemplary service from everyone we met. We were lucky enough to get an early check in after our long flight which was great. The club lounge staff are second to none and every single person cannot do enough for you and as the days go by they know the things you like. We would recommend this hotel without hesitation,so much so that we cant wait to return in April.

title: Exceptional staff and value for money
desc: By Singapore standard, the room and bathroom especially is huge. The hotel room was quite modern compared to its outer building. It was very clean. Breakfast was magnificent and I love the location. It is an interesting part of Singapore and I loved exploring it. Way better than Orchard Road! The staff were exceptional. Everyone was very warm and friendly. They made me fell in love with the Intercontinental chain

title: Great Hotel
desc: This is a great colonial decorated style hotel without all the hustle and bustle you see at the JW Marriott, Hilton, etc. Service was fantastic! Have been to Singapore several times and have stayed at many different hotels an this is the best by far.

title: Wonderful hotel, excellent service and friendly staff
desc: The hotel is located just 2 minutes walk from BUGIS MRT station which is central and very well located. The hotel is outstanding the atmosphere and decor is lovelly. We stayed here for 3 nights in a club room and were very pleasantly surprised at how good it was. We were escorted to the Club Lounge to check in and were greeted by the manager ANN MAPULA. She immediately made us feel very welcome and at home. She explained everything to us and checked us into our lovely room. We were invited for cocktails in lounge that evening (which were fantastic) and hot and cold canape's. The staff were all working very hard but were always engaging and more than happy to assist with any needs. I would like to express my thanks to - Waikit, Ain, Shiqin, Fiazh, Alicia and Anna who thoroughly

title: 2019 Visit - Club Lounge
desc: I have been staying here for close to 20 years each time I visit Singapore, initially on business and in the last few years for leisure with my wife. The Hotel is classically and beautifully decorated to a very high standard, location is excellent in the heart of Singapore but not too commercial. However what makes the hotel special and keeps us coming back are the staff - especially in the Club Lounge - the staff there treat us like family and the level of service is fantastic - this is what sets the Hotel higher than all the competition! Special mentions to Wai, Anna, Ain, Alicia and Yen Ling - thank you so much for your hospitality - see you on our next visit !!!

title: Great location with amazing staff
desc: We stayed in one of the club rooms which we welcomed as the quality of what was offer in the private club lounge was exceptional alongside some of the friendliest staff we have ever come across. This hotel is centrally based and attached to a large indoor shopping mall. We will definitely return to this little gem. The food in the hotel restaurant is exceptional.

title: Lovely rooms, lovely Club Lounge, with fab staff
desc: InterContinental Singapore is one of my regular hotels, and definitely my choice of place to stay when I'm in Singapore (even if it's just an overnight transit, I tend to pop into town to stay at the IC as long as I have more than 12 hours in Singapore). The rooms at InterContinental Singapore have a local flavour to the decor and generally set up in a very comfortable and practical way (but also rather attractively decorated - fancy enough without being gaudy in any way and rather elegant). I have a bad back, but I find the bed at the IC Singapore very comfortable, so I find the sleep quality is really good. The Club Lounge is probably one of the best among InterContinental hotels, although I do miss the wide variety of sushi they used to have for the evening canape time.

title: Fabulous hotel
desc: Delighted with this hotel, also with the service provided in the Club Lounge, definitely worth the money! The hotel staff are so friendly and helpful, throughout. Special mention to Alicia and Ann in the Club room, whose service and memories for guest names and preferences were commendable! Highly recommend.

title: Outstanding Club lounge
desc: We stayed for 3 nights in a club lounge room on our way to New Zealand. The service and hospitality were outstanding in every aspect . Beautiful breakfast, afternoon tea and evening canap√©s and drinks. Special mention for Dorothy ü•∞ and her colleagues who went above and beyond to ensure guest satisfaction. We cannot wait to return in December. Thank you üòä

title: I'll stay away from Intercontinental
desc: Singapore is my favorite city and I visited it 4 times in the last 6 years on short trips to Asia. I stayed at several hotels like the two Fullertons, Ritz Carlton, Shangri la, Swissotel Stamford and also an Ibis hotel. On my last trip I decided to stay at the Intercontinental Bugis, it would be my first stay at the brand and booked 4 nights with an Ambassador status at a non refundable rate. I was travelling with a friend so I requested twin beds. When we arrived late in the afternoon at around 7 PM, I was told we were already expected. Our room, a junior suite was an upgrade to the booked category. At the ambassador level the upgrade is part of the programm. We were told that our room was ready but only a king bed was available and we thought it is ok the other option would

title: Great Club Lounge
desc: Stayed for 3 nights in club room. Definitely worth the money for club lounge as never crowded and staff there were really friendly and helpful. Good location attached to mall and about 5 mins from station. My new favourite hotel in Singapore.

title: Intercontinental Singapore
desc: This is a beautiful property with excellent facilities, and all the staff were very professional, helpful and knowledgeable about the local area. The hotel is very well located near the popular Bugis shopping precinct. Hotel restaurants and nearby restaurants did not disappoint with plenty of lovely dishes to choose from. Highly recommended!

title: Great stay Fantastic staff
desc: We had nine fantastic nights at the Intercontinental Singapore. The staff in the club lounge are second to none. All very friendly and extremely efficient. A special mention to Ling wei Law who was absolutely brilliant as were all the staff. They are all a credit to the Hotel. Also all of the staff in the Lobby lounge.

title: Work trip
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed our trip to Singapore and our stay at the intercontinental was first class Alicia Anne and Dorothy were amazing with their friendliness and top class service along with the other ladies in the club lounge. Thank you so much for making us feel welcome! Sonvir Adrian lee and Gerard

title: Wonderful experience
desc: My daughter and I stayed at the Intercontinental in November 2019 and had an amazing time. From the time we checked in to the time we checked out everyone at the hotel was very friendly and took fantastic care of us. In particular Alicia from the Intercontinental Lounge truly went above and beyond her duties. We really appreciated how genuinely warm and friendly she was. Her personal care really made the experience even better to the point that my 8 year old still mentions how lovely Alicia was. The hotel itself was very nice and has a colonial feel to it. Our room was in the old part of the hotel which was nice, but for some with mobility issues there were a few stairs to navigate and the lifts were a bit of a walk away. Our suite was very nicely decorated, spacious and quiet

title: Best stay
desc: We had booked into club room with club lounge access. Check in was effortless and professionally handled. Room was spacious and clean that gave a homely feeling. We were really made to feel special in the club lounge. Especially Noor and Ann who went out of their way to give a personal touch to the service. Will definitely be back

title: 3-Night Stay in Singapore
desc: Had a luxurious three night stay at the InterContinental Singapore (80 Middle Rd) with my wife and a friend. Our Check-in process was effortless at the Club Lounge while we enjoyed tea and canap√©s. The hotel is elegant and beautiful with an exceptionally high standard of service from everyone we interacted with. I recommend booking a Club Room to enjoy the perks offered by the Club Lounge. The room was spacious and luxurious, the bed and pillows was especially comfortable. We enjoyed the food that the hotel had to offer during breakfast, afternoon tea and drinks at the Club Lounge, as well as Room Service. Delicious food and exceptional service. The hotel is very close to The Bugis and Raffles City and a short drive from Gardens by the Bay and Marina Bay Sands. Great experience

title: Awesome Service
desc: I booked my family into a Club room. The service we received from the fantastic team in the Club lounge was better then first class. It was without any doubt the best service in all my years of travelling.

title: Excellent
desc: Stayed for 5 nights on a leisure trip and overall experience is just excellent. Hotel is well located in Bugis which central to most touristy options in Singapore (Marina, Clark Quay, Orchard, etc) and the neighbourhood is really enjoyable with plenty of food options. Room was very comfortable and service was excellent. Intercontinental club lounge is a must and makes a really big difference as you feel you have your own private space within the hotel itself which can be / feel busy / crowded at some time. A big thanks to the whole staff of the club lounge who are doing a tremendous job. Definitely the place to stay for me in Singapore.

title: High standard Intercontinental in central Singapore location
desc: Colonial Singapore styled hotel in good central location only short taxi to Marina Sands Area and direct access from the hotel to an adjacent mall. Superb huge hotel lobby lounge for drinks and snacks particularly pre and post dinner. Couple of top end restaurants in the hotel itself (Man Fu Yuan - Chinese and Chikuyotei Japanese) which are excellent. Suites are really nice and all look very recently renovated to very high standard. Service throughout hotel is very good, especially the Club Lounge where they serve breakfast, free afternoon tea and evening Cocktails and snacks if you have booked a Club room or above. Also has a nice outside terrace and pool area and a well equipped unmanned gym. Really nice hotel for business or leisure stay in Singapore close to key attractions.

title: No mango, no pawpaw? No problem!
desc: The hotel is central and convenient to several shopping malls, the Marina Bay district and the underground transportation system (MRT). We were on a holiday, first time in Singapore and stayed for 5 nights in a heritage room which was large, comfortable, quiet and spotlessly clean. The comfortable and tastefully furnished lobby lounge was a wonderful place to relax, sip cocktails and chat. We enjoyed the good selection at breakfast every morning except were disappointed in the paucity of fresh fruit as we look forward to tropical fruits when in SE Asia. Athiban, the very nice floor manager acted quickly in response to our comments and a lovely lady, Sallypron, serenely arranged for mango, pawpaw and dragon fruit on each of the last 3 mornings. The staff at the concierge desk

title: THE hotel in Singapore
desc: Love this place, return frequently on business, handy location,GREAT Club lounge, lovely food and friendly staff. To top it off, rooms and facilities (gym, pool) make this my favourite hotel in SE Asia. I travel on business frequently and love staying here.

title: loved it!!
desc: booked a last min staycation for 2 nights and absolutely loved the hotel! the room was soooo comfortable! staff service was great and breakfast had so much variety. after staying at intercontinental for the first time, i kept recommending the hotel to my friends. looking forward to stay there again!

title: Architectural gem
desc: Love the grandeur of the hotel with lush carpeting and peranakan art displays.The staff are attentive and helpful to ensure we had a wonderful stay. Property is linked to a mall with many eateries around.

title: Fantastic, centrally located hotel - close to shops and MRT - exceptional value and great staff
desc: This is a super conveniently located hotel (adjoining Bujis Shopping Centre and MRT Station) which was very reasonably priced for our recent stay. The rooms were well appointed, with very comfortable beds and pillows and a really good shower. The included breakfast buffet each day was excellent, and stations well marked for ingredients and food intolerances. My daughter is gluten free, and this was perfect as she could confidently eat each morning (something not always easy to get in Singapore). I will definitely return here!

title: Perfect stay
desc: We booked the heritage room so the price was decent for what this hotel has to offer but we got an upgrade to deluxe and was allowed early check-in. The experience for 3 nights was perfect. The staff outside and at reception provided great service. They allowed us 1 hour late check out which was very helpful for our schedule as well. The only thing is that we are small people but found the showers just right for us so it may be tight space if you are a bit taller/ larger. We didn't get a chance to spend more than 10 minutes at the pool because it rained every day of our stay but it was very clean and had a nice seating area. The hotel is connected to Bugis Junction which had restaurants and shops right underneath you. I would highly recommend this hotel to family and friends

title: Good hardware (other than pool), software somewhat lacking
desc: Had a wonderful staycaytion at IC Robertson Quay last Xmas so thought we would try IC Bugis this year (one night stay). Heritage suite 2/5: Booked a Grand Deluxe room (with club access) and received the usual one tier ambassador upgrade to a premier suite (as confirmed by email prior to arrival). At check in we were told that our premier suite was still occupied, so we would get an "additional upgrade" to a heritage suite (#366). Upon arriving at the room, we were shocked to see that the shopping mall food court looks directly into the windows (see photo), so definitely avoid the heritage suite unless you are an exhibitionist. Room was also very noisy since all the mall noise funnels into the room. Junior suite 4/5: We had to wait until 6pm to switch rooms but Ms Anna from

title: Man Fu Yuan
desc: Fabulous Christmas lunch at Fu Man Yuan, the food was incredible, attentive wait staff and extremely comfortable and private booth. Thanks to Maggie Yong for making our Christmas experience one to remember.

title: New Year Eve in Singapore
desc: Every time I'm trying to choose hotels from IHG. This New Year Eve I have chosen this hotel during our honeymoon trip as well. It was a perfect choice. First of all atmosphere, secondly - it was so nice to receive honeymoon gift and greetings from the manager. It was wonderful experience.

title: Great hotel
desc: Great location right in bugis, easy access to shopping and meal (a lot of choice in bugis junction and accross the street), easy access to MRT too. Very clean room, attentive staff. Very nice hotel and surely I will be back.

title: Elegant Luxury Heritage Hotel
desc: Peranakan meets British Colonial Elegance and Grandeur Design. Very good and polite front office staffs. Love the Club Heritage Room located in the Heritage Wing. The room was beautiful, cosy and lovely. Breakfast at the Club InterContinental Lounge and at Ash & Elm were very good, appetizing and delicious. The evening canap√©s and beverages at the Club InterContinental lounge were exquisite and delightful too. Check-in and check-out were a breeze, and all of the hotel staffs were friendly and helpful. Overall, a luxurious and pleasant Christmas 2019 stay at InterContinental¬Æ Singapore.

title: Will Come Back.
desc: After a pretty ordinary start arriving on Christmas Day when all the lunches were finished and being ignored by concierge because of them trying to get customers into taxis and carting our own bags through the foyer it could only improve but it did. We were in room 229 which seemed like a 20 min walk but this hotel seems a real winner in the best area in Singapore. The Club room is one of the best with cocktails and almost anything you want , the breakfast is as good as any 5 star property we have ever stayed and the little taste of the dim sum in the Chinese restaurant was superb. We have stayed at most of the 5 star properties in Singapore but this is by far and away the best area and we want to explore more next time. The pool was just fair and if your a smoker you are

title: Overall, only an okay
desc: I'm quite behind on my hotel reviews but with the way 2020's started.... In any case, as to the Intercontinental Singapore: Top Likes: 1/ They serve Illy Coffee during breakfast. 2/ The common areas (lobby and lobby lounge) were quite nice. I very much liked the way the hotel decorated for Christmas. Top Dislikes: 3/ On two straight days, the waitstaff cleared my breakfast table setting while I was getting food at the buffet. Not acceptable. 4/ The remote control for the TV had this sticky not-easily seen residue (I'm guessing it's food residue of some kind) that couldn't be easily removed with a damp cloth (hand towel). A germaphobe would not approve. Nitpicks: 5/ While the breakfast buffet is good (but not very good), the fruits on offer in the buffet are limited

title: Beautiful Rooms! Inconsistent Service!
desc: I wanted to bring up concerns and comment on my recent stay at the Intercontinental Singapore. As an IHG Spire member, I was more than excited for my first trip to Singapore, and would be staying at the highly-regarded and reviewed Intercontinental Singapore. First, I just wanted to give feedback on the quality of service was great when it was there. The check-in, room service, and also concierge and instant service. Also, the housekeep was very attentive during my stay and made sure my guests and I were comfortable throughout my stay. However, there were inconsistencies in service throughout my stay which I just feel didn't meet my expectation and standard of excellence I am used to from the Intercontinental brand. - Under my two bookings, for one room, I had

title: Honeymoon Getaway
desc: Recently got to stay at this property for a short weekend honeymoon getaway with my wife. Property is very well located, being next to 2 MRT lines and with Bugis Junction literally at the doorstep. One will not be bored staying at the hotel. If you're entering the hotel from the Bugis Junction entrance... You will immediately notice the serenity of the hotel. It is very different from the hustle and bustle of Bugis Junction. The InterContinental Singapore is elegant, poised and ready to receive guests. We were checked in by Raidah whom I understand was the manager on duty at the time. I had paid for an upgrade but was swiftly upgraded to a Heritage Suite which had an old world colonial charm to the room. Although very different from the modern 5 star properties, it is nice

title: A 5 star property with 7 star service
desc: We stayed in a heritage club room for 6 nights absolutely loved it. The decor in this beautifully kept colonial building is magnificent. We arrived to the biggest smile and welcome from Robert the doorman, once inside we were then greeted again and taken to the club lounge for check in. Whilst completing the formalities we enjoyed complimentary Singapore Slings and a non alcoholic version for our daughter. It was very humid outside so the cold face towels were very welcomed. We were also offered canopies and a range of food. Alcohol in the lounge is complimentary between 6-8pm. There are restaurants and bars throughout the hotel, and at the rear of the general lounge (not the club lounge) by Ash and Elm restaurant there is an exit door straight into Burgis shopping centre

title: Intercon staycation - 4th and last
desc: My family regularly spends thousands of dollars on dining and staycations at the Intercontinental hotel yearly but as locals, we can‚Äôt help feeling like we are still being treated as third class guests. Granted, there are several staff members who were helpful and deserving of compliments (such as Raven at the club lounge), but for most other staff, we cannot help but observe a certain double standard in treatment we received in comparison to other foreign guests. Fizah from the club lounge, for example, was particularly sulky when serving us even though we had done nothing to offend her other than being locals, but was a different person and all-smiles when serving Caucasian guests. She even went to the extent of reinventing the rules of the lounge just to make things difficult

title: Paradise in central Singapore
desc: A well earned luxurious stay after a long flight from the US. We arrived at 4am and were so happy to have an early check in room. The hotel is true 5 star with attentive staff catering for your every need.Walking distance to lots of Singapore sights and right next to Bugis MRT for spots further out. Highly recommended.

title: Great hotel, great staff
desc: I recently stayed here with my partner while visiting Singapore. The hotel is around a 20 minute taxi ride from the airport, at a cost of around 20 SGD. Checkin was quickly completed by Cher Zhishen, who was friendly and helpful throughout. Our room was on a high floor with good views over the city. The bed was comfortable and came with a good variety of pillows. We slept very well. The room also had a large tv which had limited English channels but also allowed connection to Netflix/youtube via chrome cast. There was also a sound bar, which allowed music to be played via Bluetooth. Housekeeping was of a high standard, and the maid very friendly each day we met her. The location is very good, with a large mall underneath the hotel and a 10 minute walk to Suntec. Lots

title: Excellent hotel in a great location
desc: This is my hotel of choice when In Singapore. After a long flight arriving after midnight the hotel is not very far from the airport which is convenient . Also being in transit and leaving for another flight the next day it‚Äôs quite nice that the hotel has a shopping mall attached right next to it for last minute shopping etc. the Buffett breakfast was fantastic and the service was excellent overall a wonderful stay.

title: Great stay again
desc: We stayed at the Intercontinental Singapore for 7 nights and it was our 2nd time in 12 months and we had another very enjoyable stay. The staff are the ones that are amazing and they are always so attentive and polite. I would fully recommend to any of my friends to stay there here when visiting Singapore.

title: A great hotel for both business and family
desc: The staff in the Club Lounge are exemplary in the service attitude. Nothing is too difficult for them. The reception staff even remembered us about our last stay there almost two months ago. It is always a pleasure to stay in this hotel.

title: Very good
desc: Hotel is very easy to reach by mrt. The check-in was efficient and the lady was nice. The room was nice with light calm colours. The bed is super comfy. We have stayed here in 2008 and it was as good as I remembered.

title: Excellent un all aspect
desc: Class and respect by all employees. Perfect amenities you would expect from a fiive stars hotel. The Intercontinental club experience was beyond expectation. The service os outstanding overall. The hotel restaurant Ash and Elm is excellent.

title: Best location & best service
desc: Located above the Bugis Junction, it is super convenient, and if you need anything, the mall is just out the back door. The MRT is also a few minutes away in Bugis Junction, so it is also very convenient to get to alot of places by MRT. The room was very comfy and spacious. Highly recommend it!!!!!!!

title: Great location.....beautiful hotel.
desc: Stayed 6 nights in a Heritage Suite (we were upgraded), room was comfortable, only drawback, room overlooked the Bugis Mall...and the room was overlooked by the food hall. The location of the room for us was fine...however quite a distance from elevators, and included a set of stairs. Also the floor did not require room key security in the lift. Our room included Club Intercontinental access, which includes breakfast and evening drinks and nibbles. Both were fine if not very busy...but that is to be expected during the Xmas/New Year period. The swimming pool area had a few problems....guests "reserving" lounges for long periods of time when they were not there....lots of other guests missed out on seating. Unsupervised children running and jumping in to pool. I think a

title: One of the best hotels in Bugis
desc: The hotel is ideally located next to Bugis Junction and near to Bugis+ & Bugis Village and opposite the National Library and is served by both the EW and Downtown MRT lines. Apart from its convenient location, the vintage yet modern design of the hotel and the hotel room makes one feel at home. The hotel is also served by some marvellous restaurants such as Ash and Elms and Man Fu Yuan and a lounge offering live music. The room is very spacious, in particular, the bathroom cum toilet, which makes it very suitable for wheelchair users and their caregivers. The room cleaning service is simply excellent as their staff put in the same efforts even when it is the last day of stay - this is sadly lacking in some other 5-star hotels. Most important of all, the service here is great

title: Traditional 5- star hotel - outstanding
desc: Like the Paris Grand, the original Intercont in SIngapore embodies everything that one expects from a traditional 5-star hotel as seen in the movies. A superb atrium for wonderful afternoon teas, a superb restaurant for breakfast (marvellous) or dinner, a glorious club room, and super staff. Most of our dealings were with the GM, and his colleagues in the club room, who were absolutely charming and delight.. The location is near the heart of the old town, with the vibrant Bugis street outside the door, and a short walk to the great malls. I confess to being biased, having stayed here many times since 2005, but the highest standards have been maintained over all these years. I also had the privilege of being invited to the official switching on of the huge Christmas tree in the

title: A comfy bed and a ideally situated hotel to get around
desc: Stayed here for four nights with my sister on a recent girls trip. We booked the Intercontinental because of its location to Bugis Street and Arab Street. There is a shopping mall right next door and the MRT goes from here to get al over singapore. We checked in and got a lovely greeting from staff. We had booked a club room which we received Breakfast, Afternoon High Tea and Cocktails and Canapes every Day as well as soft drinks at any time we wanted. We were situated on the top floor (16th) and the club lounge is situated on the 2nd floor. I wouldnt want to be in room 200 as its right next to the club lounge and could be noisy. The beds were very comfortable and there is a coffee machine in the room which got put to good use. The beds were very comfortable. The pool

title: Club Intercontinental Singapore
desc: We had the most enjoyable time again as repeat club intercon guest.We were greeted and acknowledged by the lovely guest services team. I would like to express our special thanks to Ain for providing once again her great service. Great asset to the team. Highly recommend for a relaxing and enjoyable end to our holiday.

title: Excellent service
desc: I stayed her for 2 nights. The hotel is clean and comfortable. The rooms are quite large and the bathroom was nice with a large bath and separate shower. The staff at this hotel are outstanding. They are knowledgeable about the hotel, the surrounding areas and the Singapore as a whole. They were friendly and respectful and nothing was too much trouble for them. Their service really made my stay even better. The hotel is conveniently located to a shopping mall with direct access from the hotel to the mall and then to the train. I really could not fault this property

title: Overall Satisfactory overnight stay other than two sharp crews on the on carpet
desc: Stayed there for one night in order to catch up my SQ connecting flight to London next day. Due to my IHG ambassador status, I was upgraded to Jr Suite which was very spacious and well presented. They have the decent gym and nice restaurant which what I will need over the short stay. However to my surprise, I almost stepped onto two very small but very sharp screws when I tried to turned on TV in the living room. The screws were very small so difficult to be recognised on the dark coloured carpet. If I had had stepped over them, my foot would have been wounded.I called the service line and complained about this and a chap turned up collected the screws with an simple verbal apology. I also mentioned this to the ambassador help desk at the reception and emphasised the point it

title: Amazing friendly service
desc: We have spent 6 nights for a family / medical stay and the warm, professional and kind staff have been terrific, notably the outstanding Ms Hafiza, who has gone above and beyond in helping our girls enjoy their time whilst they have been worried and waiting for their father to recover at the Raffles Hospital nearby. Little gifts from housekeeping and the Club Intercontinental staff have been much appreciated. Thank you to all.

title: World Class Stay - Club Room is a must!
desc: We stayed at the Intercontinental over the festive period and my goodness, was this a treat! From the moment you enter the hotel, you are greeted with the loveliest of fragrances, wafting through the foyer. Check-in was completed in the club lounge. The lounge itself is beautifully decorated. Here, guests are treated to breakfast, high tea and light snacks, not to mention drinks galore! The staff are wonderful and polite. The rooms are stunning. It is clear that thought was put into every single facet of the room, from the linen to the furniture to the double sinks, it was all exquisite. We will definitely be staying at the wonderful establishment the next time we're in Singapore!

title: Great Hospitality
desc: We checked in this hotel at around 12 am expecting our standard rooms. We booked two standard rooms, with one being a points redemption room. When we were told we were upgraded, we did not think much of it and hence we did not have much of a reaction. However, that all changed when we arrived at the room and saw that both of the rooms were upgraded to the Heritage Suite. It was an extremely welcome surprise as we needed sleep and this large comfortable room certainly did the trick. The beds were pretty comfortable and the bedsheets were extremely soft. The sofas and chairs in the room were comfortable and clean. The showers had good pressure and there were large versions of the usual Agaria toiletries expected at any Intercontinental. Everyone we interacted with was pleasant

title: A Gem in the middle of the Central District
desc: Pre booked and pre paid on a special earlier in the year. Very impressed with friendly attentive service from arrival at the front door to departure. The club room was very good and the club lounge service second to none. The food available had excellent choices and very good quality. attention to detail was first class. A special mention must go to Ann Mapura and her team who were friendly, efficient and nothing was too much trouble for them

title: Sleepless in Singapore
desc: The location of this property is very central with a MRT station (Bugis) and mall all connected. The staff are friendly and the common areas and rooms are nicely appointed. Nice lobby and common areas. But I never had a good night's sleep. First night, went to the bathroom at 3am and the bathroom vanity was covered with dozens of ants, some near our toothbrushes. It was gross and I lost sleep looking around the room checking for additional ants. Avoid room 341. I told the front desk later that morning (they did not seem too surprised) and they said they could change the room and move our luggage while we went out touring. When we came back, we were pleasantly surprised to find we were upgraded to a junior suite, although they forgot to move our roll-away. Things were not

title: Nice Place but not for the price
desc: The pool was great, staff friendly, food is ok not great. The room was great size and spacious with two double beds for my 2 and 3 yr old and my partner and me and clean. Room service was not great and a high price. We ate at the club room for breakfast which was a good spread but wish oat milk was available. We had afternoon tea, for 2 kids and 2 adults but only got two portions of afternoon tea so had to ask for more, the afternoon tea isn't actually afternoon tea it is a poor version of the afternoon tea served in the main room which I have photoed as there is a vast difference. The club membership is a con you don't actually get the full package that you would get if you just paid for afternoon tea in the main room. The cocktails and snacks, cocktails are amazing, snacks

title: Excellent stay around New Year !
desc: Stayed after Christmas for six days in the Intercontinental Singapore. Booked Club rooms which also give access to the Club Lounge with e.g. afternoon tea and later cocktails & canap√©s. Besides these pleasant extra‚Äôs (included in your room rate) one off the other nice things is the highly professional staff of the Club lounge, who can assist you also with questions on locations to visit, restaurants etc. For our stay Jess was the person who with her tips especially enhanced our stay (e.g. on advisable hikes). This is what makes a stay in one of the better hotels in Singapore outstanding. Hotel also has a nice swimming pool, excellent breakfast and is very good located very close to the Bugis underground station/ several bus stops. Would definitely recommend staying here

title: Once again an excellent stay
desc: I have stayed at the Intercontinental, Midland Road, Singapore many times, originaly on business trips, and more recently on leisure trips with my wife. This year we stayed 13 nights with club membership. We received an upgrade to a larger room as a result of our Intercontinental Ambassador membership. As always our reception, the general service, efficiency and pleasantness of the staff was excellent. We were made to feel really welcome. On some of my previous visits maintenance of the room has occasionally been an issue, not so this trip, no problems with daily maintenance, turn down, water, supplies etc.

title: A Nice stay
desc: Stayed in a club lounge room for three people the service was very good and helpful. The room was well appointed and a good size Amy problems we had were effortlessly sorted and a credit to the staff. The pool area was very good And we had drink at the lobby lounge. We made good use of the club lounge and and breakfast very good A marvellous stay in a Iconic hotel.

title: Beautiful old school hotel with modern features
desc: This was a very pretty hotel, the architecture was amazing to look at. The hotel itself was clean and had all the modern features you would expect of a hotel of this calibre. The rooms were well equipped, clean and everything functioned as expected. The staff on arrival are warm and welcoming. This hotel is situated about 15 mins walk from Haji lane ( if you are familiar with that ) and there are plenty of things to do around there.. Its location was not too far away from Marina Bay either and in my opinion, this hotel is much nicer the MBS. Dont hesitate to stay here

title: Relaxing Stay
desc: I recently stayed at the InterContinental Singapore in January. I really enjoyed my stay and would highly recommend this hotel. The staff were very helpful and friendly with any questions and setting up transportation. The room was extremely clean and showed no wear and tear. The bed was one of the most comfortable I have experienced, which helped getting a good nights sleep. The air conditioning also worked really well. I appreciated how quiet the room was and the hallway. It made for a truly relaxing stay.

title: Fabulous hotel
desc: We have stayed at this hotel a few times and it has always been outstanding.the rooms are lovely and the staff attentive.a perfect location with the MTR right next door and an absolutely outstanding breakfast offer.its worth the extra and try to get it in your package Love it!

title: Super Stay in Singapore
desc: First time my husband and I had stayed at this hotel. What a wonderful place. We stayed in a Club room, which gave us access to the Club Lounge for breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails with snacks in the evening. Everything about the accommodation, food, drink and especially the staff was top notch. Forget about Raffles, we found it a bit fake and over the top, The Intercontinental is just as luxurious but far more homely and genuine. Thanks to all the lovely staff for making our stay so enjoyable and memorable.

title: Fabulous Oasis in Singapore
desc: We ended up in Singapore after several weeks in Asia. We were ready to get home, but wanted to enjoy a few days in the city before our long trip back to the USA. We choose the InterContinental because our experience with them has always been good. We upgraded to a club suite to enjoy the extra amenities offered. We were not disappointed! We had a wonderful stay! The service was outstanding, the rooms were spacious and well appointed, and the location was perfect for everything we wanted to do. We loved the food and service in the club. We also really enjoyed the pool area. Another highlight was the live music in the lobby/coffee shop area during high tea time in the afternoons. Overall we were "wowed" by the hotel and the staff and look forward to returning in the future.

title: Friendly and courtesy
desc: Thank you Sophia from lobby lounge for your friendly and courtesy service. I had a great time enjoying my drinks. Your staff Joanna and Fish were helpful. They were attentive to customers. And alert when I signaled for them. It was a lovely stay for the trip.

title: Nice hotel
desc: all staff are very nice, good and friendly, the early check in really very warm for flight in morning. very good accommodation. the welcome drinks also very good for IHG member i would appreciate if have chance to be upgrade to better room or enjoy the executive lounge next time. that would be perfect.

title: Heritage Room Disappointment
desc: Heritage room was huge with classic local woodwork and wooden floor together with a large bathroom. However, In many respects it was like a tired 1970s room that had not been renovated. There was no view to speak of except neon lights from Plaza across the road. I could not get one of the heritage showers to work. The Heritage Wing can only be reached by climbing 27 stairs which would be difficult with anyone with a mobility problem. Hotel was otherwise excellent. Suggest you book a normal room unless you really know what you are getting in the Heritage Room

title: BEST LOCATION AND AWESOME SERVICES
desc: The hotel has an exceptionally good exterior and even better interior. With one of the best locations in Singapore, this hotel is a tourist haven. Its next to the food street of Buggis and malls. The Ambassador checkin / checkout was swift and easy. The rooms are big and spacious. House keeping is doing a great job in keeping them clean. Due to the new year, the hotel was fully booked but we never had a problem with any of the services. The concierge services are very helpful.
