A good example would be Ms Fiona Gan, who I strongly believe, is an asset to the hotel. As an IHG Rewards Club Platinum Ambassador member, I look forward to meeting Ms Gan who will efficiently process the check in, while at the same time, share with me the Covid-19 measures and precautions taken by the hotel to protect both staff and guests. Ms Gan is professional during the course of her duty. She will clarify any doubts I have regarding my stay, which I really appreciate. It has been a challenging period for all and I wish Ms Gan and the

title: Wonderful Staycation, as always
desc: I am a fan of staycation, and have tried various hotels. My family fell in love with Intercontinental Singapore ever since our stay with them a few years ago. We have since signed up for the intercontinental ambassador, where we get complimentary upgrades for all our hotel stays. The complimentary upgrade from grand deluxe room to junior suite is very useful in providing sufficient space for our family of four. As a club guest, there is breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktail and canap√©s served. Food is of high quality, and quantity is definitely sufficient. I also like the coffee, tea and drinks selection offered by the club. There are many reasons that make me keep coming back. First of all, it is the most value-for-money. I don‚Äôt think you can get a stay in a suite and

title: Loved the staycation!
desc: Nice scent at the lobby, felt so calm & inviting. I loved the room with plush mattress. But I don't love the pilllows. Bcoz my head sink into the pillow. Wished its a little more firm yet soft. The gym has sauna. Breakfast was not bad, it wasn't the buffet kind but portion was small. Overall, I love my staycation.

title: Room with Peranakan vibes
desc: Stayed in the hotel during Christmas 2020. Booked a Deluxe Room that came with breakfast and $50 dining credit which can be utilised for room service. Room is spacious and clean, there is a speaker in the toilet where you can listen to what the TV is currently playing. Channels are plently. Swimming pool is too small and overcrowded, with many kids around. Room service is great, meal is served promptly and courteous. Breakfast is one set per person due to COVID. Every table came with breads which are already very filling. Overall, good for a short staycation.

title: Poor ‚ÄòFamily First‚Äô staycation
desc: We did the ‚Äòfamily first‚Äô staycation package at intercontinental on 28 Dec. I‚Äôd like to think that maybe IHG was experiencing peak period but it wasn‚Äôt exactly a good staycation (compared to the 3 others we have done). No complaints about the room but service / food quality really needs improvement. 1. Repeated reminders about kids bed - checked in at 1pm and It took us 4 reminder calls at different intervals for the bed to finally arrive close to 6pm. At the last call I was told the bed was already sent to the room an hour ago but we were in the room the whole time and nobody came. It was only after I ended the call the bed arrived. The bed came but not pillow which they had to make another trip again. 2. There was suppose to be kids and family amenities. None was there

title: Peranakan & Colonial Charms
desc: I recently stayed at InterContinental Singapore under the Suite Surprise promotion, where I spun the wheel and received the very nicely appointed Executive Suite. The suite was full of Peranakan and Colonial charms, and had a grand character, which actually extended throughout the hotel. The room with its high ceiling felt large but had a strangely claustrophobic feeling shower cubicle. Agraria's Lemon Verbena amenities were provided and initially, I was worried because I thought it might be similar to the Crabtree & Evelyn's Verbena and Lavendar ones at Hilton which I am not fond of. But the worries were unfounded as these Agraria were really good! There were some missing vanity items like cotton buds and cotton pads but I am guessing that they would be available on requests

title: My go-to hangout place!
desc: Haven‚Äôt been back awhile & warmly welcomed this time with a fresh face, Assistant Banquet Operations Manager Hafiz. Amazingly attentive service with great interaction with me & my girlfriend! Made us so happy tonight it was such a memorable birthday surprise! Thank you Hafiz you made our day! Will be back for your awesome service üòâ

title: Wonderful Year End Staycation and Birthday With Family
desc: We had a most wonderful family stay with my wife and four children. Had a wonderful family time celebrating my wife birthday and Christmas. The staff team went out of their way to make us feel so welcomed and our stay most comfortable! Surprised us with chocolate cake, macaroons and chocolates Christmas tree! Thank you to Ann Mapula, Dorothy Wong, Anna, Shimin and Wai Kit! Sincerely, Jacob and family

title: Back after more than 20 years, still good but no longer as impressive
desc: The last time I was in a room at the Intercontinental Singapore, was in 2000 when my old employer held a dinner-and-dance at this hotel's ballroom. I was part of the organising committee then, and we were given a room as part of the deal. So this time round, I am returning to this hotel after a break of more than 20 years. Which is interesting, as I always thought the concept of this hotel is a gem, combining the local Peranakan culture and design with the building's architecture and aesthetics. But to be honest, I checked out after a two-night stay somewhat underwhelmed. The room which I was given has obviously been updated with a relatively recent refurbishment, and the amenities expected of a 5-star hotel in 2020 are all there, including a flat-screen TV, fast-speed wifi

title: Classic Hotel with Excellent Service
desc: The Intercontinental Singapore is located in Bugis with easy access to both the East-West and Downtown MRT Lines. It is also a walking distance to the Civic District with its museums and galleries, as well as the nearby Arab Street, Bussorah Streets with heritage landmarks like the Sultan Mosque and old shophouses populated by cafes and restaurants to explore. The hotel is joined to the Bugis Junction shopping mall with several F&B offerings as well as a supermarket downstairs. We booked a room through the Suite Surprise promotion and got a Premier Suite and a very early check-in when the room was available. Despite the fine print that the offer would not grant IHG Rewards Club benefits, the hotel was gracious to offer a late-check out, bonus points as well as dining credit for

title: Staycationing before christmas rush
desc: We had an amazing stay at the intercontinental in early december 2020. Particularly enjoyed the resteraunt ash and elm and the loby lounge. In particular my duaghter made friends with a server in the loby lounge Fish Tung. He was extremely paitient and wonderful at keeping her amused. We really felt the kindness and attention showed by the staff made our trip memorable and special. In what has been a really difficult year for so many different reasons, this was very much a saving grace. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: A beautiful hotel, but elite status recognition is iffy
desc: While worn in places, this is still a beautiful hotel in general. In particular, we really enjoyed the club lounge, where the service was excellent. Having said the above, if you are an Intercontinental Ambassador member (or considering it), do be aware that many promotional offers exclude one or more of the programme's benefits. These exclusions may not be prominently displayed to you during the booking process. Check or ask for the fine print and take screenshots. In my own experience, I thought both the hotel and Ambassador Services handled this issue rather poorly, without directly addressing the issues I pointed out. The whole experience left a bad taste in my mouth. I doubt I will be staying at this hotel again anytime soon, and I'm not sure about membership renewal

title: Good location
desc: I chose the hotel for its centralized location and convenience as it is connected to Bugis Junction with lots of shopping varieties and a supermarket right at the doorstep. I have read about the excellent service and all in the reviews, but what i experienced was only so-so, nothing different from a lot of other hotels that are not even 5 stars, which was a bit of a disappointment to me. Plus point was that we were allowed to check-in much earlier than the stipulated time, which was great. But the hotel got my room rates wrong and I was initially presented with a bill that would have amounted to more than S$500 more than what was written in my booking bill. Nevertheless, that was quickly sorted out. Secondly, is the housekeeping - I was not told that housekeeping was only

title: Wedding at Intercontinental Singapore
desc: We are glad we chosen Intercontinental Singapore as the venue to host our wedding. We would like to especially compliment the banquet manager Hafiz and his team. They were professional and attentive. Received a positive feedback from one of our guest. The staff actually notice the guest is not consuming seafood and took the initiative to offer him another set of menu, which made the guest very happy of course. Overall, our guests were satisfied with the food and presentation. Once again, we would like to express our sincere thanks to the Intercontinental Singapore team. We would definitely return for a staycation on our wedding anniversary üëçüèª

title: Excellent hotel with very friendly staffs
desc: Hotel very clean n spacious. Staffs are all very nice and always service with a smile. Special compliments to Hafiz , who is very friendly and make the whole stay very nice. Will definitely come back again.

title: Decent stay
desc: The refurbished areas and deluxe rooms are nicely done in this rather old building. No waiting for check-in before 2pm. The staff was very polite and room/maintenance service showed up within a reasonable time. Breakfast was ok. Pool is quiet in the morning, afternoon is at max capacity (slot booking required). The Hotel is conveniently located in the Bugis is area. On the - side: - The (huge) Smart TV had 2 USB ports but it was impossible to play any media, neither after the device was detected nor by selecting the USB in Sources. The TV User Interface has been customized to forbid you from playing your content. Quite disappointing. Not sure the HDMI port can be used. You can try to AirPlay content on the hotel WiFi though. - AC temperature in the room is not cold enough,

title: Excellent staff and outstanding service
desc: Had a wonderful staycation here and booked our rooms with the Club InterContinental Lounge access. The Club InterContinental Lounge serves breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktails. It an excellent place just to unwind and the service is just simply outstanding. Kudos to Ann Mapula and her team for making our stay a memorable one.

title: Staycation - cannot deliver what they promise.
desc: I booked a Family First package to celebrate my wife's birthday (Check in on actual day!) Tho we are not expecting any surprise from the hotel we expect what is promised in the package to be set up on the room. Room was only ready at 4pm! we waited patiently for the room. Firstly there were no teepee set up, and no children bathroom amentites. And NO Gingerbread men kit that was supposed to be included. We called recption twice and they say will check! But nothing was delivered. Next we booked the pool for 4pm, it was so crowded (about 20pax), tho they mentioned at anytime max is 10pax! Their restaurant was full even tho we made reservations, food was so so. The rooms was clean and housekeeping was very efficient too.

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Had an enjoyable 2 nights stay at the hotel despite full occupancy and school holidays. This is especially so due to a few of the memorable staff such as Fahmi at the reception when we checked-in who was patient and friendly and informative. Dorothy from the club lounge is another excellent staff. Always smiling and attentive. The suites looks refurbished to me. I had the pleasure to stay in the Premier suite for the 1st night and Royal suite for the second night and loved both of them. Only think is that the toilets could be refurbished to a more modern look. The same goes for the swimming pool. Highly recommended.

title: Improvements needed
desc: I booked a 1 night stay to celebrate my daughter's birthday. For a 5 star IHG property, i was expected that the hotel would take note of this special occasion as my stay was planned on my daughter's actual birthday. Unfortunately, despite the staff asking for the birthdates of my children at check in, my daughter's birthday was not noted. For a 5 star property, this crucial detail should be noted by staff. The check in was fairly smooth and although there was a mix up about the booking timing for the pool usage, i'm appreciate that the staff rectified the mistake and came personally to the room to apologize. Breakfast and dinner was a seamless affair and like other reviews have stated, the food at ash and elms was a highlight for me. I wish to highlight that my check out

title: Worst 5 star hotel stay.
desc: Checked in on 18th dec 2020. As expected, rm was not ready yet as i went early to register incase of the long queues happening at all the other hotels. Managed to get a rm b4 3pm. Room was smaller than expected. Super warm through out the whole stay even though it was set at 18¬∞C and highest fan mode. The sofa was impossible to sit on as it collaspe down in the middle and doesnt resume shape. The toilet was somewhat huge but weirdly there isnt much space to hang towels and the shower area is so small that you cant take a step inside. The toilet also doesnt have proper ventilation and was warmer than the rest of the room constantly. The bed was horrible too. So soft that when i lay in it, my butt sinks lower than my legs. The pillow was so flat that its almost non existant 2

There were long queues and we took 2 hours to check-in. With two young children in tow, that wasn‚Äôt very fun. I expressed my disappointment to the front office staff who checked us in - as we really don‚Äôt have time to fully experience the hotel. She offered us a late check-out but we had to head off elsewhere so it didn‚Äôt matter. She gave us a $50 hotel credit in the end. We got the family package and so the staff told us to go to the lounge to enjoy our ice cream (one of the package‚Äôs perks) in the meantime but when we went there we were told that they were full due to the ongoing hi-tea. They did tell us they could deliver to our room

title: A Fantastic Experience
desc: Pre-booking enquiries were handled promptly and satisfactorily. Loved the hospitality and personal touch from the team at the club lounge - made our stay feel like being back in our second home. Room was clean and fresh. Beds were "intercontinental standard" comfortable. F&B spot on. Keep up the good work.

title: Christmas Staycay
desc: Great location located directly in Bugis Junction,great ambience & loved the architecture of the hotel from inside out,the view from the room was great tooüíô Breakfast was good & service was goodüëç Will definitely be back againüòç

desc: Classy hotel design, good service from the front-line staff and pet friendly. The downside, complimentary carpark is not available. Reason given by the hotel: carpark is controlled by malls. TBH, this is not a valid reason as the hotel may have made a bulk purchase from the mall. However, the hotel had made a decision to shift the cost to the consumer where we need to pay $20 per day for carpark. Moreover, with covid-19, most of the guests would be locals. Hence, I'm not sure if this makes others reconsider staying here.

title: Exellence Service By Club Team and Raidah

The room was amazing and in room dining was satisfying. Club staff was awesome and very service oriented. Thank you so much for all the memorable experience.

title: The best.

Service was tip-top as issues with the bathtub were resolved within 15 mins even in the middle of the night. Maintenance crew that came fixed the issue was friendly. Requests for extra towels and amenities were fulfilled smoothly as well. Overall, it was a pleasant stay in the hotel.

title: Amazing stay !
desc: Loved the ambience and friendly faces at Intercon. They are so well groomed and professional, providing great service and assistance at every corner . I even had my bathtub issue resolved at 12am (sorry for that!) It just shows the hotel is well equipped with staff to handle any situations. Would like to commend on the front desk staff - Edward who checked us in! Super knowledgeable and eased the entire check in process .

title: Great service recovery
desc: I redeemed some points for a stay so as to use some of the points I had accumulated but unable to use due to the Covid situation. There was a mix up at check in but the hotel did fantastic service recovery and I had absolutely no complaints. The high tea at the hotel was also great and greatly enjoyed the stay.

title: A great blessing in disguise!
desc: We had booked for a one-night stay at The Crowne Plaza Singapore a month ago and due to the current circumstances, Crowne Plaza offered for us to change our hotel to Intercontinental Singapore (Bugis) with no extra charges. We were very excited as Intercontinental is a global brand and we never had the chance to stay at this hotel. We were truly amazed the moment we stepped into the hotel with the ambience, scent, and heart-warming services from every staff. The hotel is equipped with modern architectural designs, furniture, which created a warm and cosy home-liked sensation. We were first warmly received by Lucinda, who is the Front Office Manager when we checked-in. Lucinda was very welcoming and friendly, which created a great first impression as we felt like we were coming

title: Amazing Time
desc: I had an amazing staycation with Intercontinental. I was well taken care of at Club Intercontinental by Ann and her team (Dorothy and WaiKit). They were courteous, personable and very helpful. I‚Äôll be back again!

desc: I booked a Suit Surprise package & truly enjoyed my stay. Services are courteous & prompt, and the front desk guy was super helpful in settling my request for room decoration within 6 hours for my wife's birthday celebration, as well as setting up a teepee for my little girl. I love the suite as it has the bygone era of colonial design with modern touch. Foods are great, and the location is perfect as connected to Bugis Junction & MRT. Will love to be back.

title: Outstanding staycation experience!
desc: As a IHG Platinum Ambassador member, I had a two night paid staycation at the Intetcontinental Bugis from Thursday to Saturday last week. The Club Intercontinental room with double beds was arranged for us, with access to the exclusive Intercontinental Club Lounge. Check in at the lobby was quick and friendly, and the IHG membership was recognised. The room was newly renovated, beautiful and amply furnished. Due to the current COVID situation, housekeeping was no longer a daily affair, though special requests may be made if you need daily housekeeping. What made this staycation simply memorable was the club lounge experience, with the friendly and kind staff who took great care of us during our stay. The food quality was amazing especially the excellent breakfast quality and

title: Good family staycation

We were offered complimentary parking as the room was only ready in the evening, good gesture & we were sent to the lounge for afternoon tea. The room we booked had 2 double beds which was spacious & clean. Due to COVID, the gym & pool required booking and only max 10 people allowed. However, there were parents with kids who hogged the centre of the pool that we could not swim across the pool. The club lounge was spacious & ambience was good. They serve breakfast, afternoon tea & evening cocktail. There was only one house cocktail served each day which was prepared in a big jug, we had Tom Collins which was rather bad

title: Wonderful stay
desc: My family stayed in their family suite late February, my daughters had a wonderful time playing with the slide that‚Äôs in the room. Apart from the room, as always we feel so delighted by the staff in the club lounge, really appreciate Anna, and the rest of the staff at the club lounge, for making our stay an unforgettable stay yet again. Looking forward to go back for another staycation soon.

title: Great staycation but Ash & Elm staff could‚Äôve been upfront on the cost of ‚Äòstill water‚Äô

Room was clean and tastefully decorated. Room size is good for a room of this level given that 28sqm or smaller is the norm for newer hotels in Singapore. The King Koil bed + plush mattress topper provided excellent comfort and we had a good rest. However,

title: A great experience
desc: I booked the mystery suite surprise and was provided the premier suite. During our stay, the staff at the club lounge were friendly and attentive, making our stay an enjoyable one. Additionally, the room was clean and overall, we had a great experience.

title: Fantatsic staycation
desc: Recently stayed at the executive suite which is a lovely suite. Big walk in area, comfy living room, comfortable poster bed, spacious bathroom. I don‚Äôt have to think hard when it comes to choosing a hotel for staycation. The service here from start to end is impeccable better than Singapore airlines? Haha. A good example would be Ms Fiona Gan, who I strongly believe, is an asset to the hotel. I absolutely love the club lounge, the staff are friendly and most importantly the food is top notch!!! Look forward to my next stay!!!

title: Excellent CNY Holiday Break
desc: It was a real pleasure staying in your hotel during the CNY holiday break. My wife Serena and I enjoyed our 3 day stay in the assigned Junior Suite King which was very nice and comfortable. Our enjoyment in your hotel was further enhanced by the excellent service provided by Ann Mapula, Club InterContinental Manager. It was a real joy to be served by Ann who was very professional yet so efficient, friendly and personable during our visits to the Club Lounge. She sets a very high service standard for her staff to emulate, and we could observe that they are following her example - fast, friendly and efficient service for hotel guests in the Club Lounge. Amongst the staff, we wish to mention in particular Wai Kit. She has a very cheerful personality and remember guests

title: Nice Hotel
desc: Beautiful hotel and great service. Everything was a amazing to make our staycation a memorable. Thank you so much to Ms Lee at front desk for giving us a nice rooms and connecting room for my family.We will come back for sure to this Nice Hotel again.

title: Greatest service from hotel ever
desc: They know your name before you get there, they‚Äôll refill your drink before you even ask, they‚Äôll remember your name the next day, they‚Äôll serve you the best food as much as you can order, and you‚Äôll have a blast. Manager Edward Lim in particular was awesome. Highly recommend.

title: Thank you for great service
desc: Did a staycation at Intercontinental Hotel and it was a pleasant experience. Hotel staff were very friendly and accommodating to our various requests, especially Mr Edward Lim who made this stay more enjoyable by paying close attention to our needs in the Club Lounge. Many thanks! :)

title: Above and beyond by Mr Edward L.

We were able to enjoy afternoon tea, evening cocktails and breakfast Ms. Ann from club lounge was very friendly and accomodating she made sure that we were comfortable and everything is to our liking. Thank you for a memorable birthday celebration.

As it was middle of the night, I didn‚Äôt dare wake the family but had to rush back to bed. Was worried for the next hour before I could fall back to sleep. title: Staycation
desc: A nice hotel with good ambience. Just next to Bugis Junction. Ample food & shops around the area. Edward from the front counter is very friendly. We were given free upgrade to premier room. Will sure to come back again.

The deluxe room is spacious, clean and comfortable. However when we requested for teepee the staff keep telling us the

title: Awesome Experience with the Customer Service

Front Office Manager please considers about this issues as well as Training Manager from HR department please offers to re-train some staffs who do not provide the good

Hotel is very conveniently located with the Bugis

My children totally enjoyed the stay and they look forward to every stay we book at intercontinental Singapore. Keep up the good work team! We will recommend our family and friends to Intercontinental Singapore.

title: Meeting Event
desc: A very well-organized hybrid meeting at the hotel. The team is very helpful and could accommodate to our urgent request. They went the extra mile to ensure the participants are well taken care of. Thanks a lot for all your help!!

title: Lovely staff, great service!

As it was the first time holding an event since Covid happened, and we are thankful that the hotel staff took the time to advise us on what are the necessary measures that we have to take. On the day of our event, the service team was also very helpful and attentive, they are always on standby to ensure that our requests are met. I‚Äôd like to thank Mugilan, Jocelyn and their lovely team for being so accommodating and helping us ensure that the event was a success.

title: Consistent, excellent and personalized service. Feels like home.
desc: Hotel is well situated next to the mall and near the subway train stations, as well as surrounded by nice eateries. Overall, this remains to be one of my favourite hotel. The "hardware" and

Additional info: we reckoned that the afternoon at the lobby lounge could be better than the afternoon tea

title: A Great Staycaytion
desc: We had booked a staycay on the 2nd March for 1 night and was greeted by Ms Fiona and led to our heritage room by Ms Anna. We had a personalised in-room check-in and also experience the Club IOntercontinental. Overall a wonderful and memorable stay and we felt safe throughout our stay!

title: Great to be back when Club Lounge is opened
desc: Felt satisfied and comfortable when the club lounge resumed operation. One can simply drop by for beverages in a nice ambience with attentive and service oriented staff as follows. They were friendly, helpful and served with enthusiasm. Certainly an asset to the Organization. Specially mention of different ethnic and good foods being served during breakfast hours. The gym was neat and clean and so the equipment but some need to be service on TV's Games Console as not sensitive or out of sync. Club Lounge : Anna, Wai Kit, Edward and Dorothy. Housekeeping : Shao Wei Chef : Aaron Tan. Overall, it's a great stay which I will be back.

title: Amazing suite with superb hospitality
desc: Had the most amazing time in the Ambassador suite with my husband - kudos to such a great service team (especially Bernard) who went out of their way just to make our stay perfect. Room was cosy and super clean, looked really atas and grand too! Would definitely come back again. Thanks intercontinental team!

title: Great stay at Intercontinental Bugis
desc: Thank you for a great stay to all staff, in particular Ms June (One Stop Service agent). A special shout out to Mr. Aloysius for the great check in & check out experience. He is patient and clear in explaining the benefits for our stay. Looking forward to our next visit to enjoy more facilities in the hotel!üòÑ

title: Disappointing
desc: I've always been an avid IHG member over the last 10 years with my membership being consistently renewed on a higher tier. That really means I do pay a lot of attention to putting preference on IHG , a brand that I love to maintain my status. For the most part, it has been excellent as I gained the recognition and attention as per member benefit wherever I travel globally. However, this recent stay at the Intercon Singapore made me think twice if I would switch loyalty to another brand because so far it has been a very good experience with that other brand. Sad to say with this recent stay, I am really disappointed and frustrated, almost verging on anger. Let me outline to you the series of unfortunate events: I made the booking several weeks ago and emailed my preference. I

desc: We decided to book a 3D2N staycation here with club access since we cant travel due to covid19. Best decision ever! Room wise tho dated but was clean, comfortable and well maintained, no old carpet smell or sewage smell compared to another city hotel that we stayed at. Club service was impeccable, Anna made us feel extremely welcome, special and was oh so kind to our girl and attentive to our needs.

title: Intercontinental Singapore Bugis
desc: I love everything about. It was a fantastic and marvellous experience like no other. The service rendered by the staffs of Intercontinental Bugis was beyond goodness where every needs as a hotel guest was given with thoughts, from the front desk, the reception counter, the suite that we stayed in and the Club Longe. Staffs like Zul that tend to me (front office), Edwards Lim from the club together with all the other service staffs was really satisfying and pleasant. The stay was really a joyful one where all that what Me and my spouse did was just enjoy fully the stay, service and hospitality. Everything was just amazing. Thank you all for the great memory that we will always cherished and remembered. üòäü•∞

title: Best service in Singapore
desc: In a word: outstanding! My husband and I stayed for 2 nights mid-week. From the time we were greeted outside the door by the lovely man who took our luggage to the moment we checked out, every interaction we had with staff was impeccable. The receptionist was thorough and clear about amenities and escorted us to the lift, the pool staff was friendly in offering towels, the restaurant staff was smiling, personable and efficient. We‚Äôd especially like to give a shout out to the f&b manager Anne, who was so warm and charming every time we saw her. Her whole team was just fantastic. The lobby lounge staff knew knew our names and treated us as if we were regular VIPs. We had dinner at Man Fu Yuan, the food was delicious, we had an excellent bottle of Spanish wine, and once again

title: Relaxing Weekend Getaway
desc: Did a quick weekend getaway for the first time at Intercontinental Singapore. Checked in on a Saturday at about 12.30pm and the front desk was alittle busy. Things have changed quite abit these days with COVID. Booked the premium room type but I was not able to check in at the lounge, neither was there a priority check in area for members with elite status, hence I have only one option, which was to join the queue (this spoilt my first impression). I was served by Edward Lim at the front desk and he saved the experience. Edward was patient in guiding me through the whole check in process and how things work around the hotel during this period with COVID. He provided clear and thorough guidance which was very helpful. I was lucky enough, that my room was ready at the time of

title: Making our last days in Singapore special
desc: Thank you Intercontinental team for making our last days in Singapore special. We enjoyed being well looked after during our stay. All the team was super nice and friendly; everything was well adapted to the Covid environment. We simply had a great time and hope to come back soon again.

We met the lovely club manager Ms Ann and she ensured that our stay was memorable. Very professional and courteous staffs. title: Great food!
desc: Attended a wedding banquet here. Compared to pre covid, food quality has improved very much and service very attentive :) the venue and ambience is still very much top notch! An excellent wedding venue!

title: Excellent service by the Banquet & AV team
desc: Had a wonderful time attending a wedding at InterContinental Singapore. Want to give an incredible shout out to the magnificent service by Jason and John from the Banquet Ops team and also Wira from AV. They went to great lengths to make the impossible happen! 6 stars quality customer service!!!

title: Wedding lunch - 13 March 2021
desc: My wife and I wanted to host our wedding in Nov 2020 but had to postpone due to COVID-19 restrictions. He was professional in explaining the hotel rules and was quick to offer alternative suggestions for us to consider in view of the current restrictions. The floor manager, Jason, was also professional and respectful to our guests and us throughout the entire event. We were highly impressed with the way Jason facilitated the

title: Presentation Event

Despite the busy lounge, the staff there was amazing. We were warmly welcomed by Ann each time we stepped into the lounge. She's very helpful and always smiling. The club lounge offers both afternoon tea and evening cocktails. The food had some hits and misses but overall it

We booked 2 adjoining rooms and she arranged for the rooms nearest to lift lobby because of our elderly parents. What a nice start to our family staycation..!

The staff were able to recall both our drink and food preferences which was quite impressive considering the lounge could get rather crowded at times. Do they take secret notes when

title: 5 stars for everything
desc: Our family had a very enjoyable staycation with Intercon. Particularly, every staff from the Club Lounge were top notch. They have been working hard during the school holidays period. We would like to thank the team for their professional care.

title: Staycay with furkid
desc: My wife and I (with our fur kid had a pleasant stay. Service was good and the room was pleasant as well. We were served by Aloysious when we checked in and checked out and he was very detailed. We had the dine in room breakfast at it was good as well.

title: Pity about the pillows and the Chinese restaurant
desc: A good stay for the price. Extremely convenient location (connected to mall, numerous eateries, cinema, nearby places of interest, MRT etc). Easy pleasant check-in (and out). Lovely in-room amenities; in particular, generous with mineral water - that‚Äôs very good! Great robes and towels. Fast attentive service. I liked that the hotel sent out a notice to ask for room preferences a week before my actual stay. Pity they didn‚Äôt revert regarding the check-in times which I had requested for, and I had to personally call to enquire. My little grouse is that the room is rather small compared to some of the intercontinental hotels I‚Äôve stayed overseas, but really, it‚Äôs good enough. Also, the pillows were so soft and flat I got a neck ache the next morning... so that‚Äôs why I

title: Singapore Staycation
desc: Intercontinental Singapore never fails to impress. Warm service, genuine smile - well taken care of in the Club Lounge by Attentive Ann and her staff, I just keep coming back to this IHG property for a short getaway from work.

title: Pleasant Staycation with Excellent Customer Service
desc: We stayed at the deluxe room family first package over the weekend and it was a good impromptu staycation. Firstly, the customer service were excellent except for 1 incident. The front desk and Ash & Elm restaurant staff were awesome especially during dinner on Saturday evening. I thought the restaurant staff handled us perfectly because of our hyperactive and noisy kids. The NOT SO GOOD part happened at night when I was trying to access the the entrance from Bugis Junction to the hotel, I couldn't get in as it was about 10+pm and this lady chef saw me from Ash & Elm(chatting with 2 other staff and I saw her looking over) and she ignored me I guess? Luckily a guest came out after 5 mins of waiting. Disappointing HOWEVER, this particular staff called Andrew made me gave the

title: Wedding was perfect
desc: Had my wedding on 17 Apr. It was perfect! And two person who make it perfect were: Shane (wedding co) was patient to answer all our questions on the wedding venue , perks and what‚Äôs not. Mugilan (banquet manager) was accommodative on all our requests, he basically hold our pieces tgt. As drunk newlyweds we were all over the place. Without his cue , we will be lost and have zero idea what to do next. Super grateful he was our banquet manager and was there to help us on everything. We really enjoyed ourselves and the feedback we got from our guests were great. Love the food, drinks came on time and safety precautions were strict and firm. Also a big shout out to the concierge team, our room was a mess due to all the confetti and alcohol stains. Called them over around ungodly

title: Wonderful stay in our 2nd home in Singapore
desc: What a memorable stay for us again! Check-in: 27 April | Check out: 29 April Being a regular guest in the Club Intercontinental at the Bugis property, it is great to catch up with old friends from the Club Intercontinental team again. Bringing my elderly parents along this time, Ms. Ann, the Club Intercontinental Manager made a wonderful arrangement for us to have connecting rooms with a great view of the city skyline. From check in to check out, we were warmly welcomed as a family by the club team- Ann, Anna, Wai Kit, and everyone whom we sadly did not manage to get your name this time in the Club. Everything is top notch from the Executive Lounge to the rooms. We are already planning our next stay here. Thank you so much for taking great care of us! Dion Chan

title: One of the best hotels in Bugis
desc: Love the hotel. Huge rooms at level 12, shower+bath tub in room. Smart TV in room with Spotify, Google Chrome TV and Air play. Service is good and nice breakfast at level 1(not buffet). One of the best hotels in Bugis area.

title: Huge bed but dated room
desc: Booked the mystery suite promotion. No luck and gotten the smallest suite. The room was dated but the bed is huge. The club lounge access and the hotel staff service saved some points and made my day better. Overall stay okay.

title: Probably never again
desc: Disappointing 5 stars hotel right from the moment we stepped into the hotel. I was handling 2 luggage and a carry-on while my husband went to park his car with the children. One of my bag fell from my luggage and the bell hop just stood to look at me. When I managed to pick up my stuff, he ushered for me to check in and move along - that‚Äôs when I ask if there is nobody to help?! He told me to look for the concierge inside for help. Cannot believe what I heard and just joined the queue anyway. Minutes later same bell hop rushed over and apologized, told me he was very busy. Is that an excuse for his curt service though? Called at about 10am to request for early check in but concierge told me the room was not available unless I pay for upgrade. I agreed to do so as I want to

title: Love the convenience of the location
desc: We booked for a night stay that comes with lounge access which comes with breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktails and canape. The room has a Peranakan feel and is really spacious. The staff has provided us with excellent service. However, we could tell that they were quite shorthanded at the lounge but they still manage to keep up with their services. The evening canape was a lil disappointing as some food were out of stock due to the overwhelming orders. All in all, thanks for feeding us and keeping us satisfied with your hospitality.

title: Wonderful Experience
desc: My partner and I had the most amazing experience at Intercontinental Singapore (Bugis). From the moment we checked in, our needs were well taken care of by the hotel staff. The staff were friendly and made sure that our staycation was a memorable one. I would like to thank the whole team at Intercontinental Singapore for an amazing time. I highly recommend it to everyone who is thinking of staying here. Their hospitality towards their guests is first class and it is something I have never experienced during my stays in other hotels.

title: Excellent guest services and great hotel location.
desc: Lovely rooms and excellent guest services. Would definitely recommend a stay at the Intercontinental. It was an amazing experience. The pool was a gorgeous space to hang out and all safety measure were observed at the hotel. Tea and cocktails at the club lounge was delicious. Breakfast served had many options too. The restaurants are excellent, especially Man Fu Yuan and Ash & Elm. Great location in Bugis with lots of shopping near by. Good access to public transport and trains.

title: Wonderful playground room for toddlers
desc: The kids really enjoyed their jungle themed room, complete with bunk beds and slide. The thoughtful kid-friendly amenities in the bathroom was a nice touch too. I particularly love the step stool that was placed in the bathroom, so that the kids could reach the tap and sink easily. The tiny human bathrobe was also really cute and nice. Only area of discomfort was trying to get to the hotel lobby from the carpark. Due to covid restrictions, the door was locked from the inside, and we were stranded there at the carpark with our luggages and kids for quite a while. There was a number for us to call if we needed help to open the door but no one answered it. Thankfully, one of the staff was walking past the door and saw us outside the door, and he went on to open the door for us.

title: Nice hotel, warm service and great breakfast!!
desc: Stayed at the Heritage room with out pet dog last week. Checked into the Hotel without any hassle.. From the lobby to our room, all staffs who we passed by acknowledge us with a smile (can tell even with their mask on!). While we were trying to to find our room after a walk and we met Jason Lee whom i think he mentioned is the banquet manager noticed that we looked lost and kindly showed us to the room. Food for our dog looks great and she finished everything (except for the veggies.. lol).. Breakfast was great.. Kangxin who delivered our breakfast to our room is professional and even go through the food with us to make sure nothing is left out. Room size is ok and clean.. not much view to see as we are amenities for dog too are small for my Husky.. Would be great if we

title: 5 star hotel and service!
desc: Our stay was affected when the phase 2 was announced, although we can cancel or postponed but we continued to stay, and we did not regret it. This is because all of the staffs there were very attentive and always ask us if we need any assistance. The first night we still able to dine in their club lounge and the service were fantastic! The staffs will ensure that our food and drinks are adequate and will keep asking if we wanted any refills (perks of club access ;p) 2nd day onwards, which is the start of phase 2, gym and dine-in were closed. So I went to run around the vicinity and I managed to catch otthers having their breakfast and sunbathing along the marina bay and I enjoyed the Merlion view while running. Our food was also served to our room, blessing in disguise, we

title: Staycation (before dine in ban)
desc: Throwback review to journal my stays. This was my 2nd stay in intercontinental sg. Lovely room and view. Breakfast was better than my first stay as I recall in terms of food and service, maybe contributed by the crowd (didn't have the Bakery basket and fruits served during the first). There was also a dim sum and congee truck pushed around, tasted good. Location is right within Bugis Junction, good to do some shopping. Overall a comfortable stay.

title: Lack of room amenities
desc: Booked the family room over the weekend 3D2N for my birthday. It was a cute room but definitely not suited for inroom dining /room service as it was lack of chairs. I ended up having to stand up after finding it a pain to sit on the ladder to the bed. There were only the usual shower gel, shampoo, conditioner and body cream. No shower cap, no toothbrush etc. It was quite a pain. I think it would be decent to at least have an entire set as usual instead of limiting or not even provide for it.

title: Enjoyable Stay
desc: Love the huge and cozy room, the ambience and the interior decorations of the hotel and the convenience of the location which is right smack in the middle of the food and shopping districts. Great selection of food served during breakfast, afternoon tea (lesser tea options but is fine) and cocktail. Staffs were friendly (special mention: Wu Zhong Ming and the lady that serviced our Suite level) and attentive, reaction to request is fast. Late check-out was also accommodated to fit out plans. Was definitely an enjoyable stay and we would likely be back after few more exploration. ;) On the down side: No complimentary parking (never really encountered 1 that doesn't provide), checking out was slow as we had to buy the parking coupon from the counter else we would have used the

title: Great long weekend at Intercontinental Singapore
desc: We celebrated the long Easter weekend at Intercon Singapore, thanks to a great promo on Klook. We got the package with Club access and the exceptional service (especially from Ann at the Club Intercontinental), excellent location, and the Club amenities made for a relaxing weekend in the city. We will definitely be back!

title: Easter staycation @ Royal Suite
desc: Our return visit to Intercontinental Singapore was another memorable and delightful experience made possible by the warm hospitality from Club Intercontinental Manager Ms Ann. A big thank you for making our stay an excellent one.

title: Suite Surprise @ Royale Suite
desc: Ms Ann, Club Intercontinental Manager has never failed to welcome all guests and us with our names and remembered our preferences as well when we were in the Club Lounge. It's definitely a yes to opt in for club lounge access whenever you are staying at Intercontinental Singapore with a team of well trained and professional staff lead by Ms Ann.

title: Family First Staycation
desc: So we ordered their Family First Staycation and got a free upgrade to Premier suite which was quite a treat since the kids enjoyed running around the room. There were 4 check-in counters tho I wished they had done staggered check-in as well. The provided breakfast was good tho I can't say the same for dinner. The kids menu had limited choices, only fried rice & beef burgers. My kids chose beef burgers & couldn't go past the 1st burger as the patty was too thick for them to handle. Another strange thing was the aircon. We had adjusted the temperature up to 27 degC & set the lowest level of fan yet it was still very cold. It was as if the controls were not working. Overall the stay was quite ok, tho I wished the pillows provided could be firmer. The ones we had, literally sunk in

title: Great birthday staycation
desc: Booked the family first staycation for birthday celebration. Checked in process took about 20mins which is quite fast given that it's the start of the long weekend. We were attended by Zul and grateful that we were upgraded to a higher level with pretty nice view. Room was clean & comfortable. Like the space for bags and shoes which doesn't clutter the floor. Non slip bathtub & speakers in the bathroom were a plus point for us. It will be good if pillows are firmer. Dinner was included in the package. Staffs are friendly at Man Fu Yuan. Breakfast at Ash & elm was fast & efficient. Special shout-out to John Looi who served our table very well. Fruit juices & breakfast set were great. It will be even better if the bread basket taste better. Would love to come back again to

title: Birthday Celebration at Man Fu Yuan
desc: Having few friend together celebrate my birthday at Man Fu Yuan, the food is very good and excellent service provide by Chin Chin and Shirley... For sure will visit again and recommend my friend. Cheers....

title: Cold service, unprofessional instant / room service
desc: Booked a staycation on Klook for 1 night with $100 dining credits and 20% discount on F&B. Was given a slightly early check in and late check out, however there was a very disturbing incident upon checking into the room. The instant service staff brought up a birthday cake to the room and rang the doorbell a couple of times. As I was in the shower and couldn't answer or make any response to the door, the staff decided to use his key card to enter on his own accord to the room. He must have heard the shower and realized there was actually somebody in the room. I heard him make a self exclamation "oh" and quickly exited the room. Few minutes later when I got out of the shower, I got a call telling me a staff is outside the room to deliver a cake. No admission of a mistake and the

title: Club Intercontinental Worth A Try
desc: Pretty good value for money suite surprise at $388nett stay during weekday and certainly a good way to try out Club Intercontinental. Both Ann and Anna from the Club were just amazing in looking after their guests, from remembering names to ensuring your requests are always met and done in an efficient and friendly manner. To my surprise, even with the rest of the team being very young (supposedly mixture of trainees and new staff), they are also trying their best in providing what a 5 stars hotel should be doing (Which is quite rare to find these days in some '5 stars' hotels). This is certainly very commendable and kudos to the training provided by their seniors in my opinion. Club offering wise pretty standard, but as the lounge is very spacious itself, bookings are not

title: Attentive customer service
desc: Fiona approached me when she realised I waited for a long time for the person in front of me to check in and expedited the process for me. She also upgraded my room and arranged for a bday cake to be delivered. Thank you for making my stay a pleasant one.

title: A perfect staycation
desc: The covid19 pandemic really hit us very hard because we are unabke to travel abroad. So we started doing staycations instead. We have been to several hotels and thus far this is the most pleasant and awesome experience. We are very impressive with the hotel deco and ambience as well as their excellence service. We got the dedicated Intercontinental clubroom access and it was excellent .Breakfast, afternoon tea and evening cocktails were provided at the clubroom .The selections and quality of food are very good and delicious. They were delicately presented and we enjoyed every morsels of food served. They also have a wide array of hot and cold beverages .Due to the pandemic food and drinks were served in an ala carte buffet manner direct to our table with unlimited refills. We

title: Family Suite
desc: My kids loved the hotel stay. Stayed at the family suite which comes with the slide and bunk beds in the room. Will recommend for family with siblings who they can spend their time running up the bunk bed and slides while the parents chill out. Great service and staff!

title: Staycation
desc: I had a remarkably warm and welcoming entrance when I stepped in the lobby. Simply brilliant! Simply magnificent! I wish to thank Concierge Mr. Fahmi for helping me out with my rooms and I would certainly come back in time to come. My family had a wondeful stay,the rooms were all up to standard. Brilliant!

title: Very dissappointed
desc: I am very sure that your service need to improve as there are no warm welcome that impress me. This staycation was supposed to celebrate my son‚Äôs birthday but turned out to be the worst ever from any hotel that I have ever experienced. Very first impression when a guest step into your hotel, there are no welcoming gesture from any of your staff. Secondly, you emailed the guest to request for their needs but you are unable to fulfill it. It will definitely dissappointed the guest. Thirdly, guest need to pay $20 per entry for parking. First dissappointment, I had requested earlier to check-in at 12:00pm. I gave the management an ample time to prepare my rooms as I check-in at 2:30pm. Unfortunately rooms were not ready. Second dissappointment, I requested for a high floor as

title: Hotel with Peranakan decor and excellent location
desc: Pros: I always like Intercontinental hotel for it's location and peranakan decor. Check in was assisted by Edward Lim and it was fuss free, we got to check in early as well. Bed was comfy, complimentary coffee and tea sachets were generous Cons:our room had some clicking/rumbling sounds periodically. not sure if it came from the fridge or aircon. Railing at the bathtub was loose and shaky. Bathtub was peeling. Was slightly disappointed they did not provide any perks as it was my birthday as I was comparing them with another hotel I stayed the day before.

title: Great refreshed rooms and excellent Club Lounge & service
desc: Pre-arrival ‚Äì no pre-arrival email was sent which I thought was unusual especially for Club guests. Ah wells. Check In ‚Äì The lobby was peacefully empty at 12nn on a weekday and I was attended to immediately. Because of the seemingly confusing booking permutation, check in took almost 20mins to be sorted out. My requests for early check in, later check out (4pm), connecting room arrangement, and room upgrade was all granted with no problem albeit with a little nudging on the upgrade. Club Grand Deluxe King (40SqM) upgraded from Club Intercontinental King ‚Äì I really liked this layout of this room! A cushy king bed was separated by a partition which holds the 2x TV on each side; with the other side being the ‚Äòliving room‚Äô area which holds a super nice lounge-y sofa, the work desk

title: Great Customer Service
desc: Thank you Edward Lim for the warmest welcome service in assisting Check In and additional requests. Will be back again for holidays. I will also recommend intercontinental Singapore to my friends and family for holiday Staycation!!!!

title: Great Family Hotel
desc: I highly recommend Intercontinental Hotel for their fabulous theme rooms and Family First package. You will be well taken care of from the moment you check in till the time you leave. Smack right in the middle of Bugis, it had great connection to Bugis plus, Bugis Village, OG, Haji Lane, Little India, City Hall and many more. The location is perfect for any last minute shopping or food. But the hotel alone will keep you so occupied too that you hardly have time to leave. First up, the room alone will make the kids go bonkers as they go sliding up and down the slide (only hotel with a slide in the room), the long play tables was perfect for work, play, crafts and food. Usually hotel rooms only have a very tiny small coffee table or study desks which are too high for kids. Dual

title: Best stay ever!
desc: I would like to thank Ann Mapula, the hotel‚Äôs Club Manager for her superb service and arrangements made for me and my wife. I must say that my stay at IH have been the most pleasant compared to my many experiences I had with other hotels, All the staff were especially friendly and helpful and will efficiently respond to the needs. Thank you Ann, for making our 4d3n so comfortable and pleasant! Thank you IH for the heartwarming service! Will strongly recommend this hotel to everyone who wants to have a comfortable and pleasant staycation. Oh by the way, you do not have to drive around to look for delicious food as there re many good food at the hawker Centre and in the nearest shopping malls. And you are just a few steps away from the shopping mall. From Robin Tay

title: Hospitality is second to none
desc: We have visited many places and been lucky enough to have done so at a reasonable level. So when we were offered the chance of a club room experience at the Intercontinental, Singapore, of course we said yes. Due to the covid epidemic everything is quieter than you would expect but the service is second to none. The staff are working so hard to make sure your every need is attended to and fail at nothing. We have had several days experiencing the club room and every single day has been absolutely perfect. Why would you not do it when you have the chance. Can I give special thanks to the Club Room manager, Ann and her staff including Dorothy and Shimin. They have made our stay particularly special and nothing is too difficult for them.

title: Short staycation
desc: Had a solo staycation at Intercontinental Bugis. Room was spacious and big. Bed was soft and very very comfortable! It had a small table that I could use for work and was able to zoom as the WiFi was quite fast! Used the gym and the size of the gym was the same as a regular gym outside. Location was fantastic, it is right in the middle of Bugis area, with bugis junction just next to the hotel and bugis Street just across the road. I could get many good food deals around and also wide selection of things for shopping. Bath tub was nice. Price is on the upper range, otherwise, I would go more frequently.

title: Excellent
desc: Thanks RSVN Miss Nana, she do an extra mile to help me change my booking, she meet my need and extend the service! I really spent a happy staycation with my friend here. Pls help transfer my greet to her, thanks!

title: 30th Wedding Anniversary short Staycation at Intercontinental Hotel
desc: Although currently is phase 2 heightened security ,Stay in hotel room enjoying movie. My hubby and myself really like spacious room,deluxe king bed. The staff are friendly .Upon arrival ,they sent us macaron as welcome gift.The atmosphere is great ! Will book another staycation in September to celebrate my birthday.

title: Lovely stay!
desc: My friend and I stayed here last night, and we would like to express our heartfelt thanks to the staff who made our stay a memorable one. We were upgraded to a Club room and were served afternoon tea, evening cocktails and breakfast. The food and service was amazing :) Thank you all very much!

title: Amazing Service!
desc: Amazing experience! Would like to compliment the maintenance staff, Shawn and another gentlemen in his 40s (I didn‚Äôt catch his name) for going above expectations to try and assist me on connecting my Apple TV. Thank you for making my stay entertained!

title: Great service but room has tiny ants
desc: Want to give a thumbs up to Fahmi for his thoughtfulness and good service. There was a long line at the check in counter and he saw that I was pregnant and waiting in line, he told me to go over his counter so that I can be served immediately. Staff there been great so far. Breakfast selection is quite limited but has all the basics and the servers were attentive. Bed size is good but there were tiny ants (though not a lot) in the bathroom. Still a good short staycation as location is convenient.

title: Birthday staycation
desc: Me and my husband was here on the 24-25 May for my birthday celebration. When checking in, we were greeted by the warm smiles of the staff and checked in by Mr Edward Lim. He was very friendly and welcoming. We were even upgraded to the Premium deluxe room with an early check in at 11am. (Thank you!) A birthday cake was later brought into the room as a surprise. The overall stay was excellent, room was beautiful and clean and location was superb! We had such a great time and will definitely stay here again.

title: Wedding Banquet
desc: We held our wedding banquet at Intercon a few days ago & I would like to give thanks to all the staff, especially John. He was so quick to handle everything with great service. Was very encouraging and thoughtful to all the guests and VIP tables too. We had such a great time with the hotel & working with John directly. 10/10 would recommend!

title: Flakey n dry yolk mooncakes ü•Æ
desc: Flakey n dry yolk mooncakes ü•Æ I have been ordering from Inter-con for few years now. I ordered in 2 batches. The first batch is usually early n it‚Äôs meant for me to savor it early in the season‚Ä¶ The second batch is for give away closer to the festive date. However this year the yolk is flakey n very dry. Very disappointing. How to give out as gifts?? Please see the photos. Unfortunately I can‚Äôt upload a clearer video. I have provided feedback to a managerial staff on 24/8 n he has promised that someone will contact me. However no one called. Bad service?? Very unlike of Intercon‚Ä¶.. Please contact me as I wished to cancel my order since the standard has dropped.

title: Wedding Reception
desc: We held our wedding banquet at Intercon yesterday and it was truly splendid. My special thanks to the chefs for taking time to listen to us and customised the dishes to our guests liking. And not forgetting our amazing event coordinator, Mr Mugilan. He have done so great in ensuring that all our demands are met. Especially all those last minutes requests. He is patience and tactful to managed us to ensure a superb wedding reception. Despite the Covid regulations, he ensure that safety and expectations are all met. To Continental team, Thank you soo much for making this event a success. Food, ambience and service is all better than our expectations. We had such a great time with the hotel and again a shout out to Mugilan. 200% will recommend and come again.

title: Wedding dinner of Derrick Dang & Kerise Sim
desc: Hi Mugi, On behalf of my wife and I, we would like to give special thanks to you and the entire staff who was working during our banquet. We had nothing but compliments for the service and thank you for making our day extra memorable. Each and everyone was so caring and helpful that we felt at ease. It made our wedding much much easier and we enjoyed ourselves so much :) Please do extend our gratitude to all the staff working on the day of our wedding and we will definitely remember this day for the rest of our lives! Just a small feedback on the portion of the food - it was slightly too small but otherwise, the chef did a great job in preparing the food. We are glad we chose Intercontinental Hotel as our wedding venue and would definitely recommend you guys to our friends

title: Wedding reception
desc: Would like to commend the Intercon team esp our wedding co-ordinator, Ms Vivian Koh and banquet manager, Mr John Lai for their excellent service! They are accomodating to our requests and provided helpful suggestions to make the reception a success. For example, as our laptop had issues screening our montages, they even offered to bring their personal laptop as a last resort to help us screen our montages. While we managed to overcome our laptop issues, their kind gesture was very much appreciated and calms our nerves knowing that we are well supported with a contingency plan. Additionally, the intercon team is very well organised and attentive to our and our guests' needs. The food served is excellent! Our guests felt very much welcomed by intercon's friendly and experienced

title: Wedding reception
desc: We held our wedding lunch reception at Intercontinental in end-October - highly recommended and no regrets at all with choosing the hotel for our wedding! We would like to commend our wedding coordinator, Vivian, who was experienced, extremely prompt in her replies and went the extra mile to ensure that the nitty-gritty details were addressed prior to the banquet. She was also very flexible and tried her best to accommodate our numerous requests. Having a coordinator who was able to stay on top of everything definitely helped to ease the burden off our planning process. We would also like to give our thanks to our banquet manager, John, who displayed a lot of initiative and ensured that he was around to assist every step of the way during our solemnisation ceremony and

title: Wedding dinner
desc: Best choice for wedding. Not only is it a photogenic location with beautiful corners for lots of pretty photos, the foyer has a staircase fir walking down aisle, spacious ballroom. Most importantly, the banquet team is the best I‚Äôve ever worked with. Call out to Shane, John & Mugilan - they were most attentive, accommodating and responsive and made the whole event a breeze! My steadfast trust in the InterContinental brand! More than 5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è üëçüèª

title: Wedding Banquet
desc: Hosting my wedding at the hotel on the 15th Oct. I‚Äôm deeply appreciative of event concierge Mugilan Balakrishnan. He is very accommodating, advise us accordingly to covid restriction as we are unsure what to avoid and prevent. He really did a good job and advise us to ensure a good smooth wedding banquet. Always patient with our request and questions. I feel so comfortable on the frontline when I know my back was supported by the staff from the banquet staff.

title: Wedding Dinner of Reginald & Peh Gek
desc: We held our wedding reception for dinner on 13 October 2021. Oliver, our main wedding contact person, was always ready to answer any questions we had (even during his off days!) and was very accommodating to the requests that we made, trying to help us as much as possible. When we needed to put our items at the hotel the day before our wedding, he allowed us to to do so and also got his colleague to assist us with the moving of the items to his office temporarily. We would like to sincerely thank him for his invaluable help and tireless commitment in easing the process of our wedding planning. Before the wedding event, my spouse and I were anxious about the flow of the program on the actual evening itself. However, John, who was our manager on the ground that evening, was

title: Wedding Reception
desc: We had our wedding at Intercontinental on 3 October and it went smoothly. These two individuals are the reason why - Ms Vivian, our wedding coordinator and Mr Mugilan, our banquet manager. @Vivan - Thank you for being so patient in answering all of our questions promptly. I now do feel bad texting you during odd hours on weekend! You are very knowledgeable in this industry and for sure I know Char and I are in good hands for our wedding! Thank you for sharing your experience and tips with us during our wedding preparation. I appreciate your flexibility and offering workaround solutions to us when we are facing uncertainty and changes during this Covid-19 period. I also admire your positive and can-do attitude towards work and this is something one should take way with :) Once

title: Cancellation of confirmed and fully paid booking by hotel
desc: Booked in Aug2021 for stay in Dec2021. Paid everything in advance but disappointed that the hotel cancelled our booking now (Oct2021), 2 months after our booking, citing reason that they are full for quarantine. Although refund was offered, we feel cheated. The hotel website is still offering rooms for booking in December 2021 but for a higher rate than the rate we‚Äôve booked. We‚Äôve booked it earlier due to promotion, we are very disappointed with cancellation by the hotel, so wishy-washy.

title: Wedding on 16 Oct 2021
desc: Dear management team of InterContinental Singapore Bugis, We would like to extend our deepest appreciation to John, banquet manager for weddings. We just held our wedding there and we have nothing but praises for John. From the get go, he was extremely approachable and clear of our requests. His warm sense of assurance is one that many, if not all, couples surely hope to receive on their big day. John certainly goes above and beyond his actual role, taking note of even the smallest details. He made our whole experience on such a momentous day leaps better with his dedicated attention, calming words, and you just trust that things will be taken care of in his hands. John is an employee you definitely want to recognise. We received feedback from our guests that the show was very

title: Do not book this hotel if travelling before march 2022
desc: Unfortunately the intercontinental is taking bookings from their website and others but are actually closed until at least March 2022. I saw a review on here which said they cancelled their booking a few weeks out. So I contacted them direct to confirm my booking and received an email to say they are closed to the public. I would have be left with no accommodation. Im travelling late Dec/ early Jan and was lucky enough to book other hotel but only because I found out so quickly. Their reply email say they were contacting dec bookings and would get to Januarys at a later date!!! Why are they taking bookings in the first place??? When trying to book another hotel so many are fully booked or quarantine hotels ( closed to the public) Thankfully I found out early and wait for them to

title: Wedding Lunch
desc: My Husband and I held our wedding lunch at Intercontinental Hotel Singapore (80 middle road) on the 20 Nov 2021. We were truly glad to choose Intercontinental as our wedding venue as we love the beautiful solemnisation foyer and high ceiling ballroom venue, the excellent services and their food quality too. Special thanks to our Wedding Manager, Oliver Tey, for the great assistance ever since he took over to take care of our wedding arrangements. He has helped us a lot in coordinating with some of our external vendors without us to worry about how is it to setup for the actual day. One of our key vendor was the fairy light platform as it was the first time setting it up in Intercontinental Hotel during this covid period, we were grateful that Oliver took the initiative to

title: Food everywehere
desc: Located right in the center of food & shopping centres (Bugis + & Bugis Junction) 5minutes walk away from the Bugis MRT Station. Hotel Front of House's Staff was amazingly friendly & the check in process was very quick & instructions were clear. Room was extremely clean and spacious! A 7-11 is located right opposite the Hotel, about 2-3 minutes walk. Whereas right outside the Hotel for about 2-3minutes walk as well, there are many food stalls where you can get your cravings. From Japanese, Yakiniku, Mala, Macdonald's and more!

title: Leisure discussion
desc: Recently I just visited intercontinental Singapore Lounge in Bugis. Upon arrival, I was greeted by the staff by the name of Yong Kang and immediately I was being ushered to the seat. I am very impressed with the ambience, it has the contemporary French style interior and uses the correct colour paint on the wall which keeps the classy vibes in the space. Soon after, I was given a menu. I would say that the process was seamless He was very polite and amazed with his attentiveness. I remember I was looking for hand sanitizer, but unfortunately, the main reception counter sanitizer finished. Within 5 minutes, he went all the way to our seat with the hand sanitizer and I feel that it was a nice gesture. Apart from it, he realised that I was seated there for very long and it

title: Family Staycation
desc: We will go back there for sure! It‚Äôs our favourite hotel! I only swim with Intercontinental Bugis‚Ä¶ I like the 2 big beds as I have quite big family. And thank you for the Macaroons as A special surprise for our wedding anniversary. I think your hotel did take note about our bad experience before on my husband‚Äôs birthday celebration last year. This time, we just love everything there! My family didn‚Äôt even want to leave your hotel. Thank you for this memorable staycation üôè!

title: Prime Downtown Location
desc: We spent New Year's Vacation here and found the service to be great and the hotel was quite beautiful. Breakfast at the hotel was good too! The rooms were clean and spacious and the location was perfect for getting around by foot or public transportation. There were a lot of restaurants, malls, and activities within walking distance. We would definitely recommend this location.

title: Good location. Nice heritage hotel
desc: Suite was of good sized. Was expecting a kinda old design of room based on pictures over the internet. But once we step in, the feeling is different. It was luxurious design. Bed was comfy, had a functional working desk too. Only thing was bathtub was kinda small. Afternoon tea and evening cocktail was good. Canap√©s quality was fantastic. Staff was friendly and approachable too. It is also refillable. Location is linked to bugis junction. But it's really a shame that the connecting door to bugis junction closed at 9pm which makes it so inconvenient. Parking is also chargeable at $20 per day. Hotel stand was the carpark is not under their management. But I believe something can be and should be work out. Would love to stay again!

title: Wonderful stay at superb hotel
desc: We have just been staying at the Intercontinental where we received an extremely warm welcome and truly wonderful service throughout our six night stay. We chose to stay in a Club Room and enjoy the benefits that offers. An extremely good choice as despite Covid limitations the hotel was able to offer almost all the usual hospitality. Our Club Room benefits included an excellent breakfast, a delightful afternoon tea and relaxing evening drinks with canap√©s. All of these occasions were made absolutely perfect by the wonderful staff at the hotel. We would particularly mention Anna, Mae, Kitty and Suresh, with whom we had much laughter, but everyone at the hotel was so friendly and helpful. Joyce, the manager, took the trouble to ensure everything was running smoothly for us -

title: 1st Staycay 2022
desc: Great staycation with awesome hosts. Smooth check-in & departure at the reception with Fahmi. Thank you so much for the great hospitality too Anna & Mae! The service level was impeccable, really looking forward for the next visit again! =)

title: Best wedding and hotel experience
desc: Intercontinental Singapore has more than exceeded our expectations of a luxurious hotel. From planning of our wedding to check-in to our wedding event itself, we have been well-taken care of every step of the way. Special thanks to Vivian, who helped us from the start of our journey with the hotel and is constantly in contact with us to make sure everything is okay. To Mugilan, who has exceeded his duty as an Event Concierge and allowed us to enjoy every moment of our wedding. To John, who was here to rehearse with us and make sure that we have everything settled and ready for our big day. Thank you Intercontinental for such a wonderful experience. We will definitely consider this hotel for our future events.

title: Wedding & Hotel Experience
desc: We had some hiccups along the way due to the Covid situation and we had a new sales manager as the one handling ours resigned. However, are so grateful to Vivian for handling everything smoothly. She has really gone above and beyond for us and was really patient even when I was in my bridezilla mode. She arranged everything perfectly for us and we had such a smooth wedding experience and a great room stay as well. It was such a joy to have Mugilan as our banquet manager as well. He was so attentive to all the different details and was really hospitable to all of us. If anyone is looking for a sales manager and banquet manager for your wedding, we will highly recommend Vivian and Mugilan. Lastly, the hotel room was really lovely. We had a great time at breakfast, afternoon tea,

title: A Hotel with Identity
desc: Had a delightful staycation at Intercontinental Bugis. Ideal location that is near to many places of interest with good transport links. The hotel is part of a mixed development that saw the transformation of several blocks of old shophouses into the current form. The interior design by FBEye welds together functionality and heritage. Peranakan themes can be spotted through out, be it the colorful mosaic tiles at the base of the columns at Lobby Lounge or the tapestry adorning the walls of guestrooms. Modern technology is seamlessly integrated, for instance there are ample USB charging ports in room and TV casting capability. The room is ergonomic and spacious. Dark wood panels and furniture adds sophistication. The color palette used was very soothing. My favourite part of the

title: Good Staycay!
desc: Had been to many hotels before, and this is one of the best staycays I had! The Club Access was a pleasant surprise - it covers FREE FLOW breakfast, afternoon tea, and evening cocktail! I had not left the hotel since arrival and it felt like an all-inclusive holiday Nothing was being scrimped on. I was not expecting much since I came on this staycay for free, with Club Icon membership. I had initially expected a basic stay with no breakfast, hence such benefits were a pleasant surprise for me. The breakfast spread is buffet style and you can go to the different stations to pick up your food. There is easily 30 different items to choose from! I felt excited to have buffet spread again as it brought back a sense of normalcy of pre-covid life. Another aspect that value-added to

title: Living up to its Name!
desc: This review comes over 2 months late as we were so tied on COVID matters at work as soon as our life event ended on new year‚Äôs day. Here‚Äôs to Intercontinental Hotel‚Äôs banquet team (John, Boon Hwee (AV), Mugilan, Darshana, Oliver, Jason and a few others that we may have missed out). Like Mr and Mrs Incredibles family no words can describe the lightning speed, the rapport, the attention to details and the execution of the team. We felt like you guys were the Man in Black who kept the happiness and joy rotating all throughout our life event. To John and Darshana (or was it the other colleague?) on the night before, we thank you from our hearts for the assistance rendered especially with the storage of the items and flowers. John and whoever that remembered, thank you for

title: Friendly staff and nice room.
desc: I would like to express my thanks and appreciation for the service and care we received at Hotel intercontinental from 06/01/2022 to 07/01/2022. We book a staycation and everthing was perfect. Your staff did not disappoint us. Front desk Nick was very helpful and friendly. He even manage to arrange our last minute request to add another extra bed in our room 1009. The housekeeping was superb. They managed to prepare the room in less than 1 hour. Staying in Hotel Intercontinental really enhanced our staycation experience. Every staff member with whom we came in contact was attentive and kind including in housekeeping, restaurant which we had breakfast and the porter (can't remember his name. Malay staff around the age of 50+). We had a wonderful 2 day 1 night stay, and I

title: City elegance
desc: Booked a 2-night stay and because of our Ambassador status our room was upgraded to a suite, 1201. It was good sized and overlooked the enclosed mall below that was once a street with old shophouses. The room comes with a small sitting room and sofa which is a sofa bed. Technically the room would suit 3 people (or two kids) and it won‚Äôt be cramped. For entertainment there are two TVs. There‚Äôs a Nespresso machine and quality teas, but no snacks etc which probably can be requested for. I like that there are ample USB ports to charge phones band other devices. The bathroom is well laid out and is a good size too with both shower and a long bath. The room is near the lift landing but is quiet. Those who like mod may find the hotel a little old-fashioned with it brown wood touches.

title: Anniversary & Birthday Stay üëéüèª
desc: Just an okay Hotel. Nothing special. Wrote in to inform of Birthday & 10 years Anniversary but nothing. Not even a card. Should‚Äôve stayed in a different hotel for a better experience.
