It‚Äôs not like they are busy with high occupancy. Stayed 3 nights on weekday in January. Room is nice & spacious. Cleanliness is up to standard. Good location with malls nearby.

title: The staff make all the difference.
desc: Let me start off by saying that this isn‚Äôt the ideal time for international travel due to COVID but more importantly, the extraordinary lengths that some countries go to when imposing restrictions to protect their citizens. However, this isn‚Äôt the forum for those challenges, this is about the hotel. We regularly stay at the Grand Stanford in TST Hong Kong, but of course we haven‚Äôt been for a couple of years. As we were finally able to visit family in Singapore, we thought we might experience a hotel from the IHG group which we hoped would meet the standard we enjoyed at the GS in Hong Kong. The Intercontinental in Singapore isn‚Äôt anywhere in the same league as the Grand Stanford. The rooms at this hotel are smaller and older, the fittings a little dated, the Club was closed

title: Immaculate Service that Defines the Intercontinental Experience
desc: Staying in the IC Singapore for a 5 day staycation has been the best decision made in 2022. Service is excellent and I cannot say enough of the entire team who has made our family's stay a memorable one.

title: Good service and cosy environment for the price
desc: Lobby lounge food and service crew are friendly and helpful in directing direction. Man Fu Yuan restaurant food and staff provide superb service. I'm surprise the food quality and prices are very reasonable. Cleaniness in the room are well kept and cosy to rest in. Front desk Ms. Fiona always serve with a smile. Thank you Intercontinental Hotel management and staff.

title: Nice Place.. No Parking.. No Breakfast Menu for In Room Service
desc: Nice place to stay in.. Bugis Village a stones throw away.. Doesn't have parking and the valet parking always seemed to be full Had to park beside in Bugis junction.. Overnight charges when leaving at 12pm was $38, went in around 3pm.. No in room breakfast.. In room starts at 1130.... Besides that everything else was great... Club Sandwich Awesome.... Bed Awesome, didnt wanna get up...Room big and nice.. Very Clean.. Staff friendly..

title: Singapore Connect Event
desc: After 2 years of Conference and Events hiatus, just completed organising 5 connect sessions for all employees at Hotel Intercontinental Bugis held at 2 Ballrooms with social distancing set up of tables including projection/presentor desk. I was very impressed with their continuous efficiency, changing of plates, with a mindset of "to make things happen for every request" and serving staff with initiatives or take on responsibility to ask for guest with dietary restriction table number. It is proven that these 2 years, Intercontinental Conference & Events Team has build up a resilience and agility environment. Very happy organiser.

title: Best Hotel service
desc: Got the rooms for our wedding celebrations and all the staff was giving us non stop great service. Rooms are beautiful and elegant. All the staff at the restaurants are very friendly too Special thanks to Mr Oliver Tey/Mugali and his team for making our stay a special one. Thanks all of you at this beautiful hotel once again.

title: Convenient and comfortable
desc: Nice comfortable hotel, good location, connected to a mall with lots of restaurants and shopping. This was my second stay at this hotel and I thought it was just as nice. The concierge Mr. Muhammad Ali (yep, just like the boxer) really helped me out when my driver that I booked to take me to Kuala Lumpur didn't show up. He called the tour company in London to sort things out for me(I'm not talking about one phone call, it took hours to get this taken care of) and he was just so wonderful! Thank you again Mr. Ali!! I would not hesitate to stay here again or to recommend it to anyone else looking for a 5* hotel and 5* service in Singapore!

title: Great Stay in Junior Suite!
desc: This is my first time staying at Intercontinental hotels, and I must say I am impressed at the service and room quality. We were serviced by Fiona from front desk for both check in and check out processes. It was pleasant. I must also commend the club lounge staff for the delicious food and for their attentiveness. Junior Suite was spacious and clean. Would visit to stay again!

title: Wedding Banquet + Stay at InterContinental
desc: We held our wedding banquet in InterContinental Singapore last week and it was a really great experience! We had a very good stay, everything was well planned for, and the service was impeccable. The banquet ran really smoothly, much thanks to Oliver and Mugilan. They were accommodating to our requests and very helpful. The room was spacious and comfy, room service was fast, and the hotel very well maintained and clean. InterContinental is our favourite hotel for staycays, and we're glad we could have our banquet here. Much thanks to Oliver, Mugilan and the banquet staff for making it a memorable experience!

title: Long stay
desc: Spent some 6 weeks staying here. Great location and wonderful staff who made you feel completely at home and went out of their way to ensure I was well fed and watered. The re opening of the Club lounge on 21st March after Covid closure was a sign of good time‚Äôs returning. Thank you all.

title: A wonderful experience
desc: It‚Äôs always a joy to return to Intercontinental Singapore! The familiarity of the hotel and the amenities it has to offer is something that makes me keep coming back. Special mention: Ms Fiona Gan had taken the initiative to assist in submitting a request for me to use my already expired weekend night certificate which I was not able to utilise. Unfortunately, due to the Ambassador programme‚Äôs policy, this request was declined. Besides that, Ms Gan had ensured that my check in process was smooth and that my stay was a pleasant one, given my Intercon Ambassador status. Having a dedicated staff member like Ms Gan makes me want to retain my loyalty with the Intercontinental Hotel Group. Cheers! Mustafa

title: Thank you for the excellent service
desc: The family stayed on after a wedding for a weekend staycation. Took 3 rooms, including a special family room with a dedicated play area for the kids. Excellent location and amenities, and impeccable service from Sam. Highly recommended!

title: Overall hotel feedback
desc: It was a great experience. Everything was fine people were sweet and caring. We had lots of fun. Different selection of restaurants was also great. We would like to come back again. And recommend everyone to come here. And they're very helpful and friendly.

title: Perfect Venue for Events
desc: Held an event 3 weeks ago, and I cannot stop talking about how amazing the team there was. Special thanks to Jacelyn, Mugilan and Selvanathan for being super prompt (Prompt as in getting immediate answers - no checks needed, only perfect execution), and they rendered so much help that we are forever thankful for from the start till the end of the event. The food was absolutely amazing and all our guests wiped their plates clean, and the portion was not small at all. The location is superb and facilities were extremely clean and well maintained. Thank you very much to the team once again, and we look forward to hosting more events at InterContinental Singapore with more guests when the Covid19 situation allows!

title: March 2022 Staycation
desc: Had a fantastic time with the family. Absolutely awesome. At check in the reception noted that 3 rooms were booked whereas I only made a booking for 2 rooms. That was quickly resolved. Foam pillows were asked for before check-in but was not in the room. No issue as that was quickly resolved with a quick phone call. Managed to also spend some time in the sauna (prior booking needed). Check out was seamless with express check out. Will come back again soon.

title: Great service, beautiful hotel, great location.
desc: I stayed at the InterContinental Singapore for 1 night on 5 March and I have to say that I was really impressed by the standards of service at the hotel. I was greeted very warmly during the check in and was given an upgrade, because there weren‚Äôt any rooms ready for the room category I booked for. The front desk staff was very professional and was very apologetic even though I didn‚Äôt mind waiting for a room. It‚Äôs exactly the kind of service you‚Äôd expect from a 5-stars establishment, but they took it up a notch. Kudos to both the front desk staff who assisted me at the check in! The lobby was beside and the room was very spacious. It had a sense of an old world opulence that most luxury hotels have phased out from, and it felt grand. The furnitures were unique and gave a

title: Comfy stay
desc: Got an early check-in at 1pm. Thks Ronald for being efficient & helpful. Room is ok. Comfortable beddings, neat & well maintained. Only setback is the air-con is not cold enough. Turned to 18 degrees but it felt like 25 degrees the entire day. Contacted the maintenance team around midnight but not much difference. Overall, the stay was quite pleasant.

title: Wonderful wedding experience
desc: It was truly a great experience hosting my wedding lunch and staying at Intercontinental Singapore. Special mention goes to Shane (sales manager) and John (banquet manager) who ensured everything went smoothly without us having to worry one bit. Wedding food from Man Fu Yuan was delectable as well. Would also like to give special thanks to Mae from Ash & Elms who always made sure that we were well taken care of during breakfast and high tea sessions. Appreciate the excellent hospitality! Thank you!

title: Excellent services
desc: We were at Intercontinental hotel on the 14 March 2022. The hotel manager Lyn was very helpful. Show us around where the restaurants located. Lyn help to arranged for the birthday cake. We had our high tea at the Ash & Elm restaurant and were again met with very friendly staffs like Mr Sam Foo who had served us well. Mr John Tan from The Lobby Lounge was also very polite and good service. The food at both Ash & Elm and The Lobby lounge were good. We tried the prawn Noddle, chicken rice and Burger. Except for chicken rice a little saltish, chicken was tender. Prawn mee was really tasty will try again next time. Chilly sauce for prawn mee was nice!

title: Excellent staycation at Intercontinental Singapore!
desc: Had a staycation at Intercontinental Singapore and it was amazing ! Ms Fiona and her frontdesk team showed great hospitality right from the lobby. The room is well decorated, clean and comfortable. :)

title: Awesome Staycation!
desc: My family and I had a pleasant stay at Intercontinental Singapore over the weekend. One of the notable gesture was Ms Fiona from the Front Desk, who assisted us with our needs without any hesitation, which we greatly appreciate. Will be back for staycation again!

title: my stay in Singapore
desc: There service at the hotel cannot be faulted, especially Fiona and Shi Min, who gave me wonderful service from start to finish, at reception and in other ways. Nothing was too much trouble for them. I have stayed here many times, and have no hesitation about recommending the hotel.

title: Staff that Creates an Amazing Experience
desc: I booked for this one night stay with my wife. It was amazing that Suhasini at the front desk caught my birthday upon registration and upgraded me to a room with the beautiful city view. At this age, I would normally keep a low profile, but the hotel surprised me with a slice of birthday cake and a card! It is the staff that curated this special experience. Thank you Suha for your friendly disposition and excellent customer experience. You are certainly an asset to the company. The room is huge and the quality of sleep is great! Water pressure is good in the bathtub and we enjoyed the coffee machine. Overall it has been a wonderful birthday experience and I will be looking forward to my next visit!

title: Club Intercontinental Singapore
desc: Ever since I checked in in February, the staff has been amazing. Regular at breakfast at Ash & Elm. Always a joy being taken care of by Suresh, Mae, Kit and Thiva. Had a wonderful cocktail hour today. Warm ambience, delicious canapes, and generous cheese platter. Taken care of very very well by Manager Sam Foo and his crew. Looking forward to more wonderful moments. Thank you.

title: It felt good to be back
desc: It felt wonderful to return to the IC after the long covid break. The receptionist who checked me in was quick and efficient, but not very personal or friendly. He gave me a paper with a QR code to use to book the swimming pool and breakfast time slots via the internet. The system accepts bookings for the next three days. Oh, and the paper also stated that if I don‚Äôt wear a mask, I could end up in jail. S‚Äôpore‚Ä¶ My Classic room on the 13th floor was just as I remembered it. (They used to be called Deluxe, it‚Äôs the basic room category.) The room was spacious and the king bed was large and comfortable. There are universal sockets by the bed so you can easily charge your devices without an adapter. In addition, there is a sofa and coffee table, a large desk, a fridge, a safe etc.

title: Very good staycation
desc: First staycation here and everything was fantastic . Room is great, location is convenient to malls and lots of food choices, service was fantastic, carpark was very easily accessible from the lobby, gym was good. Very impressed with my stay. Comparable to the best staycation experience I had in Singapore thus far .

title: Business week in the city
desc: The InterContinental is positioned well for a visit to Singapore. It is elegant, spacious very clean and very welcoming. The management and staff are all friendly and helpful with great personalities if you stop to talk to them. The rooms are large and comfortable with everything you need. This hotel sits nice and central with easy access to the Bugis shopping centre behind the hotel and connected via internal walkway. Most other places are but a short inexpensive taxi ride away, like Marina Bay area with all the designer shops and wonderful architecture of the basement canal and water feature. Whatever your visit is for, the InterContinental is a great place to stay.

title: Consistently excellent
desc: Located on Middle Road only minutes from downtown, the InterContinental Singapore is one of my favourites in the network. Despite some service adaptations, particularly in the Club lounge, this is still an excellent property. The usual warm welcome was certainly one of those things that hadn‚Äôt changed; our bags were taken from the taxi, and we were directed over to a free desk in the flower-adorned lobby. There was initially some confusion from the receptionist over whether points for the stay would post to my IHG account as I had booked through a Virtuoso agent and most travel agent bookings don‚Äôt earn points, but I needn‚Äôt have worried as everything worked out fine. I wasn‚Äôt asked for my preference of welcome drink or points, but points automatically appeared in my

title: Excellent luxury hotel in Singapore
desc: We loved our stay at the Intercontinental Singapore. The hotel itself is beautiful, particularly the courtyard outside the main entrance and the impressive swimming pool, which offers city-wide views. The rooms are beautifully decorated, with lovely furniture and feel very luxurious - although the bathrooms are possibly a bit dated in comparison to other hotels of a similar standard. The breakfasts at the hotel were superb - amongst the best we've had anywhere in the world, in terms of choice and quality of the food. The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Location-wise, the hotel is very centrally located with direct access into the Bugis shops and MRT station through a back entrance of the hotel. Whilst still very easily accessible to the marina bay area either

title: Beautiful Hotel and Service
desc: Beautiful hotel with convenient amenities, had our wedding in the ballroom which was assisted by the professional team headed by Oliver as well as Mugilan. Impeccable service and handled a supposedly stressful event with a breeze. Definitely recommend this hotel to all locals and tourist, their rooms are not only clean. But spacious and well maintained.

title: After 4th stay, not coming back!
desc: After my 4th Stay, never gona come back! I loved this hotel, its just rubbish now. 1. Room aircond is warm, not cold‚Ä¶ imagine the Singapore heat‚Ä¶ 2. No more free parking 3. Breakfast spread was not great anymore, staff was very rude and i did complained right away. 4. Went to the pool, waited for an hour to get our cocktails, none arrived. 5. No poolside Bar, no one there to assist to take orders, we have to use a phone to order, and even that took an hour. We gave up and returned to the room. The drink turned up at my room and called it complimentary. Cant cure a horrible service with free drinks. Overall, i would call it a 3 star hotel, definitely not 5 or 4. Horrible at its peak.

title: Back in Singapore after 26 months
desc: So glad to travel long haul again. However , bit naive to think hotel would automatically be back to 5 star standard. Some of staff were obviously inexperienced, service was slow . It had lost some of its luxury feel. But sure it will be back to usual in the coming weeks

title: Far Past Its Prime
desc: I have stayed at both Intercon locations in Singapore - Robertson quay and this one (Bugis). Do yourself a favor and stay at the Robertson Quay one if you‚Äôre trying to decide between the two. Pros - front desk was very helpful as expected - gave us an upgrade to a junior suite for no extra charge and got us checked into a room at 8:30 am after a long overnight flight. Beautiful reception and lobby. Antiquated yet restored entrance. That‚Äôs where the restoration stops. Cons - dated room, in dire need of a renovation. Bathroom fixtures were rusty and looked as if they hadn‚Äôt been renovated since the early 2000s or late 90‚Äôs. Although the rooms are spacious, that‚Äôs about the only positive when it comes to the hard product. Hotel is clearly understaffed and while I do appreciate

title: Another Wonderful Staycay
desc: Thank you to the Intercontinental Singapore for the wonderful 3-night staycay. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Rollaway bed was available FOC upon request. A complimentary cake was given to celebrate my son‚Äôs birthday. Special mention goes to the club team of Anna Lau, Foo Wai Kit, Jia Yi, Yu Xun, Fiona, Merilyn, Sahu, Safina, Murni and Azhar for making us feel so welcomed, relaxed and at ease. Anna, Wai Kit and Jia Yi were extra attentive to our needs including that of our two children, making our trip extra memorable and delightful. For example, they were friendly and helpful, accurate and fast with their service, remembered our favourite seats and breakfast orders. Their friendship and bespoke service are the main reasons that kept us coming back to

title: Best place for staycation!
desc: Had a great time staying at intercontinental Singapore! The staff were super nice and friendly and really explained in detail when im checking in and out! The fitness centre was so spacious and alot of equipments. Best of all is that my room was nearby the gym! The swimming pool was clean and i was able to sun tan and relax. The hotel was connected to Bugis Junction shopping centre and the train station was super near too which was at Bugis station. Overrall a great staycation and really enjoyed my time! Definitely will come back again! Thank you so much!ü•∞

title: Wedding Lunch at Intercontinental Singapore (Bugis).
desc: We held our wedding banquet at the ballroom of Intercontinental Singapore. Hotel service was excellent. The food was well-received, hall setup was romantic and the event ran like clockwork. Many thanks to our coordinator, Jie Yi, banquet manager and all the staff for the hard work and coordination. I highly recommend the hotel for couples looking for a value-for-money package to tie the knot. The two night stay in the hotel suite and other perks were a nice bonus!

title: A tired old lady
desc: Have stayed here on multiple occasions and this is the first time I have rated it average. There is no doubt that there are issues in Singapore with staffing and this was evident across a variety of venues including the airport and shops. However when you pay in excess of $500 per night you expect at least value for money and good service. The room, was tired and the bedding had holes in the sheets and duvet covers. But the bed was comfortable and the pillows were great. This time the bathroom amenities left a lot to be desired. There were some basics missing this time such as a sewing kit and a razor pack. When replenished (perhaps I should say if) staff just replaced the bottles without thought to what had been used - what use is having 3 shampoos when what you

title: 1st Visit to LUCE
desc: Visit LUCE Restaurant with few friends. The food were amazing, cosy ambiance with friendly staff. Thank you Chef David & Mr Artem & Noel for the night. Will definitely be back for 2nd visit! Must try the Lobster Risotto & LUCE-Misu dessert..

title: Disappointing hotel stay
desc: Every single day I had to ask for milk to be sent to my room to have a cup of tee or coffee. There was nothing in the mini bar- no drinks or snacks available. It was completely empty. We had three full days and four nights here and our room was only made up once. Some of the staff at breakfast were rude and unapproachable. This happened every morning. The fruit selection at breakfast was limited considering the amazing fruit at markets available in Singapore. The pool beds were extremely uncomfortable and I had to lay down layers and layers of towels for comfort on some. There was also no one at the pool to take any drinks or food orders. There was a phone but it didn‚Äôt work sometimes. Underneath the nice building and spacious decor was a real lack of service for

title: Delightful romantic staycation at Intercontinental Singapore
desc: This was a most memorable staycation that my partner and I had! Prior to the staycation, I filled in the hotel‚Äôs preference planner form and indicated a request for a note with a short (romantic) message for my partner since this would be our weekend romantic getaway. The hotel‚Äôs guest experience executive Ms Dorothy Wong went out of her way to arrange for not only the note but also a full platter with scrumptious macarons and chocolate hearts. It was a most thoughtful gift that made our staycation truly delightful!

title: Great service very poor food options and service.
desc: As a hotel that is supposedly a five star one, while their service is high their flexibility with regards to food intolerance is not. As someone who has food issues, I am vegan and this five star hotel could not or would not cater for me. At breakfast I asked if they had non- diary milk, I was told they did not. My options were fruit, toast with only jam, or cold tomatoes or tasteless beans that was cold. With lunch the only choice I had that they could offer was pasta with tomato and basil. Yet what was interesting was that they offered a vegan high tea! There was no suggestions from them about what else I could have as they said they had no other choices, but they offer a high tea. Will not stay there again.

title: First staycay
desc: Although a very short 1 night stay, we are happy with the visit, from check in to check out. The room was comfortable and clean. The swim in the pool was relaxing. In-room dining tasted good, the wood fired pizza and seafood penne were on point. Looking forward to planning the next staycay. Thanks to Judy of IHG Interconsin Bugis for arranging our stay

title: Simply Spectacular
desc: My family and I arrived in Singapore at 5am on a long flight from San Francisco. We arrived on a very rainy Friday morning and my kids were pretty tired. The location is great as it‚Äôs at the Bugis MRT stop so it‚Äôs very well located. When we arrived The staff could not yet check us in but directed us to the spa/showers to get refreshed and visit the restaurant for breakfast. The food was amazing and the staff were so very friendly. My son who is 3 and daughter who is just 9 months old received plenty of attention and warmest of welcomes to Singapore. By 9am our room was ready and we were pleasantly surprised to find out our suite was upgraded to the family suite with bunk beds. This was truly special as my son loved the slide and the plush animal lions that decorated his space.

title: Wonderful staff in the Club Room
desc: The staff in the Club Room are delightful. They are attentive without being invasive, friendly, helpful and will have a laugh or giggle with you. They go above and beyond. My husband and I play dominos while having canopies and drinks of an evening. To expediate our nightly dominos challenge the table was set up ready to go. They do pay attention to the foibles of the guests.

title: Sweet Suite Surprise
desc: Although borders are gradually reopening, my wife and I decided to continue with our local staycations to celebrate her birthday. We opted for 3 such stays and InterContinental Singapore is our first. We were elated when we noticed the Sweet Suite staycation and quickly booked for it. During the lucky draw through the spinning of the wheel on a tablet, we managed to get an Executive Suite. We had stayed in a Junior Suite several years ago and at the Heritage Suite in 2018 so we were delighted by the outcome. Room 1624 is a majestic room with a wonderful view of the national library and a partial view of the Marina Bay area. I love rooms on the top most floors as we are very, very light sleepers. Despite the high ceiling and the sheer size of the well-appointed suite,

title: Memorable 25th anniversary stay üòçü•∞
desc: We have had one of the most unforgettable stay of our lives. Before we arrived, I reached out to the guest satisfaction manager Ms Fiona Gan and expressed to her that this is a special trip for us. Everything went smoothly and the room set up was just amazing. She has accommodated all our wishes and beyond. She was very approachable and highly professional. Ms Gan combines the heritage charm for which the hotel exudes famously and a modern Singaporean ‚Äòfunky‚Äô twist. Apart from that, the hotel‚Äôs club lounge was very exclusive and all the staff provided 5 star services especially Ms Anna Lau who performs her task excellently. We just wished that we could stay longer and definitely the next time that we are visiting, this establishment will be on our top list.

title: Classic building and professional team
desc: The location is strategic in the central of Singapore, easy access to all attractions. There are malls links to the hotel which is an additional point for people want to have some shopping and food. The room was classic, clean and quiet. The bed is comfortable and bathroom facility was maintained well. Service was good with a professional team, including the concierge, restaurant staff and lobby bar staff. Front desk was also good, well recognized IHG membership, except for not sending me the E-invoice I requested at check-out. Restaurant is not big, but the quality of food os high. Especially the dinner with Italian food, very classic. The only disappointed thing for me was that I did not receive IHG points after the stay, and it was counted as ‚Äúunqualified stay‚Äù. I have to

title: Clean and friendly
desc: I have traveled a lot and spent much time in different hotels all over the world. I like Intercontinental Singapore because it‚Äôs clean and friendly just like my home. Check-in service, housekeeping, breakfast and room service, everything is perfect.

title: Really exceeded my expectations
desc: Coming to Singapore for my wife's birthday weekend, I was honestly a little intimidated by the price of the room but hoped it would be worth it. I didn't expect just how much I would love this hotel. It was an exceptional experience. The room was great, spectacularly clean, and with an unbelievably comfortable bed (slept so well!). But what really set it apart for me was the standard of service. From the doorman to to the chefs and wait staff, the entire team was well-informed, professional, and always very welcoming. In particular, I'd like to thank Eduard in the restaurant team for his service. He was generous, thoughtful, and really contributed to our overall experience. I'd gladly return to this hotel again.

title: Home away from home
desc: It was great to be back in Singapore and it feels coming home away from home at the Intercontinental from the arrival throughtout the entire stay. The hotel is perfectly located to explore the city, very central. A lot of Singapore "must see" are in walking distance or a short trip away by bus, metro or taxi. The facility with his heritage rooms and building is really nice. Pool and a good gym. My room was on the higher floor (9) and completly quite for a good sleep. The hotel staff always looks after you, super helpful with a smile. I do recommend the club lounge for their atmosphere, privacy, excellent service and tasty food + drinks. The staff are so helpful and paying attention to every single detail so i will continue to come back anytime in Singapore.

title: No regrets holding my wedding there!
desc: Held my wedding at Intercon on 24/7/22 (lunch), absolutely zero regrets! The ballroom was spectacular and the food was amazing. Feedback provided during the food tasting at Man Fu Yuan was taken into consideration and the food on the actual day was great!! Service from the entire banquet team, hotel reception team and even the cleaning ladies were superb. Special mention to the following individuals: - Jieyi for being such a friendly and accommodating wedding coordinator. She delivered everything as promised and was always prompt in her replies. - Selva for being an organised and responsible banquet manager who even helped to lead the crowd to clap during the solemnisation march in from the stairs. - Cleaning lady (Lu Mei) who helped to clean our room after one of my guests

title: Excellent Service With Helpful Staff
desc: Very thankful that we met Anna from The Club who has been very helpful throughout our stay here. From checking in to renewal of membership all through until we checked out. Superb hospitality was offered throughout our 6 days 5 nights stay and food offered has huge varieties. The room is very clean and spacious. Housekeeping diligently performed a very good job.

title: Excellent & Professional Service on my BIG DAY (Sherlyn & Selva‚Äôs Team)
desc: I held my Chinese Wedding Dinner here on 9 July and throughout the preparation & leading up to the Actual Day itself I was met with only Excellent & Professional Service by their most thoughtful & patient staff (Sherlyn, Selva, Boon Hui & their Team). It‚Äôs everything one can expect and more often than not taken from granted from the pinnacle of the hospitality industry.

title: Superb Birthday staycation
desc: It was a great getaway with family. It was a great experience from check-in till check-out with pleasant interaction from all staffs. Will definitely be back again soon! Great hotel location within walking distance from Bugis MRT for those wish to travel around via public transport.

title: Fading beauty
desc: Our stay here was fine with a very comfortable bed and large junior suite. As noted by other reviewers, the hotel is quite dated now, as are the surrounding shopping centres, which have been surpassed by newer flashier models elsewhere in Singapore. There have been some small updates over time but felt the pool area and bathrooms were a bit sad looking. The phones in the rooms are straight out of the 90s. The staff were all nice and very helpful.

title: Recommended when in Singapore
desc: I had a comfortable stay at the Intercon SG. My room was designed tastefully and gave me a good rest after the day‚Äôs activities. I also like the location of the hotel and the easy access to eating places and shopping. Service was good and my request for a late check out was granted. I would love to stay at this hotel again.

title: Great return to I.C. Singapore
desc: After a 3 year absence of travelling to Singapore we decided to return to the Intercontinental Singapore on Middle Rd. Once again the highlight of our stay was the professionalism and friendliness of the staff of which management should be very proud of. We booked a Lounge Access Corner Room but we were upgraded to a suite as a benefit from being an Ambassador member. The large suite was spotlessly clean and well maintained with daily housekeeping. We ate breakfast at the restaurant 3 mornings and the food and beverage was plentiful and of a good standard and variety. The Club Lounge is were we spent a lot of time and thoroughly enjoyed the services offered here. High Tea and Evening Drinks and Canap√©s were provided by the most excellent staff who never missed a trick in

title: Lovely stay
desc: We checked in on the 8th of July and were greeted by Lucinda Neo ( guest relation manager ) . On our request for a complimentary upgrade ( it was our 5 year olds first singapore visit ) , she immediately offered us the heritage wing junior suite as a free complimentary upgrade. The check in process was smooth & quick. It was a wonderful experience staying at the hotel & we owe that to Lucinda who made the stay memorable.

title: Dint believe in IHG upgrade + hotel is very very old
desc: I will divide my review into two section: 1- review about IHG , 2- review about the hotel 1- review about IHG: I was platinum member and I was staying at IHG since 2014 and collect points from that period. IHG grantee to upgrade the room to suit room for platinum member ( depend on availability). When I check in in the hotel there was availability in the IHG website for suit but hotel told me that we cannot do the upgrade. If you will pay extra charge we will upgrade your room. In addition a week before my visit, I sent email to the hotel to consider my loyalty for upgrade and they respond back that we cannot promise. In addition I asked for late check out and this is something that all the hotel can give. Intercontinental Singapore they rejected and after long request from

title: My home away from home!
desc: Intercontinental Singapore has been already my preferred home away from home. Without an exception, the extension of hospitality is always welcoming and the experience consistently on the mark. Especially the Club team is amazing! Thanks to Manager Azhar, and Anna, Idah, Wai Kit, Hock Kim, Jacia, Irfan, Timothy (Sorry, If I missed any of you.), I have always been pleased by their service. They recognized me and went out of their way to make sure I am comfortable during my stay. They definitely value my choice to make Intercontinental Singapore my home away from home. Appreciate you all and see you soon! Miss the Singapore Sling already!

title: Great service!
desc: We planned our wedding banquet at intercon and were very pleased with the package, attention to details, promptness and also assurance of the events staff throughout the process. In spite of last minute changes to our wedding, the events team were very helpful and prompt in helping us to adjust to the rearrangements. We are very grateful to the events team, especially Sherlyn for helping us through this process and making the wedding a smooth one :)

title: Breakfast intercontinental, in room dining and management
desc: Awesome service from Magen, Upadhya, Nada and Fahm. This hotel is definitely a 5 star hotel from the lobby dining, in room dining, general management, restaurant management, servers and cooks. A simply amazing 6 day experience provided by the staff of Intercontinental.

title: The care and love shown by Josephine was amazing
desc: My mother was staying here on a trip to Singapore and it was her birthday. I called the hotel and was greeted by Josephine from the guest services team. She went above and beyond what she had to do and created a special bouquet with my mom‚Äôs favorite flowers and arranged for a special dessert to be delivered to her as a surprise, all with a lovely message from her family that she hand wrote from us. Josephine went above and beyond to do this for my mother. Even when I couldn‚Äôt be there, she made it very special for her. Thank you so much!!! Truly exceptional customer care.

title: Not up to par with the Intercontinental brand
desc: Stayed in this hotel for one night when I had a layover in Singapore. Due to the humidity in the region, many hotels have mold and smell musty. That was also the case here. Definitely not up to brand with a typical Intercontinental. Not sure where else to look for a fresher smelling hotel, most of them in this area will be affected. Maybe a hotel with full hardwood floors rather than carpet would be better.

title: Good Food and amiable staffs
desc: Choosing to eat breakfast at Intercontinental was a good choice. The breakfast variety is excellent. All of the staff are amiable especially the Auntie who has a short haired who served my coffee and I also want to thank Mae, if I see her named correctly she is the one who brought me to the table. She explained everything she even gave me option if I do not want any buffet I can choose to have set menu, she is very genuine and hospitable. I can't resist but to go with buffet option. The foods is delicious.

title: Staycation at the InterContinental Singapore
desc: Always the hotel of our choice for an urban retreat. Sending special thanks to Wai Kit and Irfan for making this a comfortable and pleasant stay for us. We are looking forward to the next time we return!

title: Housekeeping
desc: Excellent level of service. The room had been beautifully and promptly attended to everyday. Thank you Jian you have helped make are stay at the Intercontinental wonderful. Cannot wait to come back to Dingapire.

title: Dinner in Singapore
desc: Amazing service from Benjamin and Chin Chin at Man Fu Yuan tonight! Went above and beyond to ensure we had a nice evening + the food was amazing! Thank you so much for your great service , Lucy, Joan and Sally

title: Relax in the evening with a drink and canap√©
desc: Husband and I stayed 5 nights in the junior suite with club lounge access. The room was great with plenty of space for us to unwind in the afternoons. The bathroom was roomy and well stocked with toiletries and I loved the shower. We enjoyed a couple of afternoons in the pool area in the round loungers. The water is cool but refreshing after the Singapore heat. The highlight was the club lounge where breakfast was delicious and abundant and tue service always great. The best part is relaxing in the evening with canap√©s and drinks. Such a fantastic hotel for a few days of luxury. Highly recommend.

title: Great comfort, safe and clean
desc: Good system to protect tourist from COVID. Safe and clean, for 14 days I stay. Excellent service from housekeeper Yan Mei. Excellent wifi speed and one SSID throughout hotel. Using tv box is so easy with flexible hanger

title: Best Hotel in Singapore
desc: We are a family of 5 came from Dubai (we are arabs). This hotel is Super clean, super elegant, best location in whole Singapore (you can access any place you want in few steps away from Hotel). The moment you step in, you feel you are special, workers of this hotel from the Hotel Manager to everyone else strive to serve you better with a never ending smile, they are very care to what you say and what you want, willing to gro extra mile to make your stay happy, very customer centric Hotel. Fionna and Aisha in check, Fiona willing to do whatever it takes to help, to lynn who spends minutes everyday to direct us where to go and enjoy our stay to Wayne in concierge they are amazing. Mr.Nadda in restaurant, smile, always close to what you want, he even remembers your selection from

title: Very clean
desc: I‚Äôve just came to Singapore so I had to live in a hotel for now from all of the hotels I have chose inter continental was really the one that made me happy. Compared to all of other hotels the cleaner that cleans my room every day Jian li cleans everything super neat. Every time when I come back in the afternoon it‚Äôs like in your room. From this I just want to say thank you, and also recommend this hotel to every people.Ôºàthe desert‚Äôs are also very good)

title: Very Good
desc: This hotel is a lovely and quality hotel. We had a junior suite with access to the club lounge. I know it costs a bit more for the lounge access but in my opinion it was worth it. Club access gives you breakfast, afternoon tea and a cocktails for 2 hours in the evening. All was fantastic and brilliant. Access to the underground is quick and easy but remember to pay for your tourist ticket with cash. We couldn't use a card. The hotel was clean, friendly and always there to help. Excellent.

title: Special thank you to Jian Li and Nick Toong
desc: Truly 5 star service, Nick Toong, Jian Li and one of the housekeeping lady setting up the rollaway bed for us were outstanding, friendly and warmth. Making us feel at home. Thank you for taking such good care of my family. Room was clean and comfortable.

title: Thank you Jasni
desc: It was after midnight when my dad complained of being unwell. We suspected an increase in his sugar level, but we realised that the glucose test kit was running out of battery. To our dismay, my sister and I popped by three 7-Eleven stores around the hotel, but they did not carry the same battery for the test kit. Feeling distressed as we returned to the hotel, Jasni from Engineering bumped into us near the lounge, and he approached us if he could be of help. We shared with him our emergency. Jasni asked for our room number; 5 minutes later, he delivered the battery we needed to our door. We couldn't thank him enough for coming to our aid‚Äîhis vigilance, proactiveness, and helpfulness are highly respectable.

title: Perfect delightful staycation
desc: Intercontinental Singapore is my top of choice for staycation and bonding time with friends and family. My partner and I had a great staycation and we thoroughly enjoyed the junior suite upgrade and hotel facilities, evening drinks and snacks at the Lobby Lounge, and dinner with friends at LUCE. We would like to specially thank Fahmi for taking care of us during check-in and check-out and making sure our stay was perfect and wonderful. Fahmi was friendly, helpful, and made us feel welcomed. Also like to thank all the wonderful hotel staff for the incredibly delightful stay! Already looking forward to the next staycation!

title: Beautiful, kind, warm, welcoming and intuitive
desc: Amazing, caring and welcoming... the hotel felt welcoming from the roadside to the room. Fiona provided a warm welcome and continued by providing great suggestions for dining and also looked after my partner and I on our 10th anniversary. All colleagues from Breakfast, Concierge and Housekeeping were courteous and very attentive. A great trip made amazing. Cannot thank the team enough at InterContinental Singapore, 80 Middle Road! Definitely a place to stay regardless of occasion

title: Clean, well maintained, good location, excellent service
desc: We have stayed several times at Intercontinental Bugis hotel over the years before the pandemic. The location is conveniently located next to a shopping mall and an open air market across the street, and the Bugis MRT/subway station below the hotel. Our last visit about 3 years ago was a little disappointing, so we were a little apprehensive this time but decided to give it a try again. We used our free rewards for this stay and added S$30++ for breakfast per person per night. Check-in/out with Sheila was excellent - she was very patient and accommodating. Valet staff was very helpful and politely instructed us to park our car at a good spot in front of the hotel. All three of our rooms on the 15th floor were very clean with a nice view, and the facility appeared to be very

title: Excellent Teams, Convenient Location, Comfortable, Well Maintained, Home away from home - Perfect
desc: We've always had good experience at other InterContinental locations around the world and this was no different. We decided to stay at the InterContinental Singapore for a total of a week for our family holiday. As I had booked a junior suite, I had emailed the hotel to confirm whether I had booked the suite with a sliding door (first time travelling with a toddler) as this information seems to be unclear from the 3rd party website or the main website. They advised in the beginning that the sliding door option for the junior suite was only available with lounge access (which we didn't think we needed). On arrival, I had requested once more and was kindly offered a room change from our 2nd night onwards. This was such a big help for us, as this meant we were able to enjoy our

title: Family staycay for the weekend
desc: Stayed at the king family suite. Smooth chk-in and super friendly staff especially Zamani and Sufina who gave extra attention in assisting me and my kids during my stay. My kids love the awesome room! Super convenient location. Easy access to various type of restaurants and amenities at Bugis Junction. Beautiful Facade and interior! Will come back for sure!

title: Thank you Mr Praveen
desc: Lovely Bar Lounge with life music!! Relax and calm ambience. The bar manager is so welcoming and the service from him is first class. Thank you Mr Praveen. Will return back for more and would like to try their high tea. Service staffs are all attentive.

title: Perfect trip
desc: very cozy and international mood, my husband and 3 year-old kid are having happy vacation! bb good breakfast buffet, good concierge and they provide bed gaurds, stools, amenities for kid. swimming pool is also very nice.

title: A brilliant stay and didn't want to leave
desc: I had a recent stay at the intercontinental Singapore which I‚Äôve not stayed at for quite a few years. I had planned to be there in 2020 but Covid put a stop to that. I spent 5 days here recently and the service was brilliant. I booked a heritage suite and was upgraded to a royal suite. I even received a bottle of champagne from the manager. I had been in touch with the hotel and did end up rebooking several times prior to actually travelling as the hotel was part of the government quarantine system so I had a good connection with the hotel having rebooked many times. It was a perfect stay and can‚Äôt fault the service. The Club floor was brilliant. Every time I was greeted by my name and a smile. The staff even knew I like a martini after my first visit and my glass was never

title: Attentive staff, birthday upgrade surprise.
desc: Both my parents check-in on 4th September 2022. We booked a normal room to celebrate my mum's birthday. Upon check-in a gentleman greeted them warmly and he noticed that tomorrow is my mum's birthday and wished her. My mum was so surprise and appreciate the attentiveness of the staff. We were also given an upgrade to a suite room. We were so appreciative for the gesture. Therefore, I would like to thank Mr. Fahmi from the front desk. Check-in was smooth and guess what for sustainability effort the hotel goes paperless for the guest invoices. It will be sent to your email upon request. I would also like to thank Ms. Rozita from Instant Service Department for attending to our amenities request and enquiry. She answered professionally and love to hear her voice. Such a voice

title: For me it was memorable.
desc: It was great to stay at this hotel. The staffs were so kind! Especially Jeff who guided us how to find the Yakun toast. His gentle and warm welcoming us was memorable and the first impression was so nice. Ron was also very kind to recommended good local restarants near this hotel. The room condition was clean and cozy. It is located near MTR so that it is super easy to get access to the main spots in Singapore. I travelled a lot and this is hotel is one of the best. :)

title: Sherlyn Has Made Our Wedding Experience Lovely and Memorable.
desc: Both my wife and I are immensely thankful to Sherlyn for exceeding our expectations when it comes to our wedding, despite the fact that there was transition in Manager, she was able to get up to speed surprisingly quickly and follow up with us promptly to make sure that each and every step of the way was carefully managed. Furthermore, we had specific specifications for Holy Matrimony, Lunch Reception, and one more unique request to have our Beloved Pet Dog around, and she made a rapid decision to make our experience even better than we anticipated. We can't thank her enough for being so professional and efficient to answer when we have questions.

title: Intercontinental Singapore: Home Away From Home
desc: What can I say about this hotel except it‚Äôs terrific! A hotel is a hotel but the staff here makes it a home! I‚Äôve been coming here for many years and sometimes there are small issues but they never detract from the fact, this is an exceptional hotel with an amazing staff. My room attendant, Juan Li is always spot on and will do anything to make the stay better. Plus their Club Lounge is one of the best anywhere. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

title: Wedding Lunch + Staycation
desc: Our wedding manager, Sherlyn and her team, did a fantastic job for our wedding lunch. They went and above beyond to ensure our wedding lunch went smooth and well. As a bride and groom, it was so nice to relax on our wedding day. Thank you so much for your marvellous job, Sherlyn and Mugi and team! :) Staycay was so great and comfortable. We had complimentary breakfast buffet, afternoon tea and evening cocktail. We felt so pampered in this gorgeous hotel. :)

title: Great experience at Intercontinental Hotel
desc: I had very good experience the room was always maintained clean and impecable, done anytime I left. I thank you specifically Juan Li for his diligence and kindness! He made my stay also very pleasant. Front desk was very helpful and accommodate my stay extension at ease. Manager offered a free dinner for a mistake of one of the employees The area where I stayed was a very lively one, all attractions are easy to access from the hotel

title: Clean and tidy
desc: Was very comfortable stay. Staff was well trained and had a great smile. Breakfast can be improved a bit more I guess. Especially lineup in bread. Other than that, all was good to me so expect to come back at next visit.

title: Intimate Wedding
desc: We had our intimate wedding at a relatively unknown private space at the 11th floor. The space is lovely and the hotel offers attractive packages that is very inclusive and we didn‚Äôt have to worry about finding external vendors to cover the little details. We felt well taken care of by our wedding coordinator Sherlyn and our actual day Ops manager. They are relatively prompt on response prior to the wedding, and check on us quite frequently on the actual day. The food catered by Man Fu Yuan on the actual day was good, and the portion was on point. The wedding favour macarons was good as well. The hotel even left a lovely plate of desserts in our room. However, hotel seems rather understaffed on wedding coordination side. And that on the actual day, no staffs informed us

title: Service at Intercontinental
desc: Excellent service and hospitality. In particular want to call out Upadhya/Megan. He was least ready with a helping hand and smile on his face. Very nice to talk to and helped answer all my questions. Highly recommend for service. Rooms are also very nice. Love the old world charm of the hotel. Very elegant.

title: Excellent property and staff
desc: Came during F1 races - With availability hard to come by during races, I had a gap in the middle of my stay. Lucinda kept working to find me a room in the property, which made my business trip a smooth success. Recognition also to Upadhya with helping me in room transfers. The hotel is an Intercontinental - excellent as expected, but the staff made my stay a comfortable and productive one.

title: Intercontinental never disappoints
desc: Perfect location - few minutes to the MRT, walking distance (20 mins) to the marina. Stayed here for business: very good breakfast, all the choices possible, staff is very efficient and helpful. Didn‚Äôt visit the pool but it looked decent. Hotel is linked to the nearest shopping mall.

title: Excellent Hotel with Asian Design Language
desc: When you walk into this hotel, you will definitely see the differences. The ambient, building architechture, decoration are really defining the culture. Staff were extremely accomodating and the breakfast was really great. Location - it is actually very near to Arab Street and connected to Bugis Junction

title: Nice classy hotel
desc: Very nice hotel in the center of the city, with high-end IHG quality. The room is nicely decorated with very classical taste and atmosphere. It is amazingly quiet as well, considering numerous high rises are visible right through the window across the street. There are plenty of options in the breakfast buffet, comparable to other 5-star hotels around. The services are great in general. it is a great choice if you do not mind a bit more traffic during rush hours.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: We recently enjoyed a 4 night stay in Singapore. The service at this hotel was lovely, very nice staff. We had nice big family room with a view. Beds were comfortable and room was clean and bright. Plenty of complimentary water was provided each day. We had lunch in the hotel on the day we arrived. The service was slow but the meal was fine. The location is excellent for tourists, right on top of a shopping mall and a short walk to Raffles. There is a bus stop across the road, and the tourist bus stops there. There are plenty of restaurants nearby but the MTS is also very close so you can get pretty much anywhere. Taxis to and from the airport were inexpensive.

title: Great stay
desc: Great hotel and staff. Getting access to the Club is a must there, for great breakfast and snacks throughout the day. The pool could be bigger, the water isn't particularly warm in the spa and the floor there is quite slippery. That would be the only downside to the hotel.
